61a7(phal chen): na med pa'i lam yang bstan/ /klu dpal pad+mo gtsug phud 'di la dga'/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ /chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /
61b1(phal chen): 'gro ba'i gti mug dra ba rnam par sbyong / /de skad chu 'dzin shugs ni smra zhing brjod/ /sangs rgyas dra med bsam gyis mi khyab can/ /'jig rten kun gyi yul du rnam par mdzes/ /
61b2(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun la ston/ /sna tshogs dpal gyi me tog spyod yul lo/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad rgya che ba'ang / /'byams klas thugs kyi skad cig
61b3(phal chen): gcig gis btul/ /rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab mi g.yo ste/ /rdo rje rdul 'dzin tshul ni 'di yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'byams klas kun bkang zhang / /phyogs bcu rnams
61b4(phal chen): su rgyal ba'i gsung yang grag / sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes/ /'di ltar 'di la sprin 'byung rab tu 'jug /de la chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa'i rnam par
61b5(phal chen): thar pa ni/ chos kyi chu bo mtha' med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha ri dang chu kun la brten pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag
61b6(phal chen): par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang
61b7(phal chen): 'grogs pa'i snying rje'i tshul gyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha nga ros khyab par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra yid du mi
62a1(phal chen): 'ong ba zlog cing phan pa skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la
62a2(phal chen): 'tshe ba med pa'i byams pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gdung
62a3(phal chen): bar mi nus pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jungs pa sel cing gtong
62a4(phal chen): ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ thams cad tshim par byed pa'i
62a5(phal chen): bsod nams kyi zhing rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon
62a6(phal chen): mongs pa rnam par byang bar byed cing 'khon du 'dzin pa dam po dang / khro ba'i shugs dang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od kyi
62a7(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong bar byed cing thar pa rgya mtsho la 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pas /
62b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chos rnams rgya mtsho
62b2(phal chen): mtha' yas spyod pa dag / sngon chad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs/ /'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa rnams/ /sprin chen char bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ /
62b3(phal chen): bskal pa brjod du med par rgyal bas sngon/ /smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings sbyangs shing / /'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen/ /'khyil ba zhes bya chu klung lha
62b4(phal chen): dga' 'o/ /'gro dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i tshul bsgoms shing / /mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyong / /yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du blta/ /de la dri med mig
62b5(phal chen): gi lha yang mos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni/ /kun tu bsgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu'i yid/ /
62b6(phal chen): rnam thar 'di ni sgro dbyangs sgrog pas thos/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho 'gro la phan don du/ /sngon chad byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mthong / /de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten mdzes/ /
62b7(phal chen): lam rgyud skyob pa rjes su dran zhing dga'/ /rgyal ba sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad/ /de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho sdug bsngal 'jil/ /zhi
63a1(phal chen): byed chu klung lha ni des dga' 'o/ /sbyin pa'i sgo mo tshad med mi zad mang / /'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing / /rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs
63a2(phal chen): pa yongs su bsal/ /kun nas dga' dpal rnam thar de mthong ngo / /thabs tshul rgya mtsho thams cad bsgoms pas na/ /yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung / /rgyal bas
63a3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de/ /rgya chen sgra dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'/ /sgrib pa'i klong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri/ /'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs
63a4(phal chen): pas| |mkha' mnyam 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes/ /rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lha dga' 'o/ /sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ /bsod nams zhing ni
63a5(phal chen): 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor/ /byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad/ /rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no/ /de la lo tog gi lha ngad 'jam pa'i
63a6(phal chen): dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ro dang mdangs thams cad skyed cing / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu 'thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi
63a7(phal chen): lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyi tshim pa skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog
63b1(phal chen): gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha mdangs kyi ngad mtha'
63b2(phal chen): yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ snying rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha
63b3(phal chen): kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing / sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par skyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha
63b4(phal chen): gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha yal ga dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam
63b5(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa'i byams pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub
63b6(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro
63b7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par zlog cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag
64a1(phal chen): cing 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes
64a2(phal chen): bya'o| |de nas lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lo tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te / de'i tshe tshigs su
64a3(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pa ni/ /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang mgon gyur te/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang dag skyed/ /bsod nams rgya
64a4(phal chen): mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med/ /sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin/ /'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/ /chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed/ /dus kyi
64a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug / bder gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas/ /'gro ba dag ni chos kyi legs pas mdzes/ /'gro ba kun 'dul kun tu rnam
64a6(phal chen): par snang / /stobs dang gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo / /sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i/ /thugs rje rgya mtsho sngon chad rnam sbyangs pas/ /de phyir rdzu
64a7(phal chen): 'phrul rnams ni mtha' yas so/ /de ni mdangs mthong lha yis rab tu mthong / /thabs rnams kun gyi sgo rnams don yod par/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyab
64b1(phal chen): gyur cing / /'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad/ /'di ni thams cad sgo mo'i rnam thar to/ /'gro ba 'di na mos yangs gang yod pa/ /de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus
64b2(phal chen): byung ste| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho 'o/ /nags tshal rgyan gyi gtsug phud de la 'jug /'jig rten rnams la byams pa che bskyed de/ /sems can rnams la
64b3(phal chen): phan phyir rang byung skyes/ /lam rab dge ba zhi la rab tu ston/ /zhi ba sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to/ /phyogs su sems can yongs smin byed pa'i tshe/ /bder gshegs spyod
64b4(phal chen): pa ji ltar rnam dag pa/ /byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung / /spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so/ /rgyal bas 'jig rten yid du 'ong ba spong / /dge ba ma lus rnams
64b5(phal chen): kyang rab tu skyed/ /'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong / /dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo / /'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags/ /skye bo kun gyi bsam pa
64b6(phal chen): des mkhyen te/ /sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad/ /rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to/ /de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam pa
64b7(phal chen): kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o/ /sman gyi lha tsan+dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ blta ba don yod pas
65a1(phal chen): sems can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ /sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas
65a2(phal chen): rdul dang bral pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /sman gyi lha ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag
65a3(phal chen): par 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /sman gyi lha spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o//
65a4(phal chen): sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba ldongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /
65a5(phal chen): sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'phro
65a6(phal chen): ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o/ /sman gyi lha
65a7(phal chen): phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /sman gyi lha mdangs dang 'od kun tu
65b1(phal chen): 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed cing sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs
65b2(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sman gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam
65b3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab ltos/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/ /thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas/ /sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grol/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de
65b4(phal chen): ltar bsam mi khyab/ /de yi mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod/ /skye rgu rnams ni sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad/ /tsan+dan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/ /sngon chad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag
65b5(phal chen): la ltos| |bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na'ang / /srid pa kun la chags pa gang yang med/ /de la rdul med 'od kyi lha 'jug go /rgyal ba bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu/ /mthong
65b6(phal chen): zhing mtshan thos de bzhin shin tu dkon/ /tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de/ /de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de ltar 'jug /rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang / /nad las
65b7(phal chen): rab tu 'grel ba'i 'od bkye bas/ /'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad/ /sbu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no/ /sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas/ /
66a1(phal chen): 'gro ba rtag tu ldongs shing rmongs gyur rnams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam par sbyong / /de ni mun dang bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo / /rgyal ba'i gsung
66a2(phal chen): dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas pa'i/ /chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung / /de ni sems can ma lus kun kyang shes/ /'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to/ /rgyal ba'i
66a3(phal chen): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ /srid par sems can yongs su smin byas pa/ /de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon du snang / /nyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo / /sangs
66a4(phal chen): rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste/ /'gro ba kun phan don du de skyes so/ /'gro ba kun la lam rnams shin tu ston/ /de ni phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so/ /sangs rgyas
66a5(phal chen): 'gro dbang rnams kyi 'od yangs pa/ /phyogs rnams thams cad ma lus kun tu gang / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i gzi brjid skyed/ /mdangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam
66a6(phal chen): thar to| |de la nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /nags tshal gyi
66a7(phal chen): lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba rgya chen po kun nas spungs pa'i shugs zhes bya'o/ /nags tshal gyi lha myu gu yid
66b1(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /nags tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i phreng ba'i
66b2(phal chen): dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o/ /nags tshal gyi lha yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi
66b3(phal chen): brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o/ /nags
66b4(phal chen): tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /nags
66b5(phal chen): tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes
66b6(phal chen): bya'o| |nags tshal gyi lha kun nas spos mang po'i ngad ldang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun
66b7(phal chen): tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o/ /nags tshal gyi lha kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad
67a1(phal chen): kyi yon tan gyis rgyas par yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
67a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dga' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o/ /de nas nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis sangs
67a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bsod nams stobs dang ye
67a4(phal chen): shes stobs rnams dang / /sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung / /stobs rnams kun gyis rang byung pha rol phyin/ /'gro ba kun na 'phags shing rnam par mdzes/ /'gro
67a5(phal chen): ba thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs/ /rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /sna tshogs spungs 'od rnam thar 'di la 'jug/
67a6(phal chen): sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong ma thag /mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston/ /myu gu yid 'ong 'od kyi rnam thar
67a7(phal chen): yin| |rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te/ /'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /rnam thar 'di ni phreng ba'i dpal
67b1(phal chen): gyis mthong / /sngon chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams/ /zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran/ /kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs/ /yal ga 'od kyi brjid
67b2(phal chen): kyis 'di mthong ngo / /'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag /skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thugs su chud/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu yangs/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyi 'od
67b3(phal chen): kyis 'di mthong ngo / /bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung / /dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par skyed/ /sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes/ /'di ni sgra rnams
67b4(phal chen): sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing / /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung / /rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston/ /
67b5(phal chen): kun tu dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug /ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams/ /myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag /de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston/ /
67b6(phal chen): 'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo / /sems can ma rungs sbyor ba spyod pa rnams/ /bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan ni bder gshegs skad
67b7(phal chen): cig gcig gis lta/ /ro yi 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo / /de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan zhi zhing yangs
68a1(phal chen): la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar
68a2(phal chen): pa ni| 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par
68a3(phal chen): snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha rdul
68a4(phal chen): thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes
68a5(phal chen): bya'o| |ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par bstan pa ston pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha
68a6(phal chen): stobs la thub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun
68a7(phal chen): nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i
68b1(phal chen): lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun tu
68b2(phal chen): mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /ri'i lha kun nas sra ba'i
68b3(phal chen): rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don rgya mtsho rgya chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas ri'i lha rin po che rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas
68b4(phal chen): bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi
68b5(phal chen): zad tshad med ltos/ /sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyod/ /rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed bsgoms mdzad pas/ /'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang bskyed/ /sangs
68b6(phal chen): rgyas spu nas dri med dpal bkye ba/ /yan lag mtshan rgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing / /byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston/ /nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar
68b7(phal chen): to| |sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon/ /'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags/ /dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'/ /rnam thar 'di la
69a1(phal chen): 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug / rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten chos ma chags/ /bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo/ /sna
69a2(phal chen): tshogs khams 'gro sbyor ba ma lus 'dul/ /dga' ba dri med gtsug phud rnam thar to/ /'jig rten kun ni ldongs gyur mun stug zhugs/ /thugs rje der bskyed sangs
69a3(phal chen): rgyas 'od bkye zhing / /'gro khams yun ring nyal ba sad par mdzad/ /rig nas dga' 'od lha yi rnam thar to/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod tshe/ /zhing rdul mnyam
69a4(phal chen): pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas/ /de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod/ /zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug go /las kyi sprin sgrib g.yogs shing
69a5(phal chen): bsgribs pa rnams/ /srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas/ /de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bsal/ /gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems
69a6(phal chen): so| |rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun/ /phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag /rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas/ /'od mang rdul
69a7(phal chen): gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go / sems can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun/ /de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang / /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang ston/ /
69b1(phal chen): tshul mngon mig gi lha yis de thos so/ /chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zad tshad med pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung / /bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang
69b2(phal chen): la ston/ /rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug /de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can
69b3(phal chen): thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can
69b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o/ /sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs sgom pa rnam par 'byed
69b5(phal chen): pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /
69b6(phal chen): sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed
69b7(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par
70a1(phal chen): thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha me tog gi glang po sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par
70a2(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /sangs rgyas kyi chos
70a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyi rlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
70a4(phal chen): kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyun sgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas sangs rgyas kyi
70a5(phal chen): mthus sa'i lha'i dpal gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sngon chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs
70a6(phal chen): kyis| |brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang / /byams pa'i sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra/ /dus gsum gtogs pa'i
70a7(phal chen): sems can bsod nams dang / /ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag /rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od/ /bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga'
70b1(phal chen): bar 'gyur/ /'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs/ /sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston/ /'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa
70b2(phal chen): yin no/ /sngon chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang / /'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par zlog pa ni/ /rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te/ /rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o/ /de bzhin
70b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te/ /'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig ston/ /dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha/ /dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta/ /sangs
70b4(phal chen): rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab/ /sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ /gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar/ /sangs rgyas yon tan
70b5(phal chen): mtha' yas mnga' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su/ /phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad/ /spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa yi lha/ /sangs rgyas
70b6(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba de la lta/ /phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing / /'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha/ /
70b7(phal chen): rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan/ /rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi/ /spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkang zhing / /sems can ma lus yongs
71a1(phal chen): su smin mdzad pa/ /me tog gtsug phud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong / /de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste/ /mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra/ /
71a2(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus/ /rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga' 'o/ /de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa
71a3(phal chen): yang dag sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung
71a4(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /
71a5(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lha slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu
71a6(phal chen): rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar
71a7(phal chen): pa ni| thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams
71b1(phal chen): 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od
71b2(phal chen): ces bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri ma rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
71b3(phal chen): dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ /de
71b4(phal chen): n as grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su
71b5(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes/ /sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i//
71b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang / /sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te/ /de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen/ /rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ /sna
71b7(phal chen): tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'/ /rgyal bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad/ /sngon chad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung / /dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag
72a1(phal chen): blangs| |rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob/ /'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing / /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad sems can
72a2(phal chen): rnams| |kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog / nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba 'di la dga'/ /rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te/ /tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing
72a3(phal chen): mtshungs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas/ /mar me me tog 'od kyi lha dga' 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams/ /'gro
72a4(phal chen): ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan/ /de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu sgom pa yis/ /mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa/ /sngon chad
72a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs/ /de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas/ /bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'/ /srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can
72a6(phal chen): rnams| |'khor gyur rab rib ldongs pa gzigs pas na/ /de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung / /dri med 'od kyis rnam thar 'di thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
72a7(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos/ /'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dbus kyang med/ /de dag bstan cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul/ /spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo / /sems
72b1(phal chen): can rmongs pa mun pas ldongs gyur cing / /rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur/ /rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug /
72b2(phal chen): de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sngon gyi smon
72b3(phal chen): lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par
72b4(phal chen): sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston
72b5(phal chen): cing / rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ dka' ba
72b6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'dul ba'i
72b7(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug
73a1(phal chen): phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha rin
73a2(phal chen): po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu
73a3(phal chen): dam pa spos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi
73a4(phal chen): sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ snying po byang chub kyi lha rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha pad+mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam
73a5(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par
73a6(phal chen): thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan
73a7(phal chen): gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bskal
73b1(phal chen): pa mang po mtha' dang dbus med par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sngon spyad dran/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na/ /de phyir de yi bsod nams nam mkha'i
73b2(phal chen): tshad| |zhing rnams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par/ /mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas/ /ri bo'i spo yi 'od kyi lha de ni/ /bder gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar
73b3(phal chen): 'gyur| |bder gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/ /'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing / /sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab
73b4(phal chen): tu dga'/ /mtha' yas bskal par dka' ba rab spyad de/ /dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste/ /de la me tog mig gi lha
73b5(phal chen): dga' 'o/ /yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro mtha' yas sprin/ /'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas/ /rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha
73b6(phal chen): yang dga'/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste/ /de la rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ /ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par sel/ /de yis gtsug phud 'phyang ba dga'
73b7(phal chen): ba thob| |rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig gis tshad med pa'o/ /chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa/ /rgya mtshor tha dad yang dag
74a1(phal chen): shes pas 'jug / zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du/ /'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas/ /de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing
74a2(phal chen): kun grags/ /de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran/ /mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan/ /rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi
74a3(phal chen): lha de ni| |byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta/ /sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de/ /pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha
74a4(phal chen): de ni| |rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dga' 'o/ /sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab/ /snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag /yang dag bsgrubs
74a5(phal chen): pas byung ba de dag ni/ /thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to/ /de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i
74a6(phal chen): char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad du
74a7(phal chen): ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
74b1(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang / rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ gom pa 'dor ba thams cad du
74b2(phal chen): sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig gcig gis pad+mo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul
74b3(phal chen): pa byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang / dbyangs dang / snang ba kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba'i shugs
74b4(phal chen): dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro shing tsan+dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin
74b5(phal chen): du ldang ba zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ pad+mo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba skyed pa
74b6(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba 'byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang gis
74b7(phal chen): 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtshos yang dag par bskul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas rkang gis
75a1(phal chen): ' gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas
75a2(phal chen): nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi shugs bskyed cing / /bskal pa mtha' yas sngon chad spyod pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams kun rdul
75a3(phal chen): shin tu phra mnyam pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod/ /skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yongs pa/ /dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sbrul mdzad
75a4(phal chen): nas| |zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa/ /snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong / /'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab/ /'khor rnams kun tu
75a5(phal chen): 'byams klas mtha' yas pa'i/ /rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston/ /me tog gtsug phud lha des de mthong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /
75a6(phal chen): thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis/ /sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad/ /shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo / /sems can
75a7(phal chen): snyed kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pa/ /re re'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs/ /rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong / /rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo / /
75b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te/ /'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ /bder gshegs de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing / /dga' sgra dbyangs kyis
75b2(phal chen): rnam thar de mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan/ /'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul/ /tsan+dan
75b3(phal chen): shing gi 'od ni de la nyan/ /spu rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang / /dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi rnams/ /sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te/ /
75b4(phal chen): de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston/ /de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong / /rdul
75b5(phal chen): gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo / /'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis/ /phyogs bcur sems can yang dag skul bar mdzad/ /me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro
75b6(phal chen): ba'i lha| |mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu thob/ /de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
75b7(phal chen): rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi
76a1(phal chen): khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam
76a2(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la brjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i
76a3(phal chen): lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes
76a4(phal chen): bya'o| |lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu
76a5(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis dga'
76a6(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bebs pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma
76a7(phal chen): mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang
76b1(phal chen): rmongs pa rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po
76b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar
76b3(phal chen): pa ni| sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel
76b4(phal chen): d ang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su
76b5(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ri rab rdul phran shin tu phra snyed kyi/ /bskal pa de dag pha snga'i bskal pa ni/ /rdul ces bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal/ /mchod de smon lam btab
76b6(phal chen): pa bdag gis dran/ /sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba/ /de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba sems can 'dul/ /'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de
76b7(phal chen): mthong ngo / /dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrog/ /'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag skul/ /dbyangs kyis 'dul ba
77a1(phal chen): de la dga' bar nyan/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos/ /sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/ /'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu
77a2(phal chen): snang / /me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong / /'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du/ /la la bzhugs dang bzhengs
77a3(phal chen): dang gshegs par mthong / /de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo / /rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas/ /dri zhim 'od 'phro sgron ma'i sprin bkye
77a4(phal chen): bas| |'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur/ /dri med spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung / /nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug
77a5(phal chen): bsngal gzir ba rnams/ /mgu bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad bcil/ /snang ba'i phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo / /'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon//
77a6(phal chen): rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel/ /khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra/ /sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon
77a7(phal chen): mongs shing / /bdud kyi las kyis dkrugs te 'phyan pa'i rnams/ /de dag rgyal ba rnam thar lam ston te/ /srung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo / /de bzhin
77b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ltos/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing / /'jig rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul/ /kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul
77b2(phal chen): lo| |de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /lag
77b3(phal chen): na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje
77b4(phal chen): ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul ba rgya chen po bstan pas yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs
77b5(phal chen): kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig
77b6(phal chen): rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam
77b7(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
78a1(phal chen): shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje seng+ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
78a2(phal chen): pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can mi
78a3(phal chen): rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs 'jigs ltar rab tu ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud pad+mo 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub
78a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang
78a5(phal chen): po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chos
78a6(phal chen): rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi/ /chos nyid de la rnam par ltos/ /yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas ba spu thams cad
78a7(phal chen): nas| |'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis/ /chos kyi dbyings su khyab
78b1(phal chen): byas shing / /'gro ba kun gyi mngon sum du/ /mi zad sku ni shin tu ston/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog /gsung gi sems can thams cad
78b2(phal chen): kyi| |bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs/ /'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na/ /thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang / /de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la/ /'dren pa dag ni chos ston
78b3(phal chen): mdzad| |rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis/ /thams cad chos kyi bye brag don/ /rgyal ba zad med rab tu ston/ /rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la/ /rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab
78b4(phal chen): tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas/ /kun gyis 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen nam
78b5(phal chen): mkha' bzhin/ /kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu mthong / /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma 'dres pa/ /thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad/ /'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du/ /byang chub snying
78b6(phal chen): por rnam par mdzes/ /'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'od 'phro sprin ni kun tu snang / /chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing / /sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston/ /
78b7(phal chen): bam po lnga pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug
79a1(phal chen): ste| 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba la mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam
79a2(phal chen): par thar pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub
79a3(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su
79a4(phal chen): bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor
79a5(phal chen): lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha'
79a6(phal chen): dang dbus med pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba
79a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par
79b1(phal chen): thar pa dang / gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di
79b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa bdag go / de nas byang
79b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi
79b4(phal chen): mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs/ /mkha' yangs
79b5(phal chen): rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa/ /de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang phab/ /ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba/ /de bzhin
79b6(phal chen): rdul sbubs ma lus kun na'ang ste/ /'on kyang bder gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med/ /zhing rnams kun tu yul med rab tu ston/ /sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de/ /
79b7(phal chen): spyod pa thub pas byang chub sems dpa' bstan/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas/ /rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ /chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam
80a1(phal chen): pa rgya che ste/ /mtha' yas phyogs su mtha' dang dbus med sgo/ /rdul phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul ba spros/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /
80a2(phal chen): phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang / /'jig rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung / /thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de/ /'dul bas sems
80a3(phal chen): can thams cad rnam par sbyong / /rdul sbubs kun tu mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston/ /sngon chang thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams/ /
80a4(phal chen): ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod/ /yangs dus bskal pa ji snyed yod pa'i rnams/ /skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston/ /der ni sems can 'byung
80a5(phal chen): zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i ye shes bsam yas ltos/ /'byams klas mi zad mtha' yas lo grangs pas/ /rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas
80a6(phal chen): sa lta ste| |thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/ /rgyal sras kun gyis shes par smra ba min/ /sangs rgyas mkhan 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste/ /chos nyid mi gnas
80a7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin dag gis/ /sprul pas spyod tshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing / /shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan/ /sangs rgyas gsung de rab tu brjod pas na/ /chos gnas
80b1(phal chen): thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin/ /'gro ba thams cad re re'i sgo dag nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug /de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi
80b2(phal chen): brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o/ /
80b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'ong mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing chos
80b4(phal chen): kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam
80b5(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal
80b6(phal chen): gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs
80b7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
81a1(phal chen): pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
81a2(phal chen): spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu
81a3(phal chen): zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/
81a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par
81a5(phal chen): thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par
81a6(phal chen): thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med
81a7(phal chen): p a'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su
81b1(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing / /rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs pas sbyangs/ /'gro bar kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsung / /sangs rgyas chos
81b2(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rgya chen bskor/ /skad cig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste/ /mtha' yas spyod yul dbyangs rnams rgyal ba ston/ /'gro ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu/ /
81b3(phal chen): byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ /bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad spyod spyad de/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas
81b4(phal chen): rab bkye zhing / /sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs/ /mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yis/ /skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsam yang / /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
81b5(phal chen): stobs la mtha' dbus med/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gengs/ /rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa/ /rgyal
81b6(phal chen): bas 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bstan/ /skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang / /bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu/ /rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par
81b7(phal chen): dka'| |tshul rnams kun sgor sangs rgyas chags pa med/ /'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yas mdzes/ /sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya
82a1(phal chen): chen bsnyen bkur bas/ /de bas 'jig rten gtso la chos dbyings rnams/ /kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung / /phyogs rnams bkang ste
82a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas byung ba dag / rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston/ /de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad/ /sngon tshe'i bskal
82a3(phal chen): par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab bskyed cing / /'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs/ /
82a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas mtshan med sku med rdul dang bral/ /de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste/ /'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang / /'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal
82a5(phal chen): kun zhi mdzad/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams
82a6(phal chen): kyi tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni /byang chub
82a7(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen
82b1(phal chen): 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub
82b2(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu thog ma 'gro ba'i
82b3(phal chen): ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
82b4(phal chen): thams cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i
82b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs
82b6(phal chen): brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
82b7(phal chen): spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil
83a1(phal chen): 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam
83a2(phal chen): par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog
83a3(phal chen): yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de
83a4(phal chen): n as byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas
83a5(phal chen): nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang / /sa yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongs su rgyas/ /tshad med sems can rnam
83a6(phal chen): par 'dul ba'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te/ /sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul
83a7(phal chen): mdzad pa/ /skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag /mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa tshim par gsungs/ /bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par/ /rgyal ba 'gro la mngon
83b1(phal chen): sum kun nas bzhugs/ /mgon pos sngon chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du/ /rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan/ /chos rgyal de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul ba/ /phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma
83b2(phal chen): lus kun na snang / /snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang / /'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing / /'jig rten dag
83b3(phal chen): na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes/ /dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs/ /sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de/ /rgyal ba dri
83b4(phal chen): med 'od gsal chos kyi sku/ /ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de/ /phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ /chos rje thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag /bder
83b5(phal chen): gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te/ /rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus med bkang zhing / /rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun
83b6(phal chen): bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan/ /rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa/ /de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan/ /phyogs rnams kun tu
83b7(phal chen): rang byung rnam par mdzes/ /smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston/ /ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog /sangs rgyas yul ni
84a1(phal chen): phyogs su zad pa med/ /dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings/ /chos dbyings kun tu chags med brnyas pa ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams
84a2(phal chen): kun na shin tu mdzes/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri dang / pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang / 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad
84a3(phal chen): dang / me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang / rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang / rin po che 'od 'phro
84a4(phal chen): ba'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang / seng+ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'
84a5(phal chen): mang po thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
84a6(phal chen): sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi
84a7(phal chen): mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pad+mo
84b1(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od
84b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
84b3(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni/ rab tu 'byin/ spos
84b4(phal chen): kyi sprin thams cad ni/ shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni/ mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin
84b5(phal chen): ni| rnam par 'gyed cing / nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni/ rab tu gtong / sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni/ rab tu sgrog/
84b6(phal chen): rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni/ rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni/ rnam par spyod/
84b7(phal chen): rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i char ni/ rab tu 'bebs /rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni/
85a1(phal chen): rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin
85a2(phal chen): gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing lhags par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
85a3(phal chen): yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas
85a4(phal chen): seng+ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
85a5(phal chen): spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so/ /sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su
85a6(phal chen): 'brang ba rnams so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams
85a7(phal chen): so| |sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so/ /dus gsum
85b1(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so/ /dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po'i rab tu thob pa rnams so/ /bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su dag pa
85b2(phal chen): rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
85b3(phal chen): r gya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe
85b4(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen/ /chags med brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang
85b5(phal chen): byas nas/ /'byams klas 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes/ /bder gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med de/ /thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kun rgyas par/ /
85b6(phal chen): dbang phyug chen po kun gyis mchod bskor cing / /shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/ /skad cig sems la mi zad
85b7(phal chen): yon tan gzugs/ /rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe/ /de
86a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pas srid pa rgya mtsho 'dir/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba de yi chos 'dzin to/ /yongs dag dri
86a2(phal chen): med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag / thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas/ /pad+mo'i snying po pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ /
86a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas gang la bzhugs pa'i seng+ge'i khri/ /rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing / /spos 'phro'i sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung / /snying po du ma'i me tog phreng
86a4(phal chen): dpyangs pa'o/ /rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rtag tu 'gyed/ /'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar/ /rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /thub pa de bzhugs mngon par
86a5(phal chen): rab tu mdzes/ /sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed/ /rin chen tshon du sna tshogs pad+mo 'phyang / /nor bu'i rgyal pos skar khung kun nas brgyan/ /sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam
86a6(phal chen): par rab tu mdzes/ /zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su bzung / /rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan/ /gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung / /sangs rgyas de
86a7(phal chen): bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog /gzugs brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams
86b1(phal chen): kun na snang / /thub pa de 'dra'i seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams
86b2(phal chen): cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'di ni bder gshegs sangs rgyas byin rlabs te/ /byang chub spyod pa sngon chad spyad pa dang / /sangs rgyas
86b3(phal chen): mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag / rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang / /spos 'od snang ba nor bu'i rgyal po can/ /me tog snying po seng+ge'i gdan gyi 'khor/ /rgyan rnams
86b4(phal chen): thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang / /'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun bkang ste/ /skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun/ /rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las
86b5(phal chen): snang / /sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang / /'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdon la lta/ /rin chen lda ldi pad+mo mang btags pa/ /phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po
86b6(phal chen): rnams| |sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing / /sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la bstod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin/ /'di dag rgyan kun
86b7(phal chen): de las rab tu byung / /sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa/ /'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus/ /mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa/ /'khor yangs rnam dag shin tu
87a1(phal chen): mnyam pa ste/ /nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ /byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor kun to/ /sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan yod pa/ /kha dog
87a2(phal chen): mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te/ /me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram/ /gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan/ /sa yi lha mo de dag rab dga' zhing / /
87a3(phal chen): skad cig sems kyis mi zad sa yang ston/ /kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing / /kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo / /rin chen sgron ma mang po gsal
87a4(phal chen): bar 'bar/ /spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung / /dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing / /lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed/ /phyogs rnams bcu na zhing
87a5(phal chen): rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa/ /de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang / /sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung / /de nas byang chub sems
87a6(phal chen): dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
87a7(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu/ /zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rnams/ /snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la/ /mi
87b1(phal chen): zad sa dang de dag rab tu snang / /rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang ba yi/ /sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkra ma/ /rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor/ /sangs rgyas 'od
87b2(phal chen): kyis sprin kyang rab tu snang / /sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam pa'i drung / /kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos brgyan byas las/ /bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung / /
87b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod/ /rin chen mang po sgron ma'i char phab cing / /rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes/ /sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu
87b4(phal chen): sgrog / sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston/ /rin chen 'od 'phro sgron ma rnam par snang / /'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu 'byung / /nor bu dra ba sil ma kun nas bkram/ /rin
87b5(phal chen): chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag brgyan/ /sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos/ /rin chen mang po tshon bzang rgyan du bkye/ /'gro pa dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog /de dag
87b6(phal chen): chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong / /ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag /sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste/ /de dag
87b7(phal chen): chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod/ /sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi/ /chos sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin
88a1(phal chen): du| |sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung / /dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na/ /de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro ba 'gengs/ /srog chags
88a2(phal chen): rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed/ /sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dag dang / /dri med sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i/ /phun sum
88a3(phal chen): tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing / /bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis sangs
88a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad
88a5(phal chen): cing / /sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes/ /'byams klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du/ /sangs rgyas 'gro gtso gzhal med khang na snang / /rin chen
88a6(phal chen): kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar/ /sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab/ /de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu
88a7(phal chen): mdzes| |ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te/ /phyogs rnams kun sgor rta babs sprin kyang bres/ /stegs bu'i phreng ba kun nas rgyan du bkod/ /gser gyi dril bu'i sprin kyang
88b1(phal chen): rnam par brgyus/ /me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos/ /rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres/ /nor bu thams cad sgo nas phreng ba 'bul/ /de na ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes/ /spos
88b2(phal chen): dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste/ /'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu g.yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres/ /de na sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs/ /phyogs
88b3(phal chen): rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams/ /dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing / /'byams klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas pho brang 'di
88b4(phal chen): na de dag grag / me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba/ /'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes/ /de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /gzugs
88b5(phal chen): brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang / /phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang bkye ba/ /de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar/ /phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes
88b6(phal chen): par brgyan/ /rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan/ /de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas pho brang rnam pa bsam yas te/ /gzhal med khang
88b7(phal chen): mang thams cad de la snang / /de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes/ /phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/ /rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang / /
89a1(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med mu yang de bzhin med/ /rang byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam
89a2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
89a3(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung / /snying
89a4(phal chen): po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes/ /spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang dag rgyu/ /yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas brgyan/ /rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris//
89a5(phal chen): shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas/ /rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung / /lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas
89a6(phal chen): 'khyil| |snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes/ /yal ga dog pa kun nas mngon pa ste/ /'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags/ /me tog 'bras bu
89a7(phal chen): rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed/ /snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab/ /'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes/ /dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes/ /yal ga'i
89b1(phal chen): sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs/ /snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung / /me tog nor dang rin chen mi zad nor/ /mu tig nor bu phyogs rnams kun nas
89b2(phal chen): brgyus/ /phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de/ /snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin/ /bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos/ /pad+mo'i dra ba nor bu dri med mang / /rin
89b3(phal chen): chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'phro/ /dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin/ /phyogs bcu'i shing bzang gzugs rnams gang yod pa/ /'byams klas zhing gi ma lus
89b4(phal chen): thams cad dag / byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang / /de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes/ /yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nor/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang
89b5(phal chen): rtag 'byung zhing / /bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char phab ste/ /phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir de dag 'dong / /de bzhin gshegs pa sngon chad cir gyur dang / /byang chub
89b6(phal chen): spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos/ /yal ga kun las rin chen nor mi zad/ /sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya ba pad+mo sna
89b7(phal chen): tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dus gsum gshegs
90a1(phal chen): pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag /de ni mtha' dang dbus kyang med pa ste/ /snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo / /me
90a2(phal chen): tog mang po'i phreng ba dbyangs bkye zhing / /'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste/ /byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha tshogs rnams/ /sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu
90a3(phal chen): mchod pa byed/ /spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar/ /spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung / /'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim/ /shing gi rgyal po de
90a4(phal chen): phyir phyogs su mdzes/ /pad+mo 'phrul ba stug cing gser mdog 'dra/ /rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing / /sems
90a5(phal chen): can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste/ /phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la/ /gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od
90a6(phal chen): mchog 'gyed/ /byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos/ /smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar/ /srid pa rgya mtsho
90a7(phal chen): kun na sngon chad du/ /rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston/ /byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed do/ /de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas/ /thub pa'i byang chub
90b1(phal chen): shing la skad cig cing / /rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan mang de dag ston/ /rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe/ /sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa/ /de dag mtshan
90b2(phal chen): bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa/ /thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang / /phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste/ /de dag cis
90b3(phal chen): 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang / /snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do/ /byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag /mtha'
90b4(phal chen): yas sna tshogs rgyan can thams cad kyang / /sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor
90b5(phal chen): gyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang
90b6(phal chen): chub spyod mdzad tshe/ /mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing / /gnas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i/ /bder gshegs sa stobs rnam par dag pa
90b7(phal chen): mthong / /bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te/ /mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing / /las
91a1(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byams klas stobs spyod tshe/ /bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin/ /yongs su
91a2(phal chen): smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang / /sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug /'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / /bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam
91a3(phal chen): spyod pa| |de dag ji bzhin rgyal pa chos ston te/ /rang byung mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to/ /phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / /'byams klas sems
91a4(phal chen): can khams dang chos kyi khams/ /nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyen mi rtog /rang byung spu rtser khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston/ /bder gshegs ye shes
91a5(phal chen): rgya chen kun tu 'gro/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs/ /phyogs dang zhing dang bskal pa 'gro bkang zhing / /sems can kun la stobs 'jug
91a6(phal chen): mngon par bstan/ /bsam gtan rnam thar stobs mtha' dbus med pa/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas
91a7(phal chen): na| |sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum bsgribs pa med/ /skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtser ston/ /zhing dang
91b1(phal chen): sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos/ /de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan/ /thub pa'i spyan ni nam mkha' mnyam pa ste/ /des ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs/
91b2(phal chen): thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas sa/ /brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan/ /'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang / /'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma
91b3(phal chen): lus par/ /thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing / /rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgrog pas sangs
91b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs kun tu/ /sangs rgyas
