91b5(phal chen): ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba/ /byang chub spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang / /'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing / /sbyin pa'i mthar phyin
91b6(phal chen): sngon chad spyad pas na/ /de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis brgyan/ /'gro ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba skye/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon/ /tshul khrims pha rol
91b7(phal chen): phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas/ /de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing / /shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel/ /ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de/ /sngon
92a1(phal chen): chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas/ /'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston te/ /de bas phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'phro/ /bskal
92a2(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyod tshe/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs pa thibs po bsal/ /de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste/ /zhing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes//
92a3(phal chen): bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe/ /bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu sbyangs/ /de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba skyed/ /nyon mongs dri ma 'grib pa kun
92a4(phal chen): kyang sel/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyod cing / /shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste/ /'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa yongs su bsal/ /de bas rgyal ba
92a5(phal chen): kun tu rnam par mdzes/ /'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis/ /yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas/ /phyogs rnams kun na kun la mngon par
92a6(phal chen): bzhugs/ /phyi ma'i bskal bar 'gro ba mngon du lta/ /smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab sbyong tshe/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che zhing / /phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i
92a7(phal chen): sprin mnyam par/ /spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes/ /rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/ /bskal pa gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs/ /de phyir
92b1(phal chen): rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin/ /phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir 'phags/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i/ /ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs
92b2(phal chen): pas| |de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin/ /phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs
92b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi/ /'gro
92b4(phal chen): ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha' mnyam par snang / /sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa/ /de bzhin kun kyang rin chen sgo nas brjod/ /dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul/ /phyogs
92b5(phal chen): dbyings kun gyi bder gshegs rnams mthong zhing / /gzhal med bskal par dri med yongs sbyangs pas/ /chos dbyings yangs la ye shes rab tu byung / /thams cad chos la dri med sa
92b6(phal chen): gnyis te/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing / /rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas/ /'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung / /bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum
92b7(phal chen): ste| |snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong brtan/ /gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas/ /chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos/ /'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa/ /mthu yi
93a1(phal chen): 'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste/ /zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o/ /dka' rgyal snying po mnyam
93a2(phal chen): dbyings mnyam nyid de/ /zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol/ /sa rnams chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes/ /de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan/ /shes rab rgya mtsho
93a3(phal chen): yangs pa'i sprin la spyod/ /'byams klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun/ /zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra/ /de 'byung byang chub shing chen 'di las grag /
93a4(phal chen): chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te/ /'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed/ /'byams klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag /ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas
93a5(phal chen): bstan| |thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas/ /bskal ba kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo ste/ /gzhal med sa
93a6(phal chen): de'i sprin kyang rab tu sgrog / tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang / /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug /'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo gros sa/ /bskal pa rgya
93a7(phal chen): mtshor byang chub shing las brjod/ /chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste/ /dus rnams kun 'gengs nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu/ /rgyal
93b1(phal chen): ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grag / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par
93b2(phal chen): bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni/ /dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems/ /rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab
93b3(phal chen): tu zhugs/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/ /phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te/ /dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul
93b4(phal chen): thams cad kyang / /gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong / /bder gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag /la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la/ /kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags
93b5(phal chen): med pa'i/ /mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong / /la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing / /yon tan mtha' yas 'od
93b6(phal chen): sprin rab 'bar ba/ /'gro ba dang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong / /la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug /dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam
93b7(phal chen): pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong / /sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste/ /phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing / /'gro ba
94a1(phal chen): snod yin skul bar byed pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug /la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug /sna tshogs snang bas
94a2(phal chen): 'gro ba kun bkang zhing / /rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong / /ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i/ /'od zer rgya
94a3(phal chen): mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug / sngon chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la/ /la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed/ /la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams/ /bder
94a4(phal chen): gshegs bsod nams 'byung ba ji bzhin mthong / /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe/ /ji ltar dag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong / /sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med
94a5(phal chen): de| |mtha' dang dbus med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun/ /rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong / /de nas sangs rgyas
94a6(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos
94a7(phal chen): so| |'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab tu ldeg go /kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu
94b1(phal chen): 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun tu shig shig go /'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i
94b2(phal chen): sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char thams
94b3(phal chen): cad rab tu phab bo/ /rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog
94b4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang / mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / spos dang / tsan+dan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs
94b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams
94b6(phal chen): cad kyi sprin dang / rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin bsam
94b7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab bo/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams
95a1(phal chen): r ab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po
95a2(phal chen): re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams
95a3(phal chen): thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan
95a4(phal chen): dang / tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang / yang dag par sgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / phyogs kyi tshul gzhan
95a5(phal chen): dang gzhan dang / chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / yul dang
95a6(phal chen): stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong
95a7(phal chen): du chud par byed do/ /'di na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na
95b1(phal chen): yang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dang
95b2(phal chen): po'o|| / /bam po drug pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
95b3(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
95b4(phal chen): rnams la byin gyi rlabs ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
95b5(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyengs pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom
95b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/
95b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrog pa ni/ ji lta
96a1(phal chen): bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
96a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi snyan ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
96a3(phal chen): la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
96a4(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom
96a5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs
96a6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni/ ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
96a7(phal chen): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa
96b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems
96b2(phal chen): dpa' thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu
96b3(phal chen): yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho
96b4(phal chen): rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems
96b5(phal chen): dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sa rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs
96b6(phal chen): su ston| byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni/
96b7(phal chen): ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
97a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams
97a2(phal chen): kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad
97a3(phal chen): grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin
97a4(phal chen): tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan par mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang
97a5(phal chen): bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di
97a6(phal chen): dag byung ngo / /mtha' yas rgya chen bskal par rab spyad de/ /byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes/ /phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa/ /de bzhin
97a7(phal chen): gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tshom gcod/ /mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu skyed/ /sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas
97b1(phal chen): zhi bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed/ /de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas/ /de dag bsam
97b2(phal chen): pa spyod yul ji bzhin du/ /the tshom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang / /sangs rgyas
97b3(phal chen): byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug /rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa
97b4(phal chen): dang / /rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang ba/ /rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan du gsol/ /sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang / /mi bsnyengs chos nyid
97b5(phal chen): ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang / /rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la bsgrag tu gsol/ /ji ltar chos rgyal pho brang mnga' mdzad cing / /rgyal
97b6(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrog dang / /sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang / /thugs brtse'i slad du yang dag bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med
97b7(phal chen): cing / /snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa/ /'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan du gsol/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar
98a1(phal chen): sems can khams/ /chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang / /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du
98a2(phal chen): gsol| |pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang / /rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang / /chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag /byang chub snying por thams cad
98a3(phal chen): bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas zhal gyi sgo
98a4(phal chen): tshams kyi mtshams kyi gseb nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
98a5(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od
98a6(phal chen): zer dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs
98a7(phal chen): kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
98b1(phal chen): cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub
98b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya
98b3(phal chen): ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi
98b4(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi
98b5(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
98b6(phal chen): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to/
98b7(phal chen): /'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad
99a1(phal chen): pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de/ /phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod/ /sems
99a2(phal chen): can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes/ /spu rnams kun nas
99a3(phal chen): sprul pa'i sprin rnams 'gyed/ /des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas/ /byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag /srid pa'i rgyud na sngon chad 'khor ba'i
99a4(phal chen): tshe| |rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa/ /de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so/ /rgyan rnams
99a5(phal chen): sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang / /byang chub shing ni yal ga rin chen 'phyang / /'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan/ /byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs
99a6(phal chen): rgyas| |phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog / sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul/ /de las chos nyid zhi
99a7(phal chen): sgra rab tu 'byung / /zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngon chad du/ /spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad/ /stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyi/ /rgyal ba de
99b1(phal chen): yi zhal bltar kun kyang deng / /zhing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thams cad nas/ /rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhags/ /mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'bebs shing / /
99b2(phal chen): thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta/ /gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo yi rnams/ /rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston/ /'gro kun yid bzhin chos
99b3(phal chen): kyi char 'bebs kyi/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo de la bltar yang deng / /dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/ /skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste/ /rgyal ba byang
99b4(phal chen): chub shing drung ston mdzad kyi/ /rgyal ba'i drung du smyur te 'dod bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho/ /'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang / /de yi chos
99b5(phal chen): nyid ji ltar ji 'dra de dag ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis
99b6(phal chen): yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams byang chub sems dpa' rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
99b7(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su
100a1(phal chen): shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
100a2(phal chen): bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ nam
100a3(phal chen): m kha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
100a4(phal chen): b a byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te bcom ldan 'das
100a5(phal chen): gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sprin
100a6(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyi
100a7(phal chen): ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
100b1(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin
100b2(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang / bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
100b3(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
100b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te
100b5(phal chen): me tog snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho
100b6(phal chen): phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten
100b7(phal chen): g yi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang
101a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan
101a2(phal chen): cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i
101a3(phal chen): snying po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
101a4(phal chen): pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
101a5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sna
101a6(phal chen): tshogs kyis snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas
101a7(phal chen): kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
101b1(phal chen): gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu sdug pa'i sgron mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su
101b2(phal chen): sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med
101b3(phal chen): khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyi dus gsum gyi sangs
101b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
101b5(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs
101b6(phal chen): su brten te in+d+ra nI la dang / 'dzam bu nA da dang / pad+ma rA ga sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten
101b7(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten
102a1(phal chen): g yi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas
102a2(phal chen): b yang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang
102a3(phal chen): na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / nor bu'i
102a4(phal chen): rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan par khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i
102a5(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
102a6(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i phreng bas yongs su
102a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan
102b1(phal chen): thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin
102b2(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
102b3(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang / dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
102b4(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na
102b5(phal chen): p a der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas
102b6(phal chen): te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten
102b7(phal chen): g yi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ut+pa la'i rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang
103a1(phal chen): c hub sems dpa' seng+ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan
103a2(phal chen): cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
103a3(phal chen): sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas
103a4(phal chen): pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar pa'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
103a5(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
103a6(phal chen): pa dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon
103a7(phal chen): gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod
103b1(phal chen): kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i
103b2(phal chen): shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
103b3(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can
103b4(phal chen): mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang dang / shar gyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi
103b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang / shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying
103b6(phal chen): p o na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi
103b7(phal chen): gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ seng+ge'i
104a1(phal chen): khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng+ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon
104a2(phal chen): pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can
104a3(phal chen): gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgro na ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
104a4(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri
104a5(phal chen): spos kyi me tog pad+mo'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang
104a6(phal chen): dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rgyan dang phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs
104a7(phal chen): bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i
104b1(phal chen): snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri spos dang rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po
104b2(phal chen): can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa seng+ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
104b3(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang / shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po
104b4(phal chen): che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su shar dang / lho'i
104b5(phal chen): phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho baiDUR+Ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med
104b6(phal chen): p ar snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron
104b7(phal chen): ma'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi
105a1(phal chen): rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi
105a2(phal chen): bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin
105a3(phal chen): po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang / sgra dbyangs
105a4(phal chen): rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i
105a5(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa
105a6(phal chen): dang / dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i
105a7(phal chen): snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gser gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
105b1(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
105b2(phal chen): pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
105b3(phal chen): der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar dang / lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung
105b4(phal chen): bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho dang / nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang
105b5(phal chen): ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng+ge ltar snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs
105b6(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
105b7(phal chen): s hin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
106a1(phal chen): byin gyis rlob cing / 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams
106a2(phal chen): cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin
106a3(phal chen): bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
106a4(phal chen): rin po che'i tshon rnams pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi
106a5(phal chen): yal ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha'
106a6(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma mang pos kun tu
106a7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan gyis khyab par byed pa'i
106b1(phal chen): gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
106b2(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang / nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri in+d+ra nI la yid du 'ong
106b3(phal chen): bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub dang / byang gi phyogs
106b4(phal chen): mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
106b5(phal chen): rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / gzi brjid mi zad
106b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ rin
106b7(phal chen): po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
107a1(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
107a2(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
107a3(phal chen): kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i yal ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi
107a4(phal chen): yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che baiDUR+Ya'i rigs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
107a5(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus
107a6(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam
107a7(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas
107b1(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
107b2(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
107b3(phal chen): brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang / byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten te seng+ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi
107b4(phal chen): zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig
107b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng+ge snang zhing 'bar ba na de bzhin gshegs
107b6(phal chen): p a chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros
107b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/ rin po che
108a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
108a2(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
108a3(phal chen): brjed pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i
108a4(phal chen): 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin
108a5(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya bar brjod pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus
108a6(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par
108a7(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od zer gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
108b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'og gi phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil
108b2(phal chen): mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nor bu
108b3(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
108b4(phal chen): pa yon tan dang grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus chags
108b5(phal chen): pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te/
108b6(phal chen): rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
108b7(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos
109a1(phal chen): thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
109a2(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing dang za ba rnam pa sna tshogs
109a3(phal chen): su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor
109a4(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i
109a5(phal chen): sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas
109a6(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog
109a7(phal chen): pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul
109b1(phal chen): s hin tu phra ba snyed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
109b2(phal chen): m tsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
109b3(phal chen): n am mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te seng+ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing skyil mo krung
109b4(phal chen): bcas te 'khod par gyur to/ /'khod pa'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad re re nas 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
109b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
109b6(phal chen): phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas rdul shin tu phra ba re
109b7(phal chen): re la yang zhing 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu 'jug par gyur to/ /zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
110a1(phal chen): mthong zhing shes par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed
110a2(phal chen): par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas
110a3(phal chen): yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo
110a4(phal chen): dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang /
110a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
110a6(phal chen): snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig
110a7(phal chen): re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas yang
110b1(phal chen): dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang
110b2(phal chen): dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas
110b3(phal chen): rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
110b4(phal chen): skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten
110b5(phal chen): g yi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba
110b6(phal chen): byed par gyur to/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bskul ba byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu
110b7(phal chen): rab tu bdal te zhing re re yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni/ rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /
111a1(phal chen): sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ yang dag par nges pa'i phung po rab tu 'god do/ /sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra
111a2(phal chen): ba snyed ni/ dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu 'god de/ /sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu
111a3(phal chen): 'god do/ /sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ dge ba'i bshes bsnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshigs la rab tu 'god do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab
111a4(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ sngon chad ma bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
111a5(phal chen): sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams
111a6(phal chen): cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang /
111a7(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do/ /zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra
111b1(phal chen): ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams
111b2(phal chen): cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to/ /'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste/ /ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang / /rgyal sras yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i/ /
111b3(phal chen): dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog /bskal pa rgya mtshor skye med spyad pa spyod/ /sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grol kyang / /yid la skye med zhum pa gang yang med/ /'di yi
111b4(phal chen): tshul la rgyal sra rab tu zhugs/ /chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing / /tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed/ /mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med/ /de dag chos nyid zhi
111b5(phal chen): ba rab tu sgrog / dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa/ /rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan dog tu/ /de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su spyod/ /de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di 'dra 'o/ /rgyal ba
111b6(phal chen): kun gyi 'khor du nyer phyin te/ /phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing / /rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can/ /de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o/ /'od zer sgo
111b7(phal chen): rnams re rer mtha' pa'i/ /bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug /spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste/ /rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab
112a1(phal chen): gnas shing / /zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang / /sems can rnams la 'jigs pa mi byed do/ /sa 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag gi 'o//
112a2(phal chen): tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus/ /de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul/ /skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang / /rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams kyi 'o//
112a3(phal chen): dus gsum bskal pa gang yong ma lus par/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston/ /sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med/ /de 'dra'i chos nyid chags med blos rtogs
112a4(phal chen): so| |bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams/ /'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus/ /rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te/ /'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog/ de
112a5(phal chen): n as bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul ba thob par bya ba'i phyir smin
112a6(phal chen): mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang ba phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer rin po che thams
112a7(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du brdal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byams klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te phyogs thams
112b1(phal chen): cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams
112b2(phal chen): c ad rab tu bskyod pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam
112b3(phal chen): p a dag tu rab tu spros nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin
112b4(phal chen): tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon
112b5(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang /
112b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te bcom ldan
112b7(phal chen): 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+mo chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa/ nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa/ lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs pa/
113a1(phal chen): ze ba'i phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa/ snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/ 'od kyi 'khor rnam par
113a2(phal chen): dag cing 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bas byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa ston pa'i
113a3(phal chen): sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon
113a4(phal chen): lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo / /pad+mo chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ byang
113a5(phal chen): c hub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ba ste bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs
113a6(phal chen): su bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te pad+mo chen po de'i snying po la 'dug go / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang ze
113a7(phal chen): ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa
113b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ zhing 'byams klas
113b2(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa dang ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la
113b3(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu sgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs
113b4(phal chen): pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
113b5(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe
113b6(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal/ /'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste/ /ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas/ /snying po byang chub de la
113b7(phal chen): rgyal ba bzhugs/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi/ /rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to/ /
114a1(phal chen): spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/ /byang chub snying por pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs/ /chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste/ /spu rnams kun la rnam par
114a2(phal chen): 'phrul pa ston/ /zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing / /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams/ kun kyang snying po
114a3(phal chen): byang chub drung du 'dod/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dod/ /chos dbyings 'byams klas
114a4(phal chen): rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs/ /zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston/ /chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas
114a5(phal chen): kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung / /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can/ /sangs rgyas chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas/ /zhing
114a6(phal chen): rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod/ /rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod/ /de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtsho zhugs/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba/ /de
114a7(phal chen): dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ /sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing / /de dag rnam
114b1(phal chen): 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi/ /lus kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston/ /sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob/ /bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang
114b2(phal chen): 'bebs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
114b3(phal chen): dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab/ /dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste/ /chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na/ /'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod/ /yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /
114b4(phal chen): 'dres pa med cing gnas pa med/ /sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/ /gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong / /chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas/ /chos rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ /
114b5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes/ /kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /sems can thams cad yid bzhin du/ /sems can mchog gi 'od rnams
114b6(phal chen): dang / /de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las/ /mi zad sangs rgyas sprul ba rnams/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing / /chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston/ /spu rnams re
114b7(phal chen): re kun nas kyang / /phyogs bcur 'od zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing / /gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas/ /sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu
115a1(phal chen): 'byung / /sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag /mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor/ /
115a2(phal chen): ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba/ /rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang
115a3(phal chen): zhing / /yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ /sku rnams re re kun las kyang / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas sems can mnyam phyung zhing / /rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu
115a4(phal chen): ston| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
115a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes/ /rgya chen gsung ni rang byung ba/ /zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog /'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par/ /
115a6(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing / /byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon/ /sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin//
115a7(phal chen): thams cad gzigs pas sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong / /mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas sprin/ /chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog /ye shes rnam
115b1(phal chen): rgyu'i tshul bzhin du/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug /'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med/ /'byung ba yod par rnam par bstan/ /gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ /chos rnams 'byung ba nam
115b2(phal chen): mkha' bzhin/ /'pho dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste/ /'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang / /sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung / /de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod/ /yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin
115b3(phal chen): med| |de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste/ /sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med/ /rgyal ba gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'o/ /'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin/ /bsam pa kun la rab tu byung / /yang dag sangs rgyas
115b4(phal chen): rnam kun tu/ /sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /snying po byang chub kun na snang / /'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na/ /zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes/ /
115b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la/ /yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /de dag yon tan zad pa med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od
115b6(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sar/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa//
115b7(phal chen): de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong / /ye shes lus kyis zhugs pa rnams/ /zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /bdag
116a1(phal chen): nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo / /gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung / /kun tu byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / /rnam par
116a2(phal chen): 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / /spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag zhing rnams thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong / /kun tu mnyam pa nyid
116a3(phal chen): gyur cing / /kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te/ /ye shes kun gyi rjes song nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa'i rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la
116a4(phal chen): rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spu dag tu/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu/ /byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi lus
116a5(phal chen): dag dang / /ming gis kun ni rab tu gnas/ /byang chub snying por rnam 'phrul dang / /byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag /skad cig sems kyis ston pa byed//
116a6(phal chen): zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad dang / /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam gzhag rnams/ /skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston/ /sangs rgyas zhing
116a7(phal chen): rnams thams cad na/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang / /mtha' ma rnyed par mi rung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i 'od zer snang
116b1(phal chen): ba'i mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /chos
116b2(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor/ /chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon du yog /'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dang / /phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa/ /
116b3(phal chen): thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor/ /de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul ba'o/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi ming dag gis/ /zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang / /chos
116b4(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ /rnam par snang mdzad byin rlabs kyis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag /rjod cing zhing rnams kun tu 'byung / /zhing kun rdul
116b5(phal chen): la sku yi rnams/ /thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs/ /'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med/ /'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /zhing kun rdul phran sbubs
116b6(phal chen): dag tu| |rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung / /sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrog /zhing rnams thams cad rdul snyed kyi/ /'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas/ /byang
116b7(phal chen): chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul/ /kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis/ /chos dbyings yongs su rab gsal te/ /'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du/ /gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong / /dus
117a1(phal chen): gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyi mtshan kyang sgrog /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /da ltar byung
117a2(phal chen): dang 'das pa dang / /sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa/ /de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu grag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi
117a3(phal chen): zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
117a4(phal chen): yi| |ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing / /ye shes rtogs pa rnyed pa rnams/ /de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung / /
117a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ched du brjod/ /skad cig re re'i sems kun la| /chos kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing brten/ /chos
117a6(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs/ /rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu/ /zhing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod/ /rdul rnams
117a7(phal chen): re re'i steng nas kyang / /chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung / /zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed/ /ye shes chags med spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul du/ /lus pa
117b1(phal chen): med par kun bkang zhing / /rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam spyod pas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrog
117b2(phal chen): pa| |chos dbyings rjes su shes pa rnams/ /dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par/ /sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu sgrog /dus rnams thams cad shes
117b3(phal chen): pas gsal/ /dbyangs kyis de dag sa la zhugs/ /sgra yi shes la rmongs pa med/ /sems can sgra yang spyod yul te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang / /rnam par 'phrul ba'i dbyangs
117b4(phal chen): shes so/ /sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing / /stobs kyi sa la rab gnas te/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad pas na/ /chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
117b5(phal chen): kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang la
117b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ /chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med/ /ye shes sa ni thob pa rnams/ /'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong / /shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can/ /byang chub sems
117b7(phal chen): dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi yang / /sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs/ /chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing / /lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste/ /zab mo'i
118a1(phal chen): chos rnams rtogs gyur nas/ /smon lam dag gis yang dag byung / /bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing / /ye shes sa la rnam par gnas/ /chos la rnam
118a2(phal chen): spyod khong du chud/ /spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag tu/ /chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na/ /rang bzhin lus ni
118a3(phal chen): rab tu mthong / /zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad du/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams/ /rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod/ /bdag mthong
118a4(phal chen): bas ni lus dang rdul/ /gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas/ /ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /zhing rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes/ /'jig rten kun gyi bsam mthun par/ /
118a5(phal chen): sems can kun la mngon sum du/ /lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing / /byang chub don du sems can 'dul/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis ni/ /byang chub sems dpar brjod
118a6(phal chen): pa ste| |gang gis mgon po mthong ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab/ /mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs pa'i/ /byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med de/ /chos dbyings rab tu gang
118a7(phal chen): byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang rgya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
118b1(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas/ /
118b2(phal chen): yon tan sprin ni rab tu brjod/ /yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/ /gzugs kyi sku yang rab ston cing / /chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug /dga' dang mos
118b3(phal chen): pa'i shugs rnams dang / /sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la/ /rab tu gnas shing de dag ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug /shes rab chung ngus chos 'di dag /kun
118b4(phal chen): nas shes par mi nus te/ /ye shes mig ni rab sbyangs shing / /'di yi tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/ /rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang / /chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang / /rab tu 'jug
118b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa yi/ /mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /chos rnams mtha' yas klong gi rnams/ /chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la ste/ /kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing / /chos kyi rgya
118b6(phal chen): mtsho kun la spyod/ /sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khod cing / /thams cad kun na rnam par mdzes/ /'ong ba med cing 'phos pa med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o/ /gzugs brnyan 'dra
118b7(phal chen): ba'i sku rnams ni/ /sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang / /mos pa ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams/ /de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / /spyod pa mang po sus
119a1(phal chen): sbyangs pa/ /de dag thams cad ba spu la'ang / /rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong / /lus kyi rnams ni re res kyang / /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab//
119a2(phal chen): 'khor lo kun na 'khor ba ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / /gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
119a3(phal chen): rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas/ /'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur/ /kha dog
119a4(phal chen): mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od/ /sems can bsam pa kun la 'phro/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi/ /snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te//
119a5(phal chen): 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes/ /thams cad rdul na'ang ma 'dres par/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams
119a6(phal chen): rab tu ston/ /zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i klong / /phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon/ /zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in+d+ra nI lar kun nas gnas/ /spyi'i tshugs dag dang
119a7(phal chen): snrel zhi dang / /pad+mo'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par/ /thug pa
119b1(phal chen): med par gram brdal ba/ /de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su/ /shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na/ /'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab/ /de dag kun tu
119b2(phal chen): chos nyid 'di/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston/ /tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor/ /gcig gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis/ /chos bstan pa ni kun tu
119b3(phal chen): 'byung / /sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod/ /dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis/ /mi zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams
119b4(phal chen): kun na yang / /rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'dra/ /snying po byang chub rnams na snang / /'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par snang
119b5(phal chen): ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gzugs
119b6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung / /chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel/ /mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'byung / /rdul rnams
119b7(phal chen): kun tu 'jug pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan/ /skad cig skad cig sems kun la/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar/ /rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ /zhing
120a1(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/ /rgya mtsho chos las byung ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa/ /'di yi yul la
120a2(phal chen): rnam par spyod/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la/ /gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa/ /de dang de rnams zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la lta/ /ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing //
120a3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni/ /mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste/ /smon lam kun gyis byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung / /chags pa med la rab tu zhugs/ /spyod pa gzhan dang
120a4(phal chen): gzhan dag gis/ /spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing / /ye shes spyod yul gyur pa rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sa
120a5(phal chen): gnon to/ /skad cig sems kyis zhing gi rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa/ /de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du/ /rdul gcig steng du rnam par spyod/ /zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad
120a6(phal chen): na| |zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa/ /chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa rnams/ /zhing gcig tu ni sdud pa byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros
