120a7(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du/ /de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung / /
120b1(phal chen): dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so/ /brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis/ /sems can kun gyi skad dag tu/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang / /chos rnams
120b2(phal chen): bstan pa rab tu 'byung / /zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas rnams par 'phrul mthong zhing / /sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang / /byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams
120b3(phal chen): re re'i steng nas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed/ /chos kyi sku ni tha dad min/ /nam mkha' bzhin te chags
120b4(phal chen): pa med| |gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs pa/ /mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /mig yor yul la mi gnas te/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med/ /mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas/ /ye
120b5(phal chen): shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te/ /gzung ba med cing 'byung ba med/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs/ /gzung du med las 'di bstan to/ /zhing rnams kun gyi
120b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams/ /de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs/ /ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis/ /spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong / /rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing //
120b7(phal chen): bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag /zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor/ /ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par/ /spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang / /de yi mtha' ni rnyed par
121a1(phal chen): d ka'| |ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa
121a2(phal chen): d e bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
121a3(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to/ /'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub
121a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston to/ / //shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
121a5(phal chen): mdo| sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang
121a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
121a7(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par
121b1(phal chen): btags pa'i tshogs/ nam mkha'i dbyings chags pa med cing rgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i klong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing shin tu brdal ba'i tshogs
121b2(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas
121b3(phal chen): yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong / phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya
121b4(phal chen): bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar bas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can/ zhing 'byams klas pa
121b5(phal chen): thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa/ bskal pa thams cad
121b6(phal chen): du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/ /ji
121b7(phal chen): l tar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i
122a1(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
122a2(phal chen): pa| phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i rigs su gtogs
122a3(phal chen): pa| shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang / phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs
122a4(phal chen): pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bas chos
122a5(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag
122a6(phal chen): t u rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs nas zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra
122a7(phal chen): ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
122b1(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de
122b2(phal chen): b zhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad nas de bzhin
122b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar byang chub sems
122b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhag pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod la phyogs
122b5(phal chen): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams
122b6(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad kyi
122b7(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyis phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par snang bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /
123a1(phal chen): chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par
123a2(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang / chos
123a3(phal chen): kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag
123a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la
123a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /
123a6(phal chen): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang 'du ba'i ye shes
123a7(phal chen): kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
123b1(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /sems can
123b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams
123b3(phal chen): cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom
123b4(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs
123b5(phal chen): na lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
123b6(phal chen): sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa/ 'od kyi
123b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa/ rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang
124a1(phal chen): pa| sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu
124a2(phal chen): phyung ba yang dag par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa/
124a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyangs te/ byang
124a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go / 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang
124a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag tu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs
124a6(phal chen): r gyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad
124a7(phal chen): du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum du mnyam
124b1(phal chen): pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems
124b2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par
124b3(phal chen): 'byed pa'i sgo dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus med par 'byams klas pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag
124b4(phal chen): nas langs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin las langs ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so sor re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten
124b5(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /
124b6(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
124b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
125a1(phal chen): p hyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
125a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul
125a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten khams rgya
125a4(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang
125a5(phal chen): rgya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig
125a6(phal chen): r ten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems
125a7(phal chen): dpa' rgya mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
125b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs pa tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grag par
125b2(phal chen): gyur te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
125b3(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi
125b4(phal chen): char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grem pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i
125b5(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgya thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab
125b6(phal chen): bo| |'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i
125b7(phal chen): sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi char
126a1(phal chen): mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid
126a2(phal chen): du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
126a3(phal chen): cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun na kun tu bzang po de/ /pad+mo yid du 'ong
126a4(phal chen): la rab tu 'dug pa mthong / /kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston byed pa/ /ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med do/ /lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de/ /
126a5(phal chen): sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs/ /ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul ba/ /thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa byed par rgya che sgrog/ ting 'dzin thams
126a6(phal chen): cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu/ /rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te/ /zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul
126a7(phal chen): ba mang po ston/ /zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin du/ /de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston/ /rnam par snang
126b1(phal chen): mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs/ /kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas/ /lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam
126b2(phal chen): par kun bkye zhing / /sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston/ /sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams/ /kun
126b3(phal chen): tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /tshad med thams cad lus
126b4(phal chen): kyi nang du kun chub cing / /dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya bstod/ /skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston/ /zhing rnams thams cad 'byams klas pa na rnam grags shing / /
126b5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dam pa bstan par rab tu snang / /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod/ /kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong / /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes
126b6(phal chen): stobs la zhugs/ /ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan/ /chos rnams 'byams klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs/ /rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngon chad spyad pa ston/ /de ltar
126b7(phal chen): zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul ba/ /phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon
127a1(phal chen): tan legs sgra 'byung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la lta
127a2(phal chen): zhing dbyangs kyi nga rog cig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste/ /smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu 'byung / /de bzhin nyid mnyam
127a3(phal chen): nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun la bzhugs med kyang / /kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang / /phyogs bcu
127a4(phal chen): kun tu yon tan grags pas khyab/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'/ /rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa/ /phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams/ /rdul sbubs kun
127a5(phal chen): tu de dag chud byas shing / /zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/ /rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyad pa dang / /chos rnams kun la spyod
127a6(phal chen): cing gnas pa rnams/ /rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang / /chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing / /zhing rnams 'byams klas kun la shin tu bzhugs/ /
127a7(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing / /rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs/ /chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang / /rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad/ /nam mkha'i
127b1(phal chen): dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing / /rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du med/ /rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin/ /'gro ba rgya
127b2(phal chen): mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing / /rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston/ /gang gi don du bskal pa rgya mtsho dag /mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa/ /de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams
127b3(phal chen): gang byas nas/ /thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod/ /zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / /stobs bcu rnams kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang / /sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar
127b4(phal chen): 'byung 'gyur ba/ /sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston/ /'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / /kun tu gzang po khyod la mngon sum gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
127b5(phal chen): gnang bar gyur pa yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de ring khyod kyis bskor/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par
127b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ste/ le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams
127b7(phal chen): cad la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/
128a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ dus rgya
128a2(phal chen): mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par
128a3(phal chen): bltas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
128a4(phal chen): cad 'du zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen
128a5(phal chen): pa ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs
128a6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
128a7(phal chen): rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang
128b1(phal chen): po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye
128b2(phal chen): shes ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes ni/ bsam
128b3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod
128b4(phal chen): pa rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs
128b5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
128b6(phal chen): po yongs su dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom
128b7(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po
129a1(phal chen): che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub
129a2(phal chen): pa ni| bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba
129a3(phal chen): mdzad pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
129a4(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni/ bsam gyis mi
129a5(phal chen): khyab bo| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par
129a6(phal chen): rgyu ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thub pa med pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa
129a7(phal chen): zil gyis mi non pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas
129b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' ba chen po'i ye shes rnam par
129b2(phal chen): dag pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrog pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin
129b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i
129b4(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de
129b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su bsab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya
129b6(phal chen): mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
129b7(phal chen): cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems
130a1(phal chen): dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
130a2(phal chen): bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa
130a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par
130a4(phal chen): bya ba dang / ye shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar
130a5(phal chen): bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod
130a6(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe
130a7(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab/ /mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab/ /sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang / /
130b1(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas/ /sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /sems
130b2(phal chen): can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes/ /sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab/ /srid pa'i gnas cad dad pa chung ba yis/ /sangs rgyas
130b3(phal chen): byang chub shes par mi nus so/ /gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems brtan cing / /dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag /sangs
130b4(phal chen): rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug / gang rnams sems dag g.yo med sgyu med cing / /snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang / dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni/ /'di dag
130b5(phal chen): thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sa dag dang / /chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la/ /gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa/ /de dag rgyal
130b6(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob/ /gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te/ /'di ni kun
130b7(phal chen): tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing / /'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na/ /kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'khor ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad
131a1(phal chen): yul dang mthu yin no/ /bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang / /rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs shing rnams kun/ /de dag spu rtse kun tu blta bar gyis/ /rgyal
131a2(phal chen): ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams/ /mtha' dang dbus med mngon par sgrub pa dang / /kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa/ /de dag mgon
131a3(phal chen): po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
131a4(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan
131a5(phal chen): pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/
131a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag
131a7(phal chen): par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal
131b1(phal chen): ba'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /kye
131b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs
131b3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
131b4(phal chen): mtsho thams cad ni/ rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo / /byung ngo / /'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de
131b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag
131b6(phal chen): par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
131b7(phal chen): zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems
132a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rgyu mthun pas mngon
132a2(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo'o/ /
132a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
132a4(phal chen): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo / /byung ngo / /'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'byung ba shin
132a5(phal chen): tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas/ /byin rlabs
132a6(phal chen): rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med/ /rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis bsam pa bzhin/ /
132a7(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing / /sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas/ /phyogs kun shing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' kun
132b1(phal chen): gyi rnam 'phrul dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos/ /smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing / /nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byams klas zhing 'byung ngo / /spyod pa rgya mtsho
132b2(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med rnams/ /spyod cing tshad med bde gshegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun spyod zhing / /bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer spyod/ /sems can
132b3(phal chen): bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /las kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung / /nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas/ /mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /zhing
132b4(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams/ /rin chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa/ /dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ /rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams sbyong / /chos dbyings
132b5(phal chen): rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag /rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston te/ /rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus kyang med/ /nam mkha'i
132b6(phal chen): dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ /snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/ /pad+mo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun/ /de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod/ /skad cig sems
132b7(phal chen): kyis dus gsum byung ba yi/ /zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus gsum zhing bstan pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad/ /tshul gyi khyad
133a1(phal chen): par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas/ /rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyis rnams/ /sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob/ /rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul
133a2(phal chen): kun rab tu mkhyen/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/
133a3(phal chen): 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas
133a4(phal chen): so| |'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi
133a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/
133a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byung pa lha ma yin dang mthu bo che lta bu'i lag na
133a7(phal chen): rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams
133b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i
133b2(phal chen): rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas ba shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang
133b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid
133b4(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i phyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri med pa/ /rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu
133b5(phal chen): kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos/ /'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rgyu yis dbyibs legs 'khor bar rnam pa snang / /de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams
133b6(phal chen): gzhi kun rab tu khyab/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ /snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas/ /'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba
133b7(phal chen): 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor/ /'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shin tu mgu byed pa'o/ /la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan/ /'od zer dra
134a1(phal chen): ba'i kun nas sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te/ /zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
134a2(phal chen): rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byams klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas/ /yangs shing rin chen mang ldan
134a3(phal chen): rgya che de dag byang chub sems dpas gang / /lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor/ /
134a4(phal chen): nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas/ /chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas/ /la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan
134a5(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag la gnas/ /kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams ring dang thung dang glang gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs
134a6(phal chen): te| |sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog par
134a7(phal chen): rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byams klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cod pa na rin chen 'khor los bzung bas
134b1(phal chen): dag par gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang / /rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul/ /chos kyi dbyings mnyam
134b2(phal chen): zhing rnams 'byams klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra/ /mig 'phrul rnam phye rnams dag dri med sems kyis shin tu bskyed pa ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas
134b3(phal chen): 'gyur 'di la snang / /las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ /skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byams klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams/ /zhing
134b4(phal chen): rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing / /de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod/ /chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya che ston/ /
134b5(phal chen): rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas/ /ji ltar rdul phran gcig la
134b6(phal chen): rnam sprul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o/ /rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra/ /snang
134b7(phal chen): ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag ni 'gro dang 'ong ba med/ /mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur/ /shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyangs las
135a1(phal chen): kyis yongs su bzung / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya
135a2(phal chen): mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ kun nas zlum po'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ kun nas gru bzhi'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la
135a3(phal chen): la ni| nam mkha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par phye ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ kun nas 'khyil pa'i dbyibs su 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
135a4(phal chen): mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go /
135a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs
135a6(phal chen): su 'dug go / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la
135a7(phal chen): la ni| mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
135b1(phal chen): d o| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
135b2(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos/ /rnam phye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyibs su gnas/ /dbyibs
135b3(phal chen): kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/ /phyogs rnams kun na zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang / /la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste/ /de dag la la phyogs na gru bzhir gnas/ /nor bu pad+mo
135b4(phal chen): 'khor lo yan lag brgyad/ /kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris/ /rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing / /gser las grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te/ /sgo mang
135b5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can/ /nam mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin/ /de
135b6(phal chen): dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par phye/ /de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes/ /zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang snang bas kun na gnas/ /
135b7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ /bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni/ /rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin
136a1(phal chen): te| |chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin/ /de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab/ /skra gcig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing / /thams cad rdul
136a2(phal chen): snyed sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas/ /kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /'khor rnams rgya mtsho chos rnams rab tu ston/ /rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i
136a3(phal chen): rnams| |thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan/ /kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par brtags/ /de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor/ /rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa//
136a4(phal chen): de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyi sprul pa ni/ /sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par brtags/ /sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams
136a5(phal chen): cad la| |sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dag / rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te/ /rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten
136a6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun dag ni/ gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams
136a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhun can no/ /'jig
136b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
136b2(phal chen): la ni| rdo rje'i gzhi mi shigs pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
136b3(phal chen): ni| rin po che'i mtshan nyid kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nyi ma'i nor bu'i dkyil
136b4(phal chen): 'khor gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ snang ba'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten
136b5(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ /rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ /dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi spos kyi lhun can no//
136b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi cod pan gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig
136b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rgyan thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gis dmigs pa thams cad
137a1(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyings kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi
137a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dpyangs rnam par
137a3(phal chen): dmigs pa'i lhun can no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzud par bya
137a4(phal chen): ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni/ /rin chen rang bzhin
137a5(phal chen): kun nas gnas/ /rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra/ /rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas/ /la la 'od zer rang bzhin te/ /dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung / /rgyan rnams kun gyi
137a6(phal chen): 'od zer gyis/ /sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med/ /la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te/ /dag cing 'od gsal zer la gnas/ /'od kyi sprin can sna tshogs 'od/ /byang chub sems
137a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni/ /mig yor lta bur gnas pa ste/ /brjod du med cing gzung du med/ /smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung / /la la nor bu mu tig
137b1(phal chen): rgyu| |snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar/ /mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag la/ /byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang / /rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing / /'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon khebs
137b2(phal chen): shing / /rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan/ /thams cad las kyis sprul pa yin/ /la la mtshan las byung ba ste/ /gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris/ /cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod/ /
137b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul/ /rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi/ /zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas/ /yul na mi gnas sgyu ma bzhin/ /yongs su rtog pas yang dag bskyed/ /
137b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas sku yi 'od zer gyi/ /nor bu sna tshogs kun tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sprul/ /la la kun tu bzang po yis/ /zhing rnams rgya
137b5(phal chen): mtsho shin tu sprul/ /nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang / /smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig
137b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
137b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smin pa
138a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i klong yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta
138a2(phal chen): ste| dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par
138a3(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / spos thams
138a4(phal chen): cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
138a5(phal chen): po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
138a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir
138a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya che mtha' yas te/ /rnam dag las kyi rnam pa
138b1(phal chen): sna tshogs gnas/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang / /sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas/ /kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams/ /rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs
138b2(phal chen): rnams kun tu 'byung / /rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin/ /sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams/ /de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i
138b3(phal chen): zhing na grag / sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams/ /de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin/ /'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag /rgyan gyi sprin rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin te/ /
138b4(phal chen): sems can de dag rnam smin ji 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog /dus gsum 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /rnam 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / /dmigs
138b5(phal chen): pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun/ /de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos/ /'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / /phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba ji snyed pa'i/ /bskal pa de dag rgyan mang
138b6(phal chen): yangs pa yang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang / /dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams/ /'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs/ /rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can
138b7(phal chen): rnam par 'dul/ /'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to/ /spos 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog klong / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang / /rtag par kun tu khyab par rab tu 'byung //
139a1(phal chen): 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par/ /thams cad rgya mtsho'i zhing
139a2(phal chen): 'di dbyings dag na/ /nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang / /rgyal sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byams klas rgyan gyi rnams/ /'gro ba'i grangs
139a3(phal chen): snyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na rab tu snang / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni/
139a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la brten pa'i dge ba'i
139a5(phal chen): rtsa bas skal ba mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
139a6(phal chen): kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang
139a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams
139b1(phal chen): cad kyi dbyings la rab tu dgod cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang / 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
139b2(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta
139b3(phal chen): ste| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho
139b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul
139b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna
139b6(phal chen): tshogs rgyan/ /smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung / /kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtsho dag /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed/ /sngon chad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen
139b7(phal chen): bkur cing / /skal ba mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te/ /snying rje byams pas 'gro yangs kun bzang zhing / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs/ /chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin
140a1(phal chen): sa kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs te/ /bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyangs shing / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung //
140a2(phal chen): mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing / /rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas/ /bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing / /rnam dag kha dog mtha'
140a3(phal chen): yas zhing rnams byung / /bsod nams sprin ni nam mkha' mnyam bskyed cing / /'gro ba kun phan bde don spyod spyad de/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas/ /'jig rten
140a4(phal chen): khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed tshad med pa'i/ /pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te/ /smon lam mthar phyin mi zad goms byams pas//
140a5(phal chen): dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung / /'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad med dang / /chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te/ /sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can
140a6(phal chen): sbyangs pas na/ /'di 'dra'i yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung / /rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing / /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas/ /'gro ba kun gyi sdug
140a7(phal chen): bsngal mtsho bskams pas/ /zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag par 'gyur/ /stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing / /'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnam sbyangs te/ /sangs rgyas rgya
140b1(phal chen): mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig
140b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sku chung ngur kun tu ston to/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ chos kyi dbyings
140b3(phal chen): thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sku tshe'i tshad mi ring ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la
140b4(phal chen): ni| sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo/ /sangs
140b5(phal chen): rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ tshul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
140b6(phal chen): byin gyis rlob bo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob bo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam
140b7(phal chen): par gdul ba byin gyis rlob ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes
141a1(phal chen): par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
141a2(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi/ /sgo nas zhing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu
141a3(phal chen): 'byung / /de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho 'o/ /sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i
141a4(phal chen): gzugs/ /gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu/ /sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos/ /sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston/ /la la bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis
141a5(phal chen): rlob| |chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo/ /rab tu mdzes par 'gro nang 'di na bzhugs/ /la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag /sbyong zhing 'byams klas phyogs bcu kun na yang / /
141a6(phal chen): la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad/ /smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go /la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan/ /sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ /
141a7(phal chen): la la theg pa gcig kyang rab ston te/ /rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so/ /rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad/ /la la skad
141b1(phal chen): cig gcig gis sems can rnams/ /rgya mtsho bsam yas byang chub don du 'dul/ /la la spu yi sgo nas bsam yas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sprul ba'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed/ /'gro ba kun tu de
141b2(phal chen): dag mngon bkang zhing / /thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad/ /la la sangs rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing / /zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog /bsam yas bskal par
141b3(phal chen): de dag gsung sgrog cing / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul/ /la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khod bcas pas/ /zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs
141b4(phal chen): su gang byas shing / /sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs/ /de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / /'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon
141b5(phal chen): sum ste| |sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
141b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa tshad med par byin
141b7(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho
142a1(phal chen): la la ni| bskal pa mtshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya
142a2(phal chen): mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa kun nas mu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni/ bskal pa
142a3(phal chen): brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
142a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su
142a5(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa tha dad de/ /sna tshogs tshul
142a6(phal chen): 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / /bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med/ /bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam/ /phyogs
142a7(phal chen): dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang / /bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung / /bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs
142b1(phal chen): dbyings snang / /byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan/ /la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug /la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung / /bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon
142b2(phal chen): mongs can/ /la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par gnas/ /bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung / /sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug /bskal pa zhing gi
142b3(phal chen): rdul snyed sngon chad spyod spyad pas/ /'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med/ /'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten
142b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i khams/ /bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs/ /bcom ldan 'das dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba/ /snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i mig la 'jug /
142b5(phal chen): bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung / /dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o/ /bskal pa la lar mi yi gtso bo mtha' yas 'byung / /bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams
142b6(phal chen): cad sa tshul zad mi shes/ /smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang bskal pa gcig tu 'dus/ /bskal pa la la gcig
142b7(phal chen): kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin/ /bskal pa la lar bskal pa kun gyi rkyen kyang
143a1(phal chen): 'byung / /ming gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yin/ /bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung / /bskal pa'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni
143a2(phal chen): rgyan yangs yin/ /zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag /zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med/ /skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs kyi bskal par 'gyur/ /
143a3(phal chen): 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par 'byung / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig
143a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug
143a5(phal chen): par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
143a6(phal chen): rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po gsog pa/ rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par
143a7(phal chen): gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang /
143b1(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig
143b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong bas bskal pa rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus
143b3(phal chen): pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag
143b4(phal chen): gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
143b5(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
143b6(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems
143b7(phal chen): d pa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
144a1(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos/ /chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas
144a2(phal chen): pa ltar| |de dag 'byung zhing 'jig par 'gyur bar yang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang / /sems can nyon mongs mi bzad ldan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs
144a3(phal chen): ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams/ /de dag bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams/ /kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin/ /sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan pa dang / /bsod
144a4(phal chen): nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can/ /rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams/ /de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na/
144a5(phal chen): bskal pa de ni rnam par dag par snang / /sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang / /de yi chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi/ /byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang / /
144a6(phal chen): de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas/ /de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po dag /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong / /bye ba mang po mtha' yas mi zad pa'i/ /byang chub
144a7(phal chen): sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang / /rgyan la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min/ /bskal pa tha dad tshul gyi bye phrag snang / /rdul rnams re re sbubs su dus kun tu/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi
144b1(phal chen): rdul dang mnyam pa yi/ /rgyal sras ji tshul 'dod pa de bzhin du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par gyur/ /gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skye 'gyur na/ /zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par
144b2(phal chen): 'gyur| |bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te/ /'di ni zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na/ /de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur/ /
144b3(phal chen): sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag /bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na/ /de tshe
144b4(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag / kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi
144b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
144b6(phal chen): rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
144b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang
145a1(phal chen): chub thams cad nas chos kyis dbyings kyis phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin
145a2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings
145a3(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang / mtshan gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten
145a4(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig
145a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams
145a6(phal chen): cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byams klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing rjod
145a7(phal chen): pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par
145b1(phal chen): b ya'o| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
145b2(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rdul gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/ /kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang / /
145b3(phal chen): gnod pa med cing 'dra ba gang yang med/ /'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos/ /rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin
145b4(phal chen): du| |zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang / /de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med/ /rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bres sbyangs
145b5(phal chen): te| |phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang / /de dag tha dad 'gyur ba nam yang med/ /rdul phran rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la/ /mi yi gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing / /'jig
145b6(phal chen): rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang / /gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i nyes pa med/ /rdul gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing / /
145b7(phal chen): bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang / /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang med/ /rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab/ /sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te/ /
146a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnams 'dul yang / /'byams klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med/ /rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod do/ /de dag 'khor
146a2(phal chen): lo'i tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing / /thabs dang mthu yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis/ /thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med/ /rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyis gsung / /'gro ba snod du
146a3(phal chen): gyur la de dag brjod byas te/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang / /de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams/ /thams cad
146a4(phal chen): rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la ltos/ /las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min/ /rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag /ji ltar byung
146a5(phal chen): ba de dag thams cad snang / /de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med/ /'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che
146a6(phal chen): zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bzhi pa'o// //bam po
146a7(phal chen): brgyad pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
146b1(phal chen): mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bskal pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te/ bskal pa re re zhing yang
146b2(phal chen): d e bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs
146b3(phal chen): su dag par byas so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
146b4(phal chen): kyis shin tu bzung ba ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/ gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rten
146b5(phal chen): to| |de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung
146b6(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba mnyam par rton pa zhes bya ba yod de/
146b7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil
147a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i
147a2(phal chen): seng+ge'i khri'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton
147a3(phal chen): to| |de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glang gi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi
147a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyim kun tu rgyu
147a5(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul
147a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma ni/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i
147a7(phal chen): gzhis rton to/ /spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad+mo chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang / ze ba sna tshogs
147b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba mngon par 'byung ste/ pad+mo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ rnam par dag pa/ shin tu brtan
147b2(phal chen): pa| rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa/ shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems
147b3(phal chen): d pa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir
147b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de/ /rin chen kun gyi
147b5(phal chen): snying po kha dog sna tshogs te/ /rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngon chad sangs rgyas kyi/ /drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med/ /rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams
147b6(phal chen): kun bkang zhing / /zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun btang nas/ /sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag /
147b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de/ /'od snang btang ba mkha' yi dkyil na gnas pa ni/ /rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste/ /nor bu kun brgyan sangs
148a1(phal chen): rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o/ /me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis mkha' yi dbyings la gnas/ /rgya
148a2(phal chen): mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong / /nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i
148a3(phal chen): rnams| |byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dong / /'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab
148a4(phal chen): par byed/ /rin chen kun gyis 'od zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed/ /sdug bsngal thams cad bcil zhing byang chub
148a5(phal chen): mchog la bgrod/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar/ /'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas rgyal ba
148a6(phal chen): 'gyed| |brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa 'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang / /'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas/ /sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa/ /
148a7(phal chen): 'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim byas nas/ /tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/ /'jig
148b1(phal chen): rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na/ /rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi/ /rin chen 'od bkye sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang / /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par 'phrul
