148b2(phal chen): ba'i zhing la ltos/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sangs byas te/ /smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang / /bzang po'i spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan
148b3(phal chen): pa'i| |dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung ba yin/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me
148b4(phal chen): tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u lnga pa'o// //kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
148b5(phal chen): gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i khor yug chen po ni/ nor bu rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste/ nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan+dan thams cad las grub pa/ nor
148b6(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa/ nor bu'i spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje
148b7(phal chen): sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba/ rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba/ rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ spos
149a1(phal chen): kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams
149a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi dbyings lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /de
149a3(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'khor yug gi rgyan dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
149a4(phal chen): par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa can/ /nor bu mang pos
149a5(phal chen): rnam dag mtha' yas mdog/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung / /dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ /nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang / /mu tig gsal
149a6(phal chen): ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas/ /kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brtan/ /snying po nor bu'i sprin can sna tshogs sra/ /'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs/ /'od 'phro
149a7(phal chen): dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tsher/ /khor yug dri ma med pa rnams par mdzes/ /nor bu rdo rjes shing tu sra shing brtan/ /mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'brul/ /mtshan
149b1(phal chen): ldan nor bu rin chen rnam bkod pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang / /spos chu'i sprin gyis kha dog mtha' yas te/ /rin chen tsan+dan me tog kun tu bkram/ /pad+mo sna tshogs
149b2(phal chen): gos kyis kun nas yog / rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan/ /nor bzang kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar/ /'od zer sprin gyi
149b3(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas/ /spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa'i gdugs 'chang ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang / /
149b4(phal chen): sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin/ /'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo/ /rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang / /nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing / /kun
149b5(phal chen): la rnam par snang mdzad sku gsal ba/ /gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang / /thams cad gzugs su sku rnams mtha' yas te/ /sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu med pa/ /
149b6(phal chen): thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing / /sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/ /thams cad rgyan las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad smon
149b7(phal chen): lam 'khor lo yis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa/ /de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
150a1(phal chen): las| 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u drug pa'o// //kye rgyal
150a2(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / de la khor yug chen po de'i nang ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni/ nor bu mang po'i brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar shin tu
150a3(phal chen): mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa/ rin po che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa/ rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can/ mi mtho ba mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam
150a4(phal chen): zhing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs
150a5(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa/ dmigs pa thams
150a6(phal chen): cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis sa gzhi mnyam par bdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi
150a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyis sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bres pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang / nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bu
150b1(phal chen): rnam par phye ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dag la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed do/ /de
150b2(phal chen): n as byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs
150b3(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam par dag mnyam/ /'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pa mi shigs sra/ /rin
150b4(phal chen): chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing / /rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang / /yid 'ong sa ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi/ /rin chen chu bo ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs/ /
150b5(phal chen): pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa/ /tsan+dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram/ /'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams/ /'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs su sprin kyang 'bar/ /sangs
150b6(phal chen): rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram/ /sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog /thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stug lding bas/ /mi zad yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug /zhing rnams
150b7(phal chen): thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog /rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun/ /shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston/ /sngon chad
151a1(phal chen): spyod pa ji 'dra spyod pa dag / kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang / /de yi rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs gting / /de yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang / /
151a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams/ /rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang / /me tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs/ /der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dong zhing / /
151a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog/ snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo/ /rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag /sa yi nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung / /sangs
151a4(phal chen): rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston/ /chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gengs/ /sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa/ /de
151a5(phal chen): dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi
151a6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i sa gzhi'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bdun pa'o// //kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil
151a7(phal chen): 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal
151b1(phal chen): po dang spos thams cad kyis klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang
151b2(phal chen): mchog tu snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs klong du 'khyil pa'o/ /tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi
151b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor dang / smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs
151b4(phal chen): kyi kha dog lta bur rab tu 'gyed pa'o/ /kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o/ /dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams
151b5(phal chen): mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o/ /phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng ba bcur rab tu bkye ba'o/ /mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor
151b6(phal chen): ba'o| |rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung
151b7(phal chen): gi bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bskor ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu thams cad kyi pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas
152a1(phal chen): bskor ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba'i gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad
152a2(phal chen): kyi me tog puN+Da rI ka dang / spos kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can
152a3(phal chen): gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ /tsan+dan dang / spos dang / nor bu mang po sgra thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil
152a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa/ chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / gos dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
152a5(phal chen): dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas kun nas
152a6(phal chen): bskor ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur
152a7(phal chen): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa steng de na spos kyi chu bo yis/ /rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de/ /gzhi rnams rin chen gos kyis kun
152b1(phal chen): bting ba/ /mi shigs rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes/ /spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang / /nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro stug sprin dang / /pad+mo rin chen phreng ba'ang kun nas bres/ /gzhi rnams dri
152b2(phal chen): med yid du 'ong ba'o| / spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste/ /rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog klong / /sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul
152b3(phal chen): ba rab tu sgrog / them skas phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan/ /gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan/ /stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad+mo yi/ /sprin stug dra ba rnam par bres pa ste/ /rin
152b4(phal chen): chen nor bu'i shing gi phreng ba dag/ rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar/ /'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang / /rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs su rab tu sgrog /spos
152b5(phal chen): chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste/ /me tog puN+Da rI kas kun nas bskor/ /spos dang 'od dang bdug spos 'od zer 'gyed/ /de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs/ /
152b6(phal chen): rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can/ /gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing / /rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag / thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog /pad+mo'i
152b7(phal chen): grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor/ /kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs rnams kun nas mu tig sprin bkye zhing / /grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan/ /
153a1(phal chen): dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste/ /rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyab kyi bar/ /rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i/ /rgya mtshos bzang zhing
153a2(phal chen): mdzes par rab tu brgyan/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa/ /shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa'ang / /de dag kun
153a3(phal chen): na rnam par 'phrul pa byed/ /spos chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab pa/ gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
153a4(phal chen): snyed kyis 'khor bar byas pa ste/ spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad+mo kha dog dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo
153a5(phal chen): dang | nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang
153a6(phal chen): bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs
153a7(phal chen): pa'o| |spyod pa'i 'od kyi klong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba/
153b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu yog par byas pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang pa dang / sangs
153b2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan
153b3(phal chen): gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o/ /spos kyi chu dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu
153b4(phal chen): bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di
153b5(phal chen): nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing //
153b6(phal chen): gzhi ni nor bu'i rdo rje pad+mos byas/ /rin chen mang po sil bus gzhi bkram zhing / /kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong / /them skas phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor/ /pad+mo'i phyang
153b7(phal chen): ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te/ /me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig phreng ba dang / /me tog lda ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres/ /nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni/ /rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog
154a1(phal chen): ltar 'bab/ /rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par bkod/ /sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod/ /de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs thams
154a2(phal chen): cad dba' klong ngo / /phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang / /spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo / /chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi/ /'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu
154a3(phal chen): 'byung / /me tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang / /rin chen kun gyi gzer du rab tu 'bar/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang / /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen
154a4(phal chen): rnams las snang / /rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong las/ /spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab/ /rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis/ /yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du
154a5(phal chen): sgra sgrog 'bab/ /rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud/ /sangs rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi
154a6(phal chen): sbyor ba dag / rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas/ /sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang / /chu bo thams cad dba' klong dag las kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar
154a7(phal chen): bdag / chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa/ /'byams klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang / /chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing / /nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa//
154b1(phal chen): mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang / /spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab
154b2(phal chen): tu brgyan pa ste/ chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog puN+Da rI ka'i phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ /chu klung gi
154b3(phal chen): bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o/ /shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams
154b4(phal chen): cad kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang / 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo / /shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin
154b5(phal chen): tu 'bar ba ste/ spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smon lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin
154b6(phal chen): gyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o/ /spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas
154b7(phal chen): pa'o| |nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o/ /gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o/ /
155a1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
155a2(phal chen): pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa chu klung
155a3(phal chen): gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung
155a4(phal chen): gi bar gyi rgyan yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
155a5(phal chen): smras so| |chu klung bar rnams shin tu rnam par dag / rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bres/ /yal ga me tog sprin rnams 'phyang lding ba'i/ /shing gi phreng bas kun nas
155a6(phal chen): mngon par khyab/ /shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas/ /rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung / /me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can/ /phyogs rnams kun
155a7(phal chen): sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed/ /gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste/ /me tog rnam bres rin chen 'bru dang ldan/ /kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste/ /rgyan dang sems can
155b1(phal chen): thams cad gzugs brnyan snang / /sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis/ /sa rnams thams cad kun nas rnam par gang / /phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin/ /rdul
155b2(phal chen): phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur bar snang / /nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas/ /mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod/ /kun na rgyal
155b3(phal chen): ba rnam par 'phrul ba snang / /'byams klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang / /sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing / /stobs bcu
155b4(phal chen): mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog / rin chen sna tshogs puN+Da rI ka yis/ /chu rnams kun rgyas sny-ing po nor bu spos/ /de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho'i rnams/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo
155b5(phal chen): sna tshogs 'byung / /dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang / /nor bu de dag 'bru yi nang na ste/ /'byung ba med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnam par
155b6(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i mthu/ /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du/ /rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis/ /de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang
155b7(phal chen): ba med| |rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang / /rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de/ /rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa yi rnams/ /bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong //
156a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye
156a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i
156a3(phal chen): yon tan dang / rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang
156a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing / yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i
156a5(phal chen): phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang / /rin chen rgyan can
156a6(phal chen): 'od zer gnas pa ste/ /stug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog /rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar/ /mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zad mi shes/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
156a7(phal chen): brnyan phyogs su rnam par snang / /zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /
156b1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog /rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod pa rnams/ /rin chen rnams la rtag par snang zhing grags/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od/ /rgyan
156b2(phal chen): rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang / /'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang / /sprul pa rnams kyi zhing gi rgya mtsho gang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra/
156b3(phal chen): de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /zhing rnams kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing / /
156b4(phal chen): ji snyed zhing du de dag kun rgyu ba/ /de dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang / /de ltar zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs/ /sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste/ /thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang
156b5(phal chen): snang / /'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te/ /smon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o/ /bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya
156b6(phal chen): mtsho can/ /de dag rdul phran kun la rang rang gis/ /rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du/ /bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su/ /de dag spyod
156b7(phal chen): yul thams cad mthong bas na/ /skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston/ /zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste/ /de dag mtha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med/ /smon lam
157a1(phal chen): stobs kyis kun tu gnas pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin
157a2(phal chen): tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi
157a3(phal chen): khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
157a4(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang
157a5(phal chen): gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/
157a6(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa
157a7(phal chen): dag ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa
157b1(phal chen): la la ni| rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ rin po che'i phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po
157b2(phal chen): can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa
157b3(phal chen): la la ni| me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig
157b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho klong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ byang chub
157b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas
157b6(phal chen): so| |'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
157b7(phal chen): 'byams klas pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du
158a1(phal chen): 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni/ ri rab kyi dbyings lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa
158a2(phal chen): la la ni/ chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ kun tu 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/
158a3(phal chen): kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ mig
158a4(phal chen): mang ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i
158a5(phal chen): dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ rdo'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ phyogs 'byams
158a6(phal chen): klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ khang pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ pad+mo'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /
158a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig
158b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams
158b2(phal chen): 'byams klas pa la la ni/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ dra ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams
158b3(phal chen): 'byams klas pa la la ni/ sgo kun nas yog pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa la la ni/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i
158b4(phal chen): sras dag / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /
158b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ phyogs thams cad kyi nor
158b6(phal chen): bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ rin po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun
158b7(phal chen): can no| |'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ byang chub sems
159a1(phal chen): dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul
159a2(phal chen): la la ni| rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ rin po che thams
159a3(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig
159a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams
159a5(phal chen): cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun
159a6(phal chen): can no| |'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ zhing gi rgyan thams
159a7(phal chen): cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams
159b1(phal chen): kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /
159b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
159b3(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa'i tshul gyis lus ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten
159b4(phal chen): g yi khams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa'i tshul gyis lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
159b5(phal chen): te| de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan par grub/ /dri med dri bral 'od 'gyed snying po can/ /nor bu pad+mo rgya mtsho kun la gnas/ /la la gang+gA'i rgya mtsho dag la
159b6(phal chen): gnas| |rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyi gzhi gnas shing / /dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang / /ri rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang / /zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs
159b7(phal chen): kun lta| |la la 'od lus me tog snying po can/ /nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu/ /la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus/ /nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shigs sra/ /'byams
160a1(phal chen): klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal/ /'od 'dra 'od 'phro me mar sprin gyi mdog /la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus/ /de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs
160a2(phal chen): mtha' yas 'byung / /la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra yi lus/ /spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra yi lus/ /la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra/ /la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon
160a3(phal chen): tan sgra| |zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pa/ /kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad rgyan gyi rnams/ /tshad med kun gyis phyogs kun
160a4(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te/ /yangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs par/ /phyogs bcu kun tu 'du bar snang ba yang / /'gro ba med cing
160a5(phal chen): 'jug pa yod pa min/ /tshul gcig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gengs/ /thams cad ma lus re rer rab tu 'dug/ de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te/ /gzhi med kun 'gengs
160a6(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus kyang med/ /zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyud la rnam 'phrul ba/ /sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang / /smon lam sgra ni rgya mtshor rab brjod cing / /zhing gi dbyings
160a7(phal chen): na sems can kun kyang 'dul/ /zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang / /bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpas gang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi mnyam stobs ston
160b1(phal chen): cing / /sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/
160b2(phal chen): le'u brgyad pa'o// //bam po dgu pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyings de na spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam
160b3(phal chen): pas rnam par phye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings kyi spos chu'i
160b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni/ ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/ de'i nang nas nor
160b5(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo chen po gzhi spos dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
160b6(phal chen): rgyan can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
160b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/
161a1(phal chen): dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de ni/ rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyun dang / 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin
161a2(phal chen): po che'i ze ba mang po la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang / rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu yog par gyur pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
161a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs
161a4(phal chen): pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
161a5(phal chen): spos sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che'i pad+mo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
161a6(phal chen): mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi
161a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
161b1(phal chen): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che'i me tog
161b2(phal chen): gi phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa nor bu'i 'khor lo gzi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can/ 'jig rten gyi khams
161b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes
161b4(phal chen): kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs kyi yid du 'ong ba zhes bya
161b5(phal chen): ba rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i 'od
161b6(phal chen): zer dang / rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ gcig tu dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul
161b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i
162a1(phal chen): s teng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor
162a2(phal chen): lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab
162a3(phal chen): tu gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad nas gra du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag
162a4(phal chen): pa| 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho
162a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba/
162a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che shi la'i rgyal mtshan gyi
162a7(phal chen): sa mtshams can/ rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas
162b1(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
162b2(phal chen): ' das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis
162b3(phal chen): bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog pad+mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang / rin po che'i
162b4(phal chen): kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang / mu tig dang / stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs
162b5(phal chen): dang / yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
162b6(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag
162b7(phal chen): pa nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo la 'dug cing / nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul
163a1(phal chen): gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po'i
163a2(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog
163a3(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi
163a4(phal chen): rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi
163a5(phal chen): dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa
163a6(phal chen): med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
163a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang /
163b1(phal chen): rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che seng+ge'i khri'i rgyan dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas
163b2(phal chen): zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ spos dang / nor bu dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
163b3(phal chen): pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi
163b4(phal chen): khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par
163b5(phal chen): dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shigs shing sra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas rin
163b6(phal chen): po che'i bla res kun nas yog ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
163b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/
164a1(phal chen): 'od zer gyi rgyan kun nas snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho me tog gi klong can gyi gang chen mtsho la
164a2(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa/ me tog 'khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba
164a3(phal chen): bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
164a4(phal chen): bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje'i gzhi'i sa mtshams can/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs
164a5(phal chen): can gyi shin tu gzung ba/ pad+mo'i dra ba la rab tu gnas pa kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ nam mkha' lha'i khang pa can gyis brgyan pa 'di yod de/ de na bcom ldan
164a6(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig
164a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas
164b1(phal chen): nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i sprin kha dog mtha'
164b2(phal chen): yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
164b3(phal chen): z hing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
164b4(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla re'i sa mtshams can/ me tog gi dra ba rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u
164b5(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
164b6(phal chen): so| |de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
164b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/
165a1(phal chen): spos dang 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs rus sbal gyi mgo ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
165a2(phal chen): par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan+dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten
165a3(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams
165a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dbyibs sems can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/
165a5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs yan lag brgyad du 'dug pa/ khor yug thams cad kyi
165a6(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog dang shing gi dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba
165a7(phal chen): bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
165b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sa mtshams can/ me tog gi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/
165b2(phal chen): dbyibs mu tig gi phreng ba bskyil ba lta bur 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
165b3(phal chen): pa dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten
165b4(phal chen): gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs
165b5(phal chen): shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab kyi rgya mtsho la rab
165b6(phal chen): tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog
165b7(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i stong 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
166a1(phal chen): t u phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro 'khyil ba'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
166a2(phal chen): kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i sa mtshams can/ dbyibs lha'i dbang po
166a3(phal chen): thams cad ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis
166a4(phal chen): kun nas yog pa/ nor bu sgron ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces
166a5(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa gzhan dang
166a6(phal chen): gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/ phyogs 'byams klas pa/ gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang
166a7(phal chen): gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par ma 'dres pa/
166b1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs gzhan can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
166b2(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
166b3(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
166b4(phal chen): 'khyil ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
166b5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
166b6(phal chen): kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten
166b7(phal chen): gyi khams phyogs 'byams klas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
167a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
167a2(phal chen): snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig
167a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
167a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sangs
167a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sa la mngon par lta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
167a6(phal chen): ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor
167a7(phal chen): ba ste| de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi
167b1(phal chen): k hams 'byams klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa rnam par gdags pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor
167b2(phal chen): b a'o| |'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i rnam par
167b3(phal chen): gdags pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor
167b4(phal chen): dang bcas pa/ chu klung gi glong dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go /spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba de dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na
167b5(phal chen): spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba spos dang /
167b6(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad+mo chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhun can
167b7(phal chen): yod do| |de dag thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
168a1(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ 'khor kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/
168a2(phal chen): pad+mo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig
168a3(phal chen): r ten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis
168a4(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa mu tig grong
168a5(phal chen): khyer dpal gyi dpal gyi seng+ge'i khri'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
168a6(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten
168a7(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i
168b1(phal chen): dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
168b2(phal chen): mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
168b3(phal chen): sa gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos chu
168b4(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi khang pa
168b5(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
168b6(phal chen): r gyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
168b7(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ spos dang rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od zer rdul dang bral ba/
169a1(phal chen): dang / spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba
169a2(phal chen): bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor
169a3(phal chen): ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis
169a4(phal chen): brtan par bsgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas
169a5(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu
169a6(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis
169a7(phal chen): bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil
169b1(phal chen): 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
169b2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings dri ma med pas yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
169b3(phal chen): zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che
169b4(phal chen): rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
169b5(phal chen): pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig
169b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon
169b7(phal chen): mongs pa rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dga' ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog
170a1(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170a2(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
170a3(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sil snyan thams cad
170a4(phal chen): kyi sgra dang / nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs
170a5(phal chen): so| |de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten
170a6(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar
170a7(phal chen): 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nyi ma'i sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
170b1(phal chen): kyi dpal shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyibs su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na
170b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam
170b3(phal chen): par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che
170b4(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
170b5(phal chen): s angs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum
170b6(phal chen): gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi ze ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/
170b7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad+mo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam
171a1(phal chen): par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin
171a2(phal chen): po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon
171a3(phal chen): mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ gling bzhi'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i
171a4(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
171a5(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi mdog ltar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi
171a6(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rdo rje'i pad+mo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ lha
171a7(phal chen): ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus mig yor gyi sprin rin po che'i cod pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de
171b1(phal chen): na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig
171b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams tsan+dan mchog ltar yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/
171b3(phal chen): gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i tsan+dan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ yan lag brgyad du rnam par bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi me tog mang
171b4(phal chen): po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi
171b5(phal chen): brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma
171b6(phal chen): med cing kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par
171b7(phal chen): dag pa| rin po che'i 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ spos chu'i klong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas
172a1(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten
172a2(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
172a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas
172a4(phal chen): dran pa'i klong gi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun
172a5(phal chen): tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rtul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan
172a6(phal chen): gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas
172a7(phal chen): nyon mongs pa/ gser gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng+ge'i khri pad+mo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas
172b1(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
172b2(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
172b3(phal chen): 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/
172b4(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron
172b5(phal chen): ma nam mkha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/
172b6(phal chen): de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so/ /de thams
172b7(phal chen): cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/
173a1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi snying po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rin po che dam pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
173a2(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad+mo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
173a3(phal chen): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan mthun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig
173a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
173a5(phal chen): gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig
173a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
173a7(phal chen): gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba
173b1(phal chen): bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad+mos rab tu brgyan pas shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros
173b2(phal chen): rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags
173b3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i 'od
173b4(phal chen): zer yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
173b5(phal chen): pa ye shes kyi me tog pad+mo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
173b6(phal chen): pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes
173b7(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba
174a1(phal chen): snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
174a2(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
174a3(phal chen): pa tshangs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de/ de
174a4(phal chen): na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glog gi phreng ba rab
174a5(phal chen): tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na
174a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i tshon gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba
174a7(phal chen): bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang yon tan yangs
174b1(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis kun tu brgyan pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
174b2(phal chen): pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
174b3(phal chen): 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad
174b4(phal chen): kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ pad+mo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
174b5(phal chen): dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la
174b6(phal chen): ' jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu
174b7(phal chen): gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'od na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba pad+mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
175a1(phal chen): gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i klong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che'i go cha dang mdzod spu'i dbyibs ltar
175a2(phal chen): 'dug pa/ dmigs pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs
175a3(phal chen): so| |de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
175a4(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa med pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor lo gzhi mnyam
175a5(phal chen): pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i
175a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten
175a7(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs
175b1(phal chen): thugs su chud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par
175b2(phal chen): rol pa'i ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyibs mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
175b3(phal chen): pa ye shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/
175b4(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i
175b5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na
175b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin tu 'byams klas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig
175b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
176a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
176a2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu rgyas pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i
176a3(phal chen): sgron ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
176a4(phal chen): cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de
176a5(phal chen): na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
176a6(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs
176a7(phal chen): pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kun tu rab tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab
176b1(phal chen): mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig
176b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i
176b3(phal chen): dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi pad+mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod
176b4(phal chen): kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bus
176b5(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan dang / spos
176b6(phal chen): dang | nor bu dang / shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
176b7(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu 'byung bas dpal chen po'i dra ba rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na
177a1(phal chen): spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in+d+ra nI las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang bas phyogs
177a2(phal chen): rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi pad+mo'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / gsung mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
177a3(phal chen): lhun can mngon par 'byung ba yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi
177a4(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la
177a5(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa/ zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
177a6(phal chen): pad+mo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
