205b6(phal chen): zhing byung ngo / /yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams/ /kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar/ /sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang / /klu yi rgyal po'i sprin gyi rnams/ /nam
205b7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/ /zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis/ /sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin
206a1(phal chen): sems can las rnams kyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo / /ji ltar ri mo'i gzugs kyi rnams/ /ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams
206a2(phal chen): 'di dag kun/ /sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin/ /sems can lus kyis rnam par dag /ji ltar sems kyis brtags pa ltar/ /de bzhin du ni zhing gi mtshams/ /thams cad las kyis rnam
206a3(phal chen): par bris/ /ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin/ /mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o/ /pad+mo'i dra ba'i phyi rol gyis/ /
206a4(phal chen): sems can zhing gi mtshams dag na/ /dbyibs dang kha dog gzhan dang gzhan/ /dri ma med pa sna tshogs snang / /pad+mo'i dra ba de dag la/ /zhing gi dra ba rab tu gnas/ /rgyan dang bstan pa sna
206a5(phal chen): tshogs te/ /sems can sna tshogs mang po'i gnas/ /zhing gi dbyings rnams la la ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par gnas/ /sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs las/ /chos nyid
206a6(phal chen): de dag nang na snang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag tu/ /zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/ /sems can bsam pas rab tu byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'khod/ /la la rnam
206a7(phal chen): dag nyon mongs can/ /zhing gi dbyings ni rnam par mang / /byang chub sems dpas rnam par sprul/ /rgya mtsho'i las las byung ba yin/ /zhing rnams la la'i 'od btang ba/ /rin chen rang
206b1(phal chen): bzhin dri ma med/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dri med dag /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams la la na/ /bskal pa'i me ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnams
206b2(phal chen): la ston| |zhing gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sra/ /klung gi phung po smon lam dang / /chu yi phung la rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rnam pa shin tu mang / /sems can las kyis bsags pa yin/ /zhing na
206b3(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan dag gi / zhing gi chos nyid snang la ltos/ /de dag 'byung ba gang yang med/ /de dag la ni 'jig pa'ang med/ /skad cig skad cig sems kun la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin
206b4(phal chen): rlabs kyis/ /zhing rnams rab tu 'byung ba rnams/ /shin tu dri med dag la ltos/ /zhing rnams la la sa yi dngos/ /sra bar de dag byung gyur cing / /snang ba med cing 'od kyang med/ /sdig pa'i las
206b5(phal chen): kyi gnas yin no/ /zhing rnams la la rdo rje'i dngos/ /kun nas nyon mongs 'jigs pa che/ /bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang / /bsod nams chung ba'i gnas kyang yin/ /zhing rnams la la lcags
206b6(phal chen): kyi dngos/ /la la zangs kyi dngos su gnas/ /sdig pa'i las kyis kun na gang / /ri dang brag gis mnyam pa med/ /'jig rten de na dmyal ba yi/ /sems can sdug bsngal skyabs med pa/ /mun pa
206b7(phal chen): rjes su rnyed gyur cing / /me lce rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar/ /'on kyang byol song skye gnas su/ /lus ni mngon par 'byung 'gyur te/ /bdag gi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba rab tu myong / /
207a1(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams na'ang snang / /skom dang bkres pas rab tu mnar/ /me yi ri yis gdungs pa yis/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/ /la
207a2(phal chen): la rin chen bdun las byung / /la la sna tshogs gzugs su gnas/ /dge ba'i las kyis byung ba ste/ /sna tshogs khyim gyis rab tu brgyan/ /mi dang lha rnams la la ni/ /mtho ris dag gi
207a3(phal chen): 'jig rten na/ /dge ba'i bsod nams 'bras bur ldan/ /dga' bde myong ba de dag ltos/ /spu yi rtse mo gcig la yang / /zhing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha
207a4(phal chen): dad de| |de dag 'dres pa gang yang med/ /rang rang so so'i las kyis na/ /sems can khams rnams bsam mi khyab/ /'du shes sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams/ /bde dang sdug bsngal
207a5(phal chen): nyams su myong / /zhing rnams la la mtha' yas 'od/ /sems can mang don kun nas gnas/ /yongs byung rdo rje ut+pal/ /sna tshogs rnam dag dri ma med/ /zhing rnams la la 'od
207a6(phal chen): zer dngos/ /'od kyi 'khor la kun nas gnas/ /tsan+dan gser las yongs su byung / /'od 'phro sprin gyi mdog dang mnyam/ /zhing rnams la la nyi zla'i dngos/ /spos kyi gos kyis
207a7(phal chen): kun nas g.yogs/ /la la pad+mo gcig la ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rgyas/ /la la mtshan gyi mdog dang 'od/ /zhing rnams rin chen dri ma med/ /mig 'phrul 'od
207b1(phal chen): kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'od zer dra bas snang bar byas/ /zhing rnams la la rdo rje dang / /pad+mo'i dngos su spos la gnas/ /la la nor bu'i 'od kyang yin/ /zhing rnams yongs su dag la ltos/ /me tog
207b2(phal chen): klong las la la byung / /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing la ltos/ /sangs rgyas sprul pas kun tu khyab/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dang mnyam/ /la la me tog shing rnams dang / /lo ma'i dkyil
207b3(phal chen): 'khor sna tshogs te/ /nor bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /zhing gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag /zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i dngos/ /snang ba bzang pos rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas sprul
207b4(phal chen): pa'i gsung yang yin/ /zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /rin chen cod pan sna tshogs dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang / /gdan las de bzhin la la byung / /'od dang
207b5(phal chen): sprul pa'ang rab tu 'gyed/ /tsan+dan phye ma sna tshogs dang / /mdzod spu rnam par snang ba'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer rnams/ /zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod/ /la la rgyan dang
207b6(phal chen): 'od gcig par/ /zhing rnams dri ma med par snang / /la la rkyen rnams thams cad kyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyan/ /la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi /rgyan gyis mngon par rab tu
207b7(phal chen): brgyan| |la la zhing rnams stong dag kyang / /rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rgyan mang bye ba yis/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/ /rgyan dang tshul rnams tha dad par/ /sna tshogs
208a1(phal chen): mig yor lta bur snang / /brjod du med pa'i zhing gi rnams/ /rgyan gcig la yang rab tu snang / /'od ni gzhan dang gzhan bkye ba/ /sangs rgyas smon lam mthu
208a2(phal chen): las byung / /smon lam rgya mtsho rnam mang bas/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs/ /de dag rgyan mang thams cad du/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho shin tu snang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis//
208a3(phal chen): zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun la dus gsum gyi/ /zhing gi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang / /zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa/ /kye ma rgyal sras khyed ni ltos/ /ma 'ongs pa yi zhing
208a4(phal chen): rnams kyang / /rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang / /ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /'das pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho yang / /zhing gcig nang na thams cad snang / /mig yor bzhin du
208a5(phal chen): sprul pa yin/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rnam sprul zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /zhing gi rgyud ni 'di la snang / /kun kyang nang na yod par gnas/ /zhing gi rdul gyi rtsa
208a6(phal chen): mo la| |sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/ /shong bar de dag kun na snang / /mig yor mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /la la rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dug /zhing brgya mang po de dag ltos//
208a7(phal chen): ri rab ri yi dbyibs 'dra dang / /'jig rten khams ni bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/ /mig yor dbyibs su gnas pa ste/ /sna tshogs shing gi dbyibs
208b1(phal chen): su gnas/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu khyab/ /zhing rnams nor bu'i 'khor lo'i dbyibs/ /la la pad+mo'i dbyibs su gnas/ /yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang / /sna tshogs kha dog dri ma
208b2(phal chen): med| |la la khri yi dbyibs lta bu/ /gra yi dbyibs dang khyad khyud de/ /la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug/ tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas/ /lha yi dbang po'i gtsug phud dbyibs/ /zla
208b3(phal chen): ba kham ltar la la gnas/ /nor bu'i ri yi dbyibs su 'khod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs kyang 'dra/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i klong lta bur/ /'jig rten khams rnams rab tu gnas//
208b4(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs/ /'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu/ /'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor te/ /mdzod spu'i spyi gtsug dbyibs
208b5(phal chen): lta bu| |la la mig gi tshul yang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu/ /la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug /'od 'phro ri yi dbyibs kyang 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang / /zhing
208b6(phal chen): rnams la la seng+ge'i dbyibs/ /nor bu'i go char mngon bsgrubs pa/ /gzugs dang dbyibs ni du ma ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas/ /zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang / /zhing gi
208b7(phal chen): dbyibs rnams mi zad pa/ /rab tu gnas pa byin rlabs dang / /sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung / /zhing rnams la la bskal pa tsam/ /la la bskal pa bcu pa ste/ /zhing rnams la la rdul
209a1(phal chen): mnyam pa'i/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin/ /la la bskal pa gcig la yang / /zhing rnams mang po 'byung bar snang / /tshad med grangs kyang med pa yi/ /'jig
209a2(phal chen): pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med/ /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas bcas/ /la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcig /la la sangs rgyas mang po'o/ /sangs rgyas
209a3(phal chen): med pa'i zhing rnams dang / /'jig rten gzhan gyi khams su yang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing / /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang / /byang
209a4(phal chen): chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang / /bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ston/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston/ /chos
209a5(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /'jig rten kun na tha mi dad/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams re re yang / /rgyal ba gcig ni skyed 'gyur te/ /lo grangs bye ba phrag stong du/ /chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston//
209a6(phal chen): sems can snod du ma gyur la/ /sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas ni/ /de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong / /sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams/ /zhing rnams
209a7(phal chen): re re dag tu yang / /sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye/ /rgyal ba so so de dag na/ /sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing / /chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas/ /sems
209b1(phal chen): can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad/ /zhing rnams la la 'od med de/ /mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che/ /reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra/ /blta na mi bzad skyi yang g.ya'/ /zhing rnams la la lha 'od can//
209b2(phal chen): la la khyim gyi 'od can te/ /la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan/ /zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od/ /shing gi 'od can dri ma med/ /gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba/ /de dag sems
209b3(phal chen): can dag las byung / /la la ri yi 'od can te/ /zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/ /la la mar me'i 'od can te/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung / /zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od/ /
209b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang / /zhing rnams la la pad+mo'i 'od/ /'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams la la me tog 'od/ /spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod/ /spos
209b5(phal chen): dang gdug pa'i 'od 'phro can/ /smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs/ /zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can/ /nor bu'i go cha'i 'od kyis gsal/ /sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis snang / /
209b6(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan/ /rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan/ /rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyis snang / /yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ /de dag na ni sdug bsngal med/ /thams cad rgyan
209b7(phal chen): gyi 'od can dang / /zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od/ /la la snying po byang chub 'od/ /'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon
210a1(phal chen): par yog / kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang / /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhing rnams la la 'jigs sgra can/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro
210a2(phal chen): can| |rtsub cing brlang ba'i sgra rnams dang / /yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog /dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams/ /mya ngan rgya
210a3(phal chen): mtsho'i zhing gi rnams/ /nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung / /la la dag na yid 'ong sgra/ /dga' bar byed cing ston 'doms pa/ /dge ba'i las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs/ /zhing
210a4(phal chen): gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog / la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs/ /gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang / /la la'i zhing na rab tu grags/ /zhing
210a5(phal chen): rnams la la sprin gyi sgra/ /rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang / /nor bu'i shing gi gzugs sgra dang / /rol mo'i sgra yis kun tu khyab/ /'od zer glong gi sgra rnams dang / /sangs
210a6(phal chen): rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dag dang / /'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang / /kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i/ /smon
210a7(phal chen): lam rgya mtsho'i nga ro dang / /spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan pa 'byung / /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang / /de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i
210b1(phal chen): sgra| |zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog / sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang / /tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin/ /chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang / /kha cig zhing na rab tu grag /kun tu
210b2(phal chen): bzang po smon lam gyi/ /sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin/ /bskal bar gnas shing rab tu sgrog /sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes/ /zhing gi dbyings rnams la la na/ /sangs rgyas rnam
210b3(phal chen): par sprul pa yi/ /sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba/ /de dag kun na rab tu grags/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
210b4(phal chen): rgyud rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dgu pa'o// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams
210b5(phal chen): k yi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig
210b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i pad+mo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par dag cing kun
210b7(phal chen): nas nyon mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan
211a1(phal chen): pa| rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ ri
211a2(phal chen): rab dang / grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par snang bas brgyan pa/ zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi longs spyod yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba/ rgyan gyi rnam
211a3(phal chen): pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog gi ri
211a4(phal chen): rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i
211a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ dpag
211a6(phal chen): tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa/ rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyan mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa/
211a7(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog puN+Da rI ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng gis kun nas bskor ba/ spos dang rin po che'i pad+mo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/
211b1(phal chen): rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyas pa/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas snang bar byas pa/
211b2(phal chen): grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal chen po'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po
211b3(phal chen): che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba/ mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor
211b4(phal chen): gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'ba' zhig las byas pa/ mchu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thags dang phru ma'i ra ba
211b5(phal chen): bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i 'obs spos chus gang ba/ rin po che'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / me tog puN+Da rI kas
211b6(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang / khang pa
211b7(phal chen): brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang / in+d+ra nI la'i dra ba dang / rdo rje'i pad+mo'i dra bas
212a1(phal chen): kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang / rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ spos dang
212a2(phal chen): phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis
212a3(phal chen): byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya
212a4(phal chen): stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs
212a5(phal chen): thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag
212a6(phal chen): ste| nam mkha' las rgyu ba/ mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa/ yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha stag go /de nas lho phyogs logs na lha'i grong khyer shing gi me
212a7(phal chen): tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo
212b1(phal chen): rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dabs chags su
212b2(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do/ /de dang 'dabs chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do/ /de
212b3(phal chen): dang 'dabs chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor
212b4(phal chen): ba'o| |grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar du ste/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i
212b5(phal chen): d kyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing yal ga stug cing rgya
212b6(phal chen): che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas pa/ spos dang / me mar rin po che thams
212b7(phal chen): cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkres pa/ rin po che'i 'od thur tu 'phro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i
213a1(phal chen): sprin gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu 'od zer mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos spras pa/ rol mo thams
213a2(phal chen): cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/ phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba yod
213a3(phal chen): de| de'i mdun du pad+mo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/ rtsa ba spos dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgya
213a4(phal chen): mtsho la zug pa/ chu ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba dang /
213a5(phal chen): spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
213a6(phal chen): bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo / /'jig
213a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de
213b1(phal chen): dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan
213b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs zhes bya ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so/ /kye rgyal
213b3(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i tshe nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin
213b4(phal chen): po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du
213b5(phal chen): gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin/ phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang / khang
213b6(phal chen): khyim gyi rdul thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
213b7(phal chen): yangs pa'i sgra dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam
214a1(phal chen): dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags
214a2(phal chen): pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to/ /de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar
214a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang / snying po
214a4(phal chen): byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi
214a5(phal chen): ri bo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying
214a6(phal chen): po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil
214a7(phal chen): gyis gnon pa/ mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la
214b1(phal chen): mngon du ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab
214b2(phal chen): par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de/ pad+mo chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab
214b3(phal chen): t u gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me
214b4(phal chen): t og rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun nas
214b5(phal chen): snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
214b6(phal chen): pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi
214b7(phal chen): s prin gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
215a1(phal chen): rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
215a2(phal chen): g shegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab
215a3(phal chen): tu zhi bar gyur/ sgrib pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom/ sems can thams cad kyi rnyog
215a4(phal chen): pa yang rnam par dag / dge ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag /mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i
215a5(phal chen): g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par bsal/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang
215a6(phal chen): rnam par dag / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams
215a7(phal chen): cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces
215b1(phal chen): bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal
215b2(phal chen): la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/ /de la bu gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod do/ /rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la
215b3(phal chen): sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par
215b4(phal chen): gyur to| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings
215b5(phal chen): la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ tshul yangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do/ /
215b6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje
215b7(phal chen): chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i dga' ba chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji lta
216a1(phal chen): ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par
216a2(phal chen): shes pa chen po khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do/ /
216a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do/ /
216a4(phal chen): de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad
216a5(phal chen): de smras pa/ nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams/ /mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin/ /snying po byang chub dri med la/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang / /bskal pa bye ba stong
216a6(phal chen): dag gis/ /mgon po 'jig rten byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams/ /rgyal ba kun ni rab tu snang / /ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni
216a7(phal chen): bsam mi khyab/ /gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang / /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag /'od 'phro'i sprin rnams rab bkye ba/ /'od zer sprin la zad mi shes/ /'jig
216b1(phal chen): rten 'di dag snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las/ /'od zer rnams ni dri med pa/ /sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus//
216b2(phal chen): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba/ /'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags/ /'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu/ /sangs rgyas yon tan
216b3(phal chen): rnam par brjod/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yis/ /sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi/ /'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes/ /byang chub
216b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams/ /rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing / /bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung / /phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs/ /snying po byang chub 'di la
216b5(phal chen): yang / /sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grags/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos/ /kun kyang sri zhu ldan gyur te/ /dga' zhing shin tu mos byas
216b6(phal chen): shing / /chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dong / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i
216b7(phal chen): tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grags par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po blta na dga'
217a1(phal chen): ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de
217a2(phal chen): smras pa| zhang blon rnams dang gzhon nu dang / /rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang / /tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du/ /yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig /grong khyer rnams ni
217a3(phal chen): kun tu yang / /rnga sgra dag gis myur du sgrogs/ /kun kyang mthun par lhan cig tu/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir dengs shig /srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang / /dge ba'i
217a4(phal chen): dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig / bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa/ /rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'deng / /grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis/ /rgyan rnams kun dang bla re bres/ /
217a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams/ /nor bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sgreng / /rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du bres par gyis/ /nam mkha' 'di las
217a6(phal chen): thams cad du/ /sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung / /lam gyi srang yang brgyan par gyis/ /rin chen char yang kun tu phob/ /bzhon pa rin chen bstad par gyis/ /rgyal ba
217a7(phal chen): blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob cig /rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab
217b1(phal chen): par gyis/ /spos dang pad+mo'i 'od kyi sprin/ /me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang / /se mo do dang phreng sprin rnams/ /gos kyi sprin gyi char phob cig /ri rab rnams dang spos
217b2(phal chen): kyi ri| |nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par gyis/ /dri med tsan+dan phye ma rnams/ /nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston/ /nor bu'i phreng dang me tog phreng / /rin chen phreng ba dri med dang / /
217b3(phal chen): rin chen sgron ma'i phreng ba rnams/ /nam mkha'i dbyings la sgrub par gyis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la/ /dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de/ /bu dang 'khor du
217b4(phal chen): bcas pa rnams/ /rgyal ba blta phyir kun 'dong ngo / /de nas rgyal bu blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu
217b5(phal chen): rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang / de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag
217b6(phal chen): k hrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas sde'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings su mngon par
217b7(phal chen): 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
218a1(phal chen): der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba
218a2(phal chen): n as kyang lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
218a3(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang
218a4(phal chen): lhan cig / gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa' bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun cu rtsa bdun
218a5(phal chen): dang lhan cig / dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po nas kyang dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig /lha ma yin gyi grong
218a6(phal chen): khyer 'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba / n
218a7(phal chen): am mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu
218b1(phal chen): rtsa dgu dang lhan cig / mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang mi 'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig /lto
218b2(phal chen): ' phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya
218b3(phal chen): stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig / tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco
218b4(phal chen): b rgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas bcom ldan
218b5(phal chen): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas
218b6(phal chen): s ems can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu
218b7(phal chen): 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste 'khor gyi
219a1(phal chen): d kyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor
219a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid
219a3(phal chen): c hen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i
219a4(phal chen): chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /
219a5(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs
219a6(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing
219a7(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug
219b1(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /
219b2(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang / mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang
219b3(phal chen): dbus med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab tu 'jug pa
219b4(phal chen): la mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par sgrub pa
219b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba
219b6(phal chen): thams cad mngon du bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
219b7(phal chen): thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi
220a1(phal chen): sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid
220a2(phal chen): 'di thos nas/ /bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes/ /des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa/ /rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong / /sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur/ /phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang
220a3(phal chen): mthong / /mtshan gyi rnam pa rnam dmigs dang / /gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de/ /sangs rgyas
220a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho mang mchod nas/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/ /sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag /rgyal chen yongs su kun btang zhing / /spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing
220a5(phal chen): yang shin tu sbyangs/ /snyan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho dang / /phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te/ /rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing / /zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs/ /
220a6(phal chen): zhing rnams so so re re la/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /byang chub spyod pa rab spyad de/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi/ /spyod pa
220a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho kun spyad nas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin/ /sangs
220b1(phal chen): rgyas ye shes 'od snang pas/ /sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong / /byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams/ /dri med 'od
220b2(phal chen): can kun kyang mthong / /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams/ /de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya/ /kye rgyal ba'i
220b3(phal chen): sras dag / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba
220b4(phal chen): dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni/ snang bar byed/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni/ rab
220b5(phal chen): tu rjod| byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni/ rab tu sgrog /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni/ shin tu rjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la
220b6(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni/ shin tu ston/ snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ rab tu rjod/ sangs
220b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa ni/ shin tu rjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni/ rab tu
221a1(phal chen): rjod| sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
221a2(phal chen): rgyan ni| rab tu ston/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam ni/ mngon par sgrub pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
221a3(phal chen): snyed byang chub tu sems bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du btsud do/ /de nas de bzhin
221a4(phal chen): gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ sems can kun la
221a5(phal chen): phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa/ /gzi brjid chen po legs so legs/ /bsod nams snying po grags pa che/ /snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non/ /chos kyi
221a6(phal chen): dbyings ni khyab byas shing / /bsod nams chen po sprin ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing / /
221a7(phal chen): nga yi ye shes ji lta bur/ /khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur/ /tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni/ /brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te/ /brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i
221b1(phal chen): rnams| |rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed/ /thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams/ /de la 'di 'drar rab tu
221b2(phal chen): 'gyur| |sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing / /'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bskal pa phyi ma'i
221b3(phal chen): mthar thug pas/ /rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang / /gang gi sems la skyo med pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun/ /khyod kyi
221b4(phal chen): smon lam dbang gis gsal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na/ /khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag /mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la/ /blo
221b5(phal chen): chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni/ /de dag tshul 'dir gnas par 'gyur/ /nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang / /gzi brjid chen po'i stobs chen gyis/ /sems can ri rab rdul mnyam
221b6(phal chen): pa| |byang chub yongs su smin par byas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing / /zhing gi rgya mtsho
221b7(phal chen): dag par byed/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bskal pa rgya chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste/ de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe
222a1(phal chen): yang bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin
222a2(phal chen): de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya
222a3(phal chen): ba 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po
222a4(phal chen): rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po
222a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo/ /ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi klong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo/ /kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par
222a6(phal chen): thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas
222a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa
222b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo/ /rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo//
222b2(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug
222b3(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu
222b4(phal chen): thob bo| |de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs
222b5(phal chen): thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu/ /'jig rten gtso bo'i dam pa shin tu dkon/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob/ /de
222b6(phal chen): dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong / /sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba/ /kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag /'od zer sprin gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab/ /
222b7(phal chen): kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed/ /'od kyis reg pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye/ /'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing / /sangs
223a1(phal chen): rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong / /sprul pa'i dra ba'i sprin rnams bsam mi khyab/ /rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing
223a2(phal chen): rnams kun kyang gang byas shing / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas/ /dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing / /mun
223a3(phal chen): nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po na/ /sems can rnams kyi sngon dge
223a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnams/ /thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos/ /sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba/ /mtha' dang
223a5(phal chen): dbus med yang dag rab tu byung / /de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul/ /tshad med rnam par 'phrul ba dag la ltos/ /
223a6(phal chen): zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs/ /de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med/ /sems can don du rnam pa mngon sangs rgyas/ /dga' zhing mos
223a7(phal chen): par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis/ /bde ba'i yid dang sri zhu spro ba yis/ /bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /byang
223b1(phal chen): chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing / /'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te/ /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing / /chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag
223b2(phal chen): 'gyur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te/ de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa
223b3(phal chen): rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to/ /de yang pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang / sems can bye ba phrag khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor
223b4(phal chen): cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mkha' thams cad du kun nas yog par byas te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / /'ongs pa de dag la
223b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten khams
223b6(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to/ /des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam pa dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so/ /ye shes kyi
223b7(phal chen): rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la
224a1(phal chen): yang zhugs par gyur to/ /zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil
224a2(phal chen): 'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rjes su
224a3(phal chen): rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to/ /'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs
224a4(phal chen): kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyis dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to/ /de
224a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to/ /smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa
224a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam pa dag par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang
224a7(phal chen): po rgyan gyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
224b1(phal chen): smon lam yang dag gnas/ /sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i/ /rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyi mi khyab 'gyur/ /ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung / /chos kyi
224b2(phal chen): dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong
224b3(phal chen): pa'i| |ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul/ /grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed/ /gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang / /so so
224b4(phal chen): yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang / /spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas/ /gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur//
224b5(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te/ /rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab/ /chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi
224b6(phal chen): khyab pa'i/ /bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas sprin la rnam pa blta bar gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs/ /nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug
224b7(phal chen): par gyis/ /sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi/ /spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs su/ /de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /zhing rnams re re sangs rgyas mang po ngas//
225a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas/ /sngon spyod de yi 'bras bu 'di yin te/ /'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos/ /las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya
225a2(phal chen): chen dang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang / /smon lam bsam yas go cha bgos pas na/ /'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rgya
225a3(phal chen): mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing / /zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas/ /bskal pa 'byams klas kun tu sbyangs byas shing / /rgyal pa'i yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar
225a4(phal chen): 'gyur| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas blta na dga' ba shin tu
225a5(phal chen): gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to/ /nags tshal chen po yal
225a6(phal chen): g a'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba
225a7(phal chen): gsum pa byung bar gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas 'khor thams cad dang / dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs
225b1(phal chen): dang / rin po che bdun dang / grong gi mi dang / yul mir bcas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non
225b2(phal chen): pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo/ /der de bzhin
225b3(phal chen): gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang
225b4(phal chen): bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par gyur to/ /de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
225b5(phal chen): rab thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
225b6(phal chen): g shegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te byang chub sems dpa' gzi
225b7(phal chen): brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can/ /byang chub mchog tu smon lam yid ldan pa/ /'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya
226a1(phal chen): mtsho yis/ /nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs/ /snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs
226a2(phal chen): pas| |'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa rnams/ /skyo med yid kyis spyod pa spyad
226a3(phal chen): pa dag / mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i/ /ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi/ /mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs
226a4(phal chen): bas na| |bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te/ /bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal pa rgya mtsho dag /mtha'
226a5(phal chen): dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes/ /mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas/ /de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams
226a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi/ /rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong / /de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang / /sngon chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong / /'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di
226a7(phal chen): la su zhugs shing / /ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing / /thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni zhing
226b1(phal chen): kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nas/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams/ /bslab nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong / /zhing rnams
226b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/ /khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te/ /smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur/ /'khor
226b3(phal chen): gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang / /khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis/ /byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /
226b4(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med zhing rnams 'byams klas bar/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang / /smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs
226b5(phal chen): par gyis/ /nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar
226b6(phal chen): gyur to| |rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas zhes bya bar phyin te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i
226b7(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to/ /de nas de lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das
227a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo / /der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
227a2(phal chen): pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra
227a3(phal chen): ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to/ /des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo/ /chos thams
227a4(phal chen): cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya
227a5(phal chen): ste| bcu pa'o/ / //bam po bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par
227a6(phal chen): snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni/ kun tu bzang po tshangs
227a7(phal chen): pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus
227b1(phal chen): kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ lhan cig spyod pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
227b2(phal chen): kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ gnas kyi dam pa mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar
227b3(phal chen): 'dug pa/ gling ni/ byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ grong rdal gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs
227b4(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba ni/ mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni/ kun nas smad du med pa/
227b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med
227b6(phal chen): pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
227b7(phal chen): phra ba snyed kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos
228a1(phal chen): kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad nyan thos kyi lus kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du lha dang /
228a2(phal chen): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
228a3(phal chen): yin pa'i lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/
228a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bar snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi gnas
228a5(phal chen): 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
228a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang
228a7(phal chen): ldan pa'o/ /snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya
228b1(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
228b2(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan
228b3(phal chen): pa'o| |nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bral dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
228b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa
228b5(phal chen): ste| 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
228b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de
228b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub kyi
229a1(phal chen): lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang
229a2(phal chen): chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams
229a3(phal chen): gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi
229a4(phal chen): khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
229a5(phal chen): ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
229a6(phal chen): pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
229a7(phal chen): pa thugs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin
229b1(phal chen): gshegs pa zhi ba rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgra dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin
229b2(phal chen): gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o/ /byang chub
229b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
229b4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can yongs su
229b5(phal chen): smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med
229b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog par khebs pa'o/ /
229b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
230a1(phal chen): dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi
230a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams
230a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khebs par bkang ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
230a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
230a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang
230a6(phal chen): ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o//
230a7(phal chen): kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
230b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te me tog ut+pa la de dag re re dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka de dag re re la yang me tog ut+pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka'i 'khor
230b2(phal chen): kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / me tog puN+Da rI ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
230b3(phal chen): ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
230b4(phal chen): kyi pad+mo'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par thon pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho
230b5(phal chen): zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam/ khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am/
230b6(phal chen): ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che ba'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ thag nye ba yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed
230b7(phal chen): yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin
231a1(phal chen): du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho la mig
231a2(phal chen): gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ba dang / khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig
231a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che
231a4(phal chen): ba'am| chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring pa'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang /
231a5(phal chen): gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
231a6(phal chen): yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
231a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
231b1(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no/ /chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan
231b2(phal chen): pa'o| |'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang
231b3(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de
231b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang
231b5(phal chen): chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
231b6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas
231b7(phal chen): so| |de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i dbyings rgya mtsho sa mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /
232a1(phal chen): de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag
232a2(phal chen): gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin
232a3(phal chen): po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so/ /de dag gi steng na me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba
232a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
232a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi tha gru dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin
232a6(phal chen): g shegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes
232a7(phal chen): bya'o| |de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten
232b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
232b2(phal chen): de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
232b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spo mngon par 'phags pa 'jig
232b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
232b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten gyi
232b6(phal chen): khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang
232b7(phal chen): m ed de| der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs par byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs
233a1(phal chen): su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ri
233a2(phal chen): rab de ni/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon
233a3(phal chen): tan ni| 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
233a4(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi
233a5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ lha'i rnam
233a6(phal chen): par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
233a7(phal chen): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
233b1(phal chen): gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
233b2(phal chen): rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
233b3(phal chen): khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa med do/ /skye gnas
233b4(phal chen): tha dad pa med do/ /theg pa tha dad pa med do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya
233b5(phal chen): zhe na| stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la ngan song gi 'jigs pa med/ theg pa dman par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/
233b6(phal chen): ser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i
233b7(phal chen): 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang
234a1(phal chen): med pas de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag
234a2(phal chen): la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams
234a3(phal chen): ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do/ /stong
234a4(phal chen): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dga'i lha'i dbyibs
234a5(phal chen): su 'dug pa/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gnyis
234a6(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
234a7(phal chen): shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang
234b1(phal chen): mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba rgya
234b2(phal chen): mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad phud dud
234b3(phal chen): du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa
234b4(phal chen): z hes bya ba de na sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu
234b5(phal chen): gnas pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
234b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong
234b7(phal chen): g sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
235a1(phal chen): snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de
235a2(phal chen): dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
235a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do/ /
235a4(phal chen): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug
235a5(phal chen): pa| stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
235a6(phal chen): kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de
235a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa 'di kun tu mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig
