235b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed
235b2(phal chen): skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul
235b3(phal chen): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
235b4(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar la rab tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa rgya
235b5(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
235b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /ci'i
235b7(phal chen): phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
236a1(phal chen): ba snyed dag na chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
236a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar
236a3(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig
236a4(phal chen): spyod pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yod do/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes
236a5(phal chen): bya ba de na gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
236a6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig
236a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan de dag re re la yang seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams
236b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i rgyan de dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
236b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'
236b3(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sgo mtha' yas pa nas mngon par sgrub pa'i mdo/ 'jig
236b4(phal chen): r ten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
236b5(phal chen): la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go / ci'i phyir na gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
236b6(phal chen): ' jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na
236b7(phal chen): 'di mchog tu bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi
237a1(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun
237a2(phal chen): tu spyod pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yod do/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
237a3(phal chen): gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
237a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho mang po
237a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
237a6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang
237a7(phal chen): c hub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba der sems can gang ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi dam par gyur pa 'jig rten
237b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mkhas pa/
237b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la
237b3(phal chen): byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya zhe na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing nam mkha'i rten ces bya ba/ byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
237b4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig skad cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par
237b5(phal chen): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni/ yon tan
237b6(phal chen): tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na
237b7(phal chen): yod do| |gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
238a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho
238a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi
238a3(phal chen): 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs
238a4(phal chen): pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing
238a5(phal chen): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
238a6(phal chen): kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/ /grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
238a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed las brtsigs pa sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang gi phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par
238b1(phal chen): phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho
238b2(phal chen): la rab tu zhugs pa/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba/ 'jig rten
238b3(phal chen): g yi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rgya mtsho'i khur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
238b4(phal chen): bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go / ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i
238b5(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ nam mkha'i
238b6(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma
238b7(phal chen): bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod
239a1(phal chen): mtha' yas pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gang byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na
239a2(phal chen): yod do| |grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba
239a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
239a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
239a5(phal chen): ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par rtog pa'i
239a6(phal chen): gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya
239a7(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
239b1(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
239b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
239b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
239b4(phal chen): snyed kun tu bres pa'o/ /dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par
239b5(phal chen): bsgrengs pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni/ rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzing de dag re
239b6(phal chen): re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin
239b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o/ /
240a1(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
240a2(phal chen): mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang / thugs dang / 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste/
240a3(phal chen): dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go /ci'i phyir
240a4(phal chen): na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa
240a5(phal chen): mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /de dag la
240a6(phal chen): sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi
240a7(phal chen): yon tan ni/ bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten
240b1(phal chen): gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do/ /khang
240b2(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o/ /
240b3(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs
240b4(phal chen): dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa
240b5(phal chen): d e dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
240b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten
240b7(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
241a1(phal chen): b sod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas
241a2(phal chen): mngon par grub pa sha stag go / ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams
241a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar
241a4(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni/ yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba na yon tan
241a5(phal chen): gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do/ /de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na byang chub sems
241a6(phal chen): d pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
241a7(phal chen): gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
241b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
241b2(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
241b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
241b4(phal chen): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas
241b5(phal chen): bskor cing bzhugs so/ /rnam par spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
241b6(phal chen): pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho
241b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig
242a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya
242a2(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
242a3(phal chen): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
242a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor dang / 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
242a5(phal chen): du shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las byang chub
242a6(phal chen): sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus
242a7(phal chen): r nam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
242b1(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo ra re la yang mig gi dbang po
242b2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad
242b3(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
242b4(phal chen): p hra ba snyed nas yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag re re la yang
242b5(phal chen): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
242b6(phal chen): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog
242b7(phal chen): p a rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod
243a1(phal chen): pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /ye
243a2(phal chen): s hes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang 'jig rten gyi
243a3(phal chen): k hams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
243a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang /
243a5(phal chen): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ ye
243a6(phal chen): shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par
243a7(phal chen): phye pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod
243b1(phal chen): pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nas mi dang
243b2(phal chen): mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas
243b3(phal chen): r gya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi
243b4(phal chen): rung ngo| / bam po bcu bzhi pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
243b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o/ /'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+mo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
243b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
243b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon to/ /de dag las yang dag par skul pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul
244a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyad cig yod pa dang / rang
244a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
244a3(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul ba byed do/ /shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad
244a4(phal chen): du'ang de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang
244a5(phal chen): c hen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang
244a6(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya
244a7(phal chen): mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems
244b1(phal chen): dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa de dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las byang
244b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re
244b3(phal chen): re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
244b4(phal chen): snyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
244b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
244b6(phal chen): p a'i ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba
244b7(phal chen): byas te| lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas de bzhin du mar me dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang
245a1(phal chen): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod
245a2(phal chen): de| lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas rang rang gi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul
245a3(phal chen): pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to/ /'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu pa byed do/ /
245a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
245a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad
245a6(phal chen): la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o/ /rnam par bkrol lo/ /gsal par mdzad do/ /yang dag par bstan to/ /de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
245a7(phal chen): k hams rgya mtsho 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying
245b1(phal chen): po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes te/ thog mar yang dge /bar du
245b2(phal chen): yang dge / tha mar yang dge ba'i chos/ don bzang po/ yi ge bzang po/ dag pa/ yongs su gsal ba/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems
245b3(phal chen): dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad
245b4(phal chen): de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par
245b5(phal chen): phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba
245b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
245b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
246a1(phal chen): ' jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
246a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi
246a3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de'i 'jig rten
246a4(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin
246a5(phal chen): du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs dang / ljags dang / sku dang / thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / sangs
246a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad sgrub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun
246a7(phal chen): tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings
246b1(phal chen): rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha' rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin
246b2(phal chen): po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi lam gyi rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
246b3(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lha ma rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam
246b4(phal chen): par bzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi klong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar
246b5(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la
246b6(phal chen): rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
246b7(phal chen): rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho
247a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
247a2(phal chen): snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa/ sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
247a3(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu
247a4(phal chen): thob pa| snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig
247a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
247a6(phal chen): b zang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra bar yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
247a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems bla
247b1(phal chen): na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
247b2(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can/ shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho
247b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
247b4(phal chen): snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos
247b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod pa
247b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
247b7(phal chen): snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su sgrub pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/
248a1(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa/ chos zab mo sna tshogs
248a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
248a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
248a4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
248a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
248a6(phal chen): mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
248a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang par gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par
248b1(phal chen): brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu byugs pa/ dga' ba'i
248b2(phal chen): rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
248b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo / /de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang
248b4(phal chen): snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo / /spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi
248b5(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos
248b6(phal chen): ' dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed cig yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho
248b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi
249a1(phal chen): yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa
249a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
249a3(phal chen): thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad
249a4(phal chen): kyang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad
249a5(phal chen): kyang bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang dang stan gcig la
249a6(phal chen): lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
249a7(phal chen): gang gi kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gis
249b1(phal chen): bang du 'khyud pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang dang chos
249b2(phal chen): k yi dbyings su brtan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na sems can gyi khams rgya
249b3(phal chen): m tsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
249b4(phal chen): rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'debs so/ /de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dag
249b5(phal chen): p ar bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho
249b6(phal chen): chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
249b7(phal chen): de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu sgrog pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
250a1(phal chen): yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags / de skad
250a2(phal chen): ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
250a3(phal chen): rgyal po chen po/ 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i
250a4(phal chen): phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing
250a5(phal chen): 'tsho skyong ngo / /chos ston to/ /yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i mthus byung
250a6(phal chen): ngo / /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
250a7(phal chen): ' das| bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam
250b1(phal chen): par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
250b2(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/
250b3(phal chen): de'i dus la dbab par shes na 'gro la rag ste/ rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ 'gro
250b4(phal chen): bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
250b5(phal chen): r labs ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
250b6(phal chen): rab tu gnas pas kyang bde blag tu bya bar sla ba ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po/ de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod
250b7(phal chen): de| de khyod kyis sngon chad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni/ gang na 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni/ nye 'am ring / de na da ltar de bzhin
251a1(phal chen): gshegs pa ni/ gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
251a2(phal chen): 'das| bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni/
251a3(phal chen): nye ba'am ring zhig na mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho gzhes shing chos ston pa ni/ smos su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi
251a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho de ni/ sngon chad bdag gis ma thos so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la
251a5(phal chen): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da
251a6(phal chen): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa legs par soms shig /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams
251a7(phal chen): c ad du yongs su gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig
251b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye'am ring ba dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes
251b2(phal chen): pa dang / chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs
251b3(phal chen): te| de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
251b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho de mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ring ba'am nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
251b5(phal chen): gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo / /
251b6(phal chen): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de lta bas na/
251b7(phal chen): rgyal po chen po/ rnam grangs des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
252a1(phal chen): g yi rlabs ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
252a2(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba'am/ de la phyag bya ba'am/ bsnyen bkur ba'am/ de las chos mnyan pa bde
252a3(phal chen): blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad
252a4(phal chen): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni/ thag ji srid
252a5(phal chen): cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa bstan du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems
252a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
252a7(phal chen): n ub phyogs logs kyi sa mtshams kyi mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams klong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
252b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par
252b2(phal chen): snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes so/ /chos kyang ston to/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ma
252b3(phal chen): shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /ji ga 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de de ltar nye na 'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta ci smos snyam nas de ltar rjes su
252b4(phal chen): bsam ste/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
252b5(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par bzhag go/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la rgyal po rin chen mang po la de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po
252b6(phal chen): ' jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rgya mtsho
252b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po
253a1(phal chen): la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sa mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyod
253a2(phal chen): pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil
253a3(phal chen): gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten
253a4(phal chen): g yi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi stobs
253a5(phal chen): dam pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so/ /dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya
253a6(phal chen): mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na/ lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu
253a7(phal chen): bzhag pa'am/ me long shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la ngo snang ba bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho de dag las langs te de bzhin
253b1(phal chen): gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs
253b2(phal chen): pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang /
253b3(phal chen): bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po de
253b4(phal chen): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i skyes bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
253b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig / de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
253b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang / bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re
253b7(phal chen): zhing ni| 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
254a1(phal chen): 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
254a2(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang lhan cig / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur
254a3(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re
254a4(phal chen): re zhing ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig /stong gi
254a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
254a6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling gcig gi 'khor los bsgyur brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
254a7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig / gling gcig gi 'khor los bsgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
254b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar chas pa
254b2(phal chen): dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad
254b3(phal chen): ces smras te/ lha'i zhal snga nas gsan du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin
254b4(phal chen): gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar
254b5(phal chen): gsol lo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i
254b6(phal chen): zhal blta ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa ni/ tshol bar mi byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par
254b7(phal chen): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ tshol bar mi byed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs
255a1(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni/ 'gro bar 'dod pa med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni/ 'gro bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te
255a2(phal chen): khyed sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/ 'dod
255a3(phal chen): chags dang bral ba la yang mi gnas/ sems can thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam/ byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug
255a4(phal chen): cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam/ yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi
255a5(phal chen): g.yo zhe na/ deng la rag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de
255a6(phal chen): dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya
255a7(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa byang
255b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la brten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa rang sangs
255b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig
255b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig
255b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
255b5(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo/ /de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten
255b6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal
255b7(phal chen): po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis/ /'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i chos ma
256a1(phal chen): thos| |sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur/ /da ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las sgrub pa yi/ /sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur/ /byang chub don
256a2(phal chen): du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su/ /rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi/ /sna yi khams kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste/ /rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur//
256a3(phal chen): lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob/ /des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur/ /lus kyis sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na/ /sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyi/ /yid
256a4(phal chen): kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho rnams/ /'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/
256a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig go/ //bam po bco lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+ha'i chos
256a6(phal chen): kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa mi gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi
256a7(phal chen): rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ bsgribs pa med pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrog pa med

263b1(phal chen): po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mi ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /
263b2(phal chen): rang bzhin 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rigs par spyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mig gi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya
263b3(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so/ /stobs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa dga' ba na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin
263b4(phal chen): gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa
263b5(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mi g.yo ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar rab
263b6(phal chen): tu shes so/ /mi bskyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mdzes pa'i spyan can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyal po'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug
263b7(phal chen): ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /drang srong 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ri rab dpal zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal
264a1(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i
264a2(phal chen): sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa sa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag
264a3(phal chen): pa'i mtha' zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rin po che'i gtsug phud ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran par bya ba zhes
264a4(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so/ /don gyi mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu bzhad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rigs gtsang ma zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'od
264a5(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /phyag shin tu 'phyang ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thog mar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
264a6(phal chen): dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa sa bzang po na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
264a7(phal chen): gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su 'og logs na gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu grub pa zhes bya
264b1(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so/ /seng+ge'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rno ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gser gyi 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad kyi bshes gnyen
264b2(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gsung mthar thug pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /phan pa mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mthar thug pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lha ma nor
264b3(phal chen): ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sbyin pa snyoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa na mtshan stong phrag
264b4(phal chen): bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su steng logs na gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin
264b5(phal chen): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la blo gros dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zhal dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bshes gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya
264b6(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so/ /thog mar gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /byin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /
264b7(phal chen): dgongs pa grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /me zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gcig la brten pa zhes bya bar rab tu
265a1(phal chen): s hes te| kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab
265a2(phal chen): tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ de dag
265a3(phal chen): kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis brjod de/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes
265a4(phal chen): so| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/
265a5(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'phags pa lhag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bsam
265a6(phal chen): pa grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyan pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /khyab par bzhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbang du gyur pa zhes bya bar
265a7(phal chen): rab tu shes so/ /sA la'i lhun zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rtsal chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo 'dra ba med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
265b1(phal chen): dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i
265b2(phal chen): sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin
265b3(phal chen): thugs su chud ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bsam pa grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na mtshan bye
265b4(phal chen): ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub phyogs
265b5(phal chen): logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dgongs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lam rnam par bsgoms pa
265b6(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /brtan pa'i gzhi zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /khyab cing grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /don mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bye
265b7(phal chen): brag la dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gzigs pa dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dul ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kun tu snyoms pa zhes
266a1(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dgyes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rdul

266a3(phal chen): 'dabs chags su byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la tsam pa ka'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu shes
266a4(phal chen): so| |nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mthu shin tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /byin gyi rlabs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /
266a5(phal chen): rang bzhin dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo gros kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zla ba shar ba zhes bya bar rab tu
266a6(phal chen): shes so| |rlung gi shugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sgra shin tu gsal ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
266a7(phal chen): rnam par byung ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
266b1(phal chen): 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la sdug bsngal dang

266b3(phal chen): shes so| |'das pa'i gter zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rin po che'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gnas med pa'i sa thugs
266b4(phal chen): su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dad pa'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thugs mi sgul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa

266b6(phal chen): mi mjed 'di dang 'dabs chags su shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bar

267a1(phal chen): gyi gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyu shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam par phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rab
267a2(phal chen): tu shes so/ /dam pa'i bsam gtan mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ran par gsung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo rgya mtsho zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal

269a7(phal chen): tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //

270a6(phal chen): dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
270a7(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /mi 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba mi brtan pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba ma byas pa
270b1(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /rtsod pa thams cad ces bya'o/ /rnam par phye ba nyam chung ba zhes bya'o/ /kun gzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /gsod pa'i mchog ces bya'o/ /'gul zhing g.yo ba zhes

270b3(phal chen): yod pa na las su rung ba zhes bya'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sreg pa zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /mtshams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /sdig
270b4(phal chen): pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /klad pa na ba zhes bya'o/ /sgal pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes
270b5(phal chen): bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na don ces bya'o/ /'jigs pa sel ba zhes bya'o/ /yon tan thob par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o/ /
270b6(phal chen): tshul bzang po zhes bya'o/ /'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o/ /sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /
270b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na sde'i dbang po
271a1(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /gyen du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /lta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /mtha' las grol ba
271a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su brtul ba zhes bya'o/ /mig dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phyogs su snang ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la
271a3(phal chen): sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam
271a4(phal chen): ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi
271a5(phal chen): khams lhag pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /skal pa gcod pa zhes bya'o/ /smad pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/ /nye bar bsrabs pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par sreg pa zhes bya'o/ /'khon
271a6(phal chen): du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /nad dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /dka' ba bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu brtags pa zhes bya'o/ /mos pa dang ldan
271a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na rab tu 'jig pa zhes
271b1(phal chen): bya'o| |gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /dgra dam pa zhes bya'o/ /bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /ro med pa zhes bya'o/ /kun skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o//
271b2(phal chen): bkur bar bya ba zhes bya'o/ /mun pa khyer ba zhes bya'o/ /blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba
271b3(phal chen): de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na don chen po zhes bya'o/ /phan pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /don gyi don ces bya'o/ /tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /rtog pa
271b4(phal chen): med pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog tu dul ba zhes bya'o/ /rtag tu mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /yan lag byas pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gang
271b5(phal chen): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na me'i tsha ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag dang po zhes bya'o/ /rnam par
271b6(phal chen): gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/ /mi 'phrog pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul zab mo zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /mi dma' ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/ /grol ba'i
271b7(phal chen): rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'grel ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming
272a1(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig
272a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'gyod pa zhes bya'o/ /kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /
272a3(phal chen): gcig la gcig ces bya'o/ /kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /ro gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /kun gzhi dang mngon sum zhes bya'o/ /log pa la gzhol
272a4(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o/ /log par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /grangs med pa zhes bya'o/ /dgra'i dpung zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i
272a5(phal chen): bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'dod chags pa zhes bya'o/ /smra ba zhes bya'o/ /mi dkar ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhi las skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /

273a2(phal chen): pa'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na nor bu sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'dud par

273b1(phal chen): bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /lam gyi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /thob par dka' ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /pha rol

274a1(phal chen): bya'o| |'bras bu la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /brjod du mi rung ba zhes bya'o/ /tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

275b2(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na shin tu g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ /rig pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros dang ring ba zhes bya'o/ /phongs

276b2(phal chen): ba chung ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na gnas
276b3(phal chen): zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /des shin tu rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /dge bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor ba

276b5(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na sa mtshams nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /sel ba dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o/ /skal pa
276b6(phal chen): mi mnyam pa'i don can ces bya'o/ /rang bzhin yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /yongs su rtog pa zad pa zhes bya'o/ /byin gyi rlabs kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya'o/ /
276b7(phal chen): dran pa dang bral zhes bya'o/ /rtag pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ /grol ba sgrub pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
277a1(phal chen): su dga' ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba
277a2(phal chen): bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che
277a3(phal chen): ba na 'tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ /rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o/ /nad dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /lus la yod pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /gsog pa'i sgo zhes bya'o//
277a4(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o/ /brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /rang la gzhog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba zhes bya'o| /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug
277a5(phal chen): bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'tshe ba zhes bya'o/ /mdud par 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu sbyor ba
277a6(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /a na sems pa zhes bya'o/ /rab rab byed pa zhes bya'o/ /'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par bral ba zhes bya'o/ /
277a7(phal chen): shin tu gdung ba zhes bya'o/ /kyi hud na zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams
277b1(phal chen): mi che ba na gsog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /'grogs ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /
277b2(phal chen): yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yan lag ces bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /ma chags pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgya ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par
277b3(phal chen): 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na bstan pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/ /
277b4(phal chen): bden pa la thug pa zhes bya'o/ /don rab tu chud pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin la gtugs pa zhes bya'o/ /lta ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /dran pas sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /'gro
277b5(phal chen): bas sdud pa zhes bya'o/ /skyob pa'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/ /'khrug pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
277b6(phal chen): mi che ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
277b7(phal chen): gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na bsam pa nub pa zhes bya'o/ /shin
278a1(phal chen): tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /g.yo sgyu che ba zhes bya'o/ /'brel pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /myang du mi rung ba
278a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o/ /skye gnas ma rung ba zhes bya'o/ /nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /dngo skam pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden
278a3(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gdul ba'i gzhi zhes bya'o/ /sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o/ /bcings pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su dran
278a4(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ /nges par rtog pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o/ /brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /sgo zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /
278a5(phal chen): bsgribs pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal pa'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gnas
278a6(phal chen): med pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phyir log pa zhes bya'o/ /mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /kun tu song ba zhes bya'o/ /chen po zhes bya'o/ /du ba med
278a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o/ /mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mchod pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags
278b1(phal chen): pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na mthong bas mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /spang ba'i don ces bya'o/ /rnam par sgom pa'i rgya zhes bya'o/ /mtshan nyid
278b2(phal chen): la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /rnyed par dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /de ma thag pa'i don ces bya'o/ /mkhas pas brtag pa zhes bya'o/ /'grogs pa'i don ces bya'o/ /mi g.yo ba la mngon du
278b3(phal chen): gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /khyad par gyi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
278b4(phal chen): ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di
278b5(phal chen): na ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med
278b6(phal chen): pa| bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
278b7(phal chen): dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
279a1(phal chen): ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /shar phyogs kyi
279a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
