279a3(phal chen): dang | de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi
279a4(phal chen): phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/
279a5(phal chen): kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
279a6(phal chen): pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su bstan pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi
279a7(phal chen): bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
279b1(phal chen): k hams thams cad shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs zhes bya ba nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan
279b2(phal chen): pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal gyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
279b3(phal chen): 'dul lo/ /kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs
279b4(phal chen): rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis
279b5(phal chen): nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /shar gyi lus
279b6(phal chen): 'phags gling bye ba phrag brgya dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'khor yug
279b7(phal chen): rdo rje'i ri bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
280a1(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
280a2(phal chen): pa bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /ri rab ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i khams kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
280a3(phal chen): lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i ris bye ba
280a4(phal chen): phrag brgya bstan to/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya
280a5(phal chen): bstan to/ /dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'bras bu chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'og min bye ba phrag brgya bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs
280a6(phal chen): su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar 'di ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub
280a7(phal chen): s ems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te bskor cing mdun du byas par snang ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag
280b1(phal chen): brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo / /de dag thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems
280b2(phal chen): dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang /
280b3(phal chen): nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i
280b4(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog
280b5(phal chen): dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog
280b6(phal chen): dang | shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba de
280b7(phal chen): dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa
281a1(phal chen): dang / rig byed sgrib pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed
281a2(phal chen): sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
281a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid
281a4(phal chen): brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing / /bral
281a5(phal chen): bar gyur te dngos med pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas su shes pa/ /de dag mig gi lam mi gnas/ /shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing / /dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la/
281a6(phal chen): rnam par bsgoms shing shes gyur pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te/ /sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la/ /gang gi sems
281a7(phal chen): ni mi g.yo ba/ /de dag mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams/ /mnyam pa'i sems su rab 'jug cing / /mi gnyis mngon gyur brtan pa rnams/
281b1(phal chen): de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /gang rnams bdag dang sangs rgyas dag/ rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing / /mi gnas len pa med pa rnams/ /de dag bde bar
281b2(phal chen): gshegs par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /rnam par shes dang sems dpa' dag /grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /de dag thub pa chen por
281b3(phal chen): 'gyur| |blta bar bya las 'das pa dang / /rnam par blta las de bzhin te/ /chos la gang dag rmongs med pa/ /de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur/ /gang gis shes rab chen po
281b4(phal chen): rnams| |sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing / /thams cad mthong yang skye med pa/ /de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la skye ba med/ /'jig pa'ang
281b5(phal chen): yod pa ma yin te/ /de ltar gang gis shes pa ni/ /de dag bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang gis gcig la mang shes shing / /mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs te/ /gnas kyi rnams
281b6(phal chen): su 'ang 'byung 'gyur pa/ /de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'das te shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu
281b7(phal chen): snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
282a1(phal chen): dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs dag
282a2(phal chen): tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar
282a3(phal chen): du yang bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs
282a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag
282a5(phal chen): gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu
282a6(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs
282a7(phal chen): rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang /
282b1(phal chen): bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi
282b2(phal chen): mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+ma'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog
282b3(phal chen): dang | shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag
282b4(phal chen): gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang /
282b5(phal chen): rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag
282b6(phal chen): go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin
282b7(phal chen): pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de
283a1(phal chen): bzhin thams cad na brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /gang gis 'gro ba shin tu gtses gyur cing / /srid
283a2(phal chen): pa'i gsal shing ldan par kun shes nas/ /rang 'byung kun mkhyen yon tan tshol ba rnams/ /de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di bzhin no/ /chos kyi rang bzhin gnas pa mthong
283a3(phal chen): gyur nas/ /mtha' gnyis gang gis rab tu spangs gyur cing / /ldog pa med cing dgos pa kun shes pa/ /de dag de yi 'khor lo mtshungs med bskor/ /gang rnams chos dang
283a4(phal chen): ldan pa'i bsam pa yis/ /'khor ba'i skye rgu kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bskal pa bsam yas rgya chen go gyon pa'i/ /drang srong chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o/ /gzhan gyis mi
283a5(phal chen): pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /bdud rnams thams cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams/ /byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs sgra 'byin pa/ /de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra
283a6(phal chen): 'di yin no/ /'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar/ /nyon mongs sel ba'i sems ni skad cig tu/ /thams cad shes pa su yi rgyud skyes pa/ /de dag rnam par 'phrul
283a7(phal chen): pa 'di dag ston/ /gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni rdung byed cing / /byang chub sems kyang srog chags thams cad la/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu shes byed pa/ /rang
283b1(phal chen): byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gdul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /zhing rnams bye ba gang dag spyod gyur cing / /nam yang dngos po dag la mos med pa/ /de dag
283b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul/ /gang rnams dga' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams ni shin tu rnam dag cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'dra
283b3(phal chen): rjes 'dra ba/ /de dag la ni smon lam 'di yang btab/ /sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing / /re re dag gi mnar med sdug bsngal ba/ /bskal pa dpag med smin
283b4(phal chen): par bya dad pa/ /de dag skyon med pham med shin tu gsung / /gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing / /sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu brtul zhugs te/ /mkhas pa bdag med
283b5(phal chen): rnam par su spyod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di 'thob bo/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
283b6(phal chen): brgya snang bar byas pa nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan
283b7(phal chen): ba nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to//
284a1(phal chen): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig pa
284a2(phal chen): de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
284a3(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang /
284a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang /
284a5(phal chen): bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog
284a6(phal chen): dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang /
284a7(phal chen): shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi
284b1(phal chen): zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi bskyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed
284b2(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go /byang
284b3(phal chen): c hub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag
284b4(phal chen): ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de
284b5(phal chen): bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /thugs su chud nas
284b6(phal chen): bsgrib pas med gzigs te/ /zil gyis ma non chags pa mi mnga' bar/ /skye rgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu snang / /la las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de/ /sku tsher skye bar gyur
284b7(phal chen): pa rab tu mthong / /skyes bu'i zla ba rnam par mdzes pa de/ /tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong / /yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing / /dgongs pa mkhyen
285a1(phal chen): bzhin shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /skye rgu'i seng+ge don yod gshegs pa de/ /la las 'chag cing gshegs par shin tu mthong / /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam
285a2(phal chen): par snang ba de/ /la las mthon mthing spyan du de bzhin mthong / /'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skye rgu rnams/ /gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong / /gzi
285a3(phal chen): brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis/ /seng+ge'i nga ror gsung ba de bzhin mthong / /zil gyis mi non ma log gsung mnga' ba/ /sku yi tha mar ston pa la las mthong / /
285a4(phal chen): bcings pa kun las rnam par grol ba de/ /la las khab nas 'byung bar rab tu mthong / /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams/ /gzigs shing zhi bder gzhol
285a5(phal chen): ba la las mthong / /la las byang chub snying po dam pa la/ /chos rnams thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas shing | /yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang / /mun pa
285a6(phal chen): rdul bsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong / /la las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang / /thugs rje chen po brnyes pa de mthong ngo / /la las skye rgu tshad med rnam 'dul
285a7(phal chen): bar| |skyes bu'i dam pa de ni de bzhin mthong / /la las gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa de/ /'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan mdzad de/ /rdzu 'phrul chags med
285b1(phal chen): bla med stobs mnga' ba/ /seng+ge'i nga ro sgrog par de bzhin mthong / /la las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /'jig rten sgron ma mya ngan 'das par mthong / /rnam par 'phrul pa
285b2(phal chen): de dag mthong nas kyang / /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten
285b3(phal chen): g yi khams stong snang bar byas pa nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi bar du snang bar byas te 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye
285b4(phal chen): ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad
285b5(phal chen): ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang
285b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu
285b7(phal chen): 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o/ /byang chub
286a1(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra
286a2(phal chen): ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa
286a3(phal chen): dag ste| 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang re re zhing byang chub
286a4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra pa snyed dang lhan cig phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub
286a5(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
286a6(phal chen): so so nas smra par gyur to/ /gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyi chos zab pa/ /zil gyis non pa brjod pa med pa rnams/ /gang la 'jig rten rtag tu mos 'gyur ba/ /de
286a7(phal chen): dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston/ /gal te bdag cag med du zin na ni/ /de yi spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med/ /rang byung rdul rnams shin tu bsal ba yi/ /
286b1(phal chen): bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung / /mkhyen dang rnam grol zhabs dang ldan pa rnams/ /mtshungs pa med la grangs kyang nam yang med/ /de ni 'jig rten 'di na la la
286b2(phal chen): dag / rgyu la thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro/ /gang la phung po med cing khams med de/ /skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi med pa/ /de yi grangs ni 'jig rten 'di brnyes pas/ /skyes
286b3(phal chen): bu seng+ge rnams su rab tu brjod/ /nang dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags pa rnams/ /de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid song ba ste/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog de bzhin med/ /gzhal du med
286b4(phal chen): pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag la ni g.yo pa nam yang med/ /snyems shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med/ /'jig rten thams cad rjes su rab tu mkhyen/ /mtha' yas 'dul
286b5(phal chen): ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/ /zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul dgyes pa rnams/ /rtse gcig gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin te/ /yid kyis gsog pa'ang de la gang yang med/ /'dir ni
286b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnams dag dang / /las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes mi ldog ste/ /bde
286b7(phal chen): gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs rnams bcu na ji ltar 'khod pa yi/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing / /sems can tshad med yongs su 'brel
287a1(phal chen): mdzad kyang / /skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gser gyi mchog/ de yang kun na rnam par kun na gnas/ /de
287a2(phal chen): dag bsam pa ci 'dra ji bzhin du/ /thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston/ /bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te
287a3(phal chen): shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ /gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ /
287a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang
287a5(phal chen): rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
287a6(phal chen): z hing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
287a7(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub
287b1(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
287b2(phal chen): cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog nas 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
287b3(phal chen): cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag
287b4(phal chen): go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba
287b5(phal chen): de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod
287b6(phal chen): de| de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te/ /snying rje la ni gang zhig sems gtong zhing / /'gro ba thams
287b7(phal chen): cad bskyab par zhugs pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dad bskyed cing / /gang gi sems ni nam yang mi ldog par/ /
288a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su mi gtong ba/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams gang du'ang 'jug pa yod med cing / /sangs rgyas
288a2(phal chen): yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa/ /shin tu brtan pa blo gdung med pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur par 'ong / /gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe/ /
288a3(phal chen): nyin mtshan rgyan du rjes su sems byed cing / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che ba sems spel ba/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal
288a4(phal chen): byas kyang / /gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rjes su slob mos pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /bdag gi rang bzhin
288a5(phal chen): yongs su gzhal byas shing / /thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang / /bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags bral ba'i sems/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar
288a6(phal chen): 'ong / /gzhan gyis bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing / /rtog dang rnam rtog thams cad rab spangs te/ /spyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang ldan gyur pa/ /de dag las ni
288a7(phal chen): 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'jal zhing / /sems can rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed de/ /blo chen rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur
288b1(phal chen): pa| |de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang gis zhing rnams rnam par bsam pa na/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes yongs med pa/ /thams cad grangs su nye bar
288b2(phal chen): 'gro ba ni/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams zhing ni rdul tu gzhig byas shing / /thams cad phyogs su bkang zhing bgrang byas te/ /de dag nang du rgyal
288b3(phal chen): ba 'dzud byed pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag
288b4(phal chen): brgya snang bar byas pa nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig
288b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs
288b6(phal chen): shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag
288b7(phal chen): brgya dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu
289a1(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam
289a2(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/
289a3(phal chen): 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya
289a4(phal chen): ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems
289a5(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/
289a6(phal chen): /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin
289a7(phal chen): thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu chen la/ /gang dag kha dog rigs kyis
289b1(phal chen): lta 'dod pa/ /mig nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs dag ni/ /'jig rten kun na'ang shes
289b2(phal chen): par nus pa med/ /gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsam byas kyang / /mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/ /chos rnams
289b3(phal chen): thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben/ /yan lag kun ldan blta na nyams med pa/ /bsam pa ji bzhin kun na rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min/ /gang
289b4(phal chen): rnams ci yang 'di yi tshul bshad de/ /ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phung po 'jig pa med/ /
289b5(phal chen): 'byung dang 'jig par spro ba mi mdzad de/ /mnga' brnyes mnga' sgyur rnam par gdon mi za/ /brjod du med pa rten pa rnam par spyod/ /lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab gyur cing //
289b6(phal chen): nang dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na/ /gnyis po bgrang du mi rung shes pa rnams/ /chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /gya nom snang zhing thugs
289b7(phal chen): gsal 'od mdzad pa/ /spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs/ /skye rgu'i don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad/ /
290a1(phal chen): gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu 'gyur/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs chud cing / /thams cad
290a2(phal chen): tshul dang 'dra bar rab tu 'gyur/ /sku med de la chags pa gang yang med/ /byon pa med cing bsags pa yod min yang / /kha dog mtha' yas rnam par dgod byas
290a3(phal chen): shing / /'gro ba sna tshogs lus su de dag snang / /'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin/ /sems ni rtogs pa nam yang ma yin te/ /bde gshegs
290a4(phal chen): ye shes de 'dra'i rang bzhin no/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang / /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs
290a5(phal chen): s u 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu snang bar byas nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar
290a6(phal chen): byas te| 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag
290a7(phal chen): gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /
290b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na
290b2(phal chen): yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang
290b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang
290b4(phal chen): po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi
290b5(phal chen): mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham
290b6(phal chen): ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang
290b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams
291a1(phal chen): cad thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang
291a2(phal chen): brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'jig rten rang byung de las mchog med pa/ /mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi
291a3(phal chen): rnams| |drang srong chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel pa/ /yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no/ /'du 'dzi med cing chags pa mi mnga' la/ /'du shes dngos med gnas pa
291a4(phal chen): med pa rnams/ /phun sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba/ /mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dka'/ /shin tu 'od snang dag par gyur pa rnams/ /brgal du glags
291a5(phal chen): med rnyog pa med pa'i rnams/ /g.yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi ye shes tshul 'di yin/ /lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med
291a6(phal chen): cing / /bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la/ /nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro'o/ /'jig rten dag na
291a7(phal chen): dmigs pa gang yod pa/ /de dag kun la bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste/ /gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang / /rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang
291b1(phal chen): med| |dngos po rab shes las rnams yod min par/ /the tshom thams cad rnam par spangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtogs pa'i tshe/ /sems la rnam par 'byed pa
291b2(phal chen): nam yang med/ /mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag/ byung med tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'brangs byas na/ /gcig kyang ma yin mang
291b3(phal chen): po'ang ma yin no/ /mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te/ /mang po rnams la gcig pa yod med do/ /mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgoms byas na/ /sangs rgyas yon
291b4(phal chen): tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang / /shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te/ /mi gnas sems la rtog pa med pa yi/ /
291b5(phal chen): dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams/ /de dag rang bzhin ji bzhin brtags byas na/ /gcig dang tha dad gyur pa
291b6(phal chen): ma yin te/ /de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
291b7(phal chen): bye ba snang bar byas nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan
292a1(phal chen): pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams
292a2(phal chen): cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
292a3(phal chen): d ang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan
292a4(phal chen): la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
292a5(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
292a6(phal chen): cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang
292a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi
292b1(phal chen): g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'
292b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
292b3(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba bde bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur
292b4(phal chen): to| |shes rab dpag med chos rnams mtha' yas pa/ /srid pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag /tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od/ /yon tan che mnga' 'di dag
292b5(phal chen): sbyor 'di'o/ /gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing / /dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te/ /dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa/ /bsam yas
292b6(phal chen): mos pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med/ /'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral/ /bsam gtan nang dad sems la bcings
292b7(phal chen): pa med| |chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin/ /rtogs mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams/ /mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag /thar pa'i lam
293a1(phal chen): brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa/ /zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /thams cad mkhyen pa chos
293a2(phal chen): dbyings bzhin rtogs shing / /bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnam 'dul ba/ /bde gshegs bsam gtan de dag sbyor 'di 'o/ /sangs rgyas don tshig rjes su
293a3(phal chen): shes bya zhing / /chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed/ /kun tu 'gro bar song bas rtsol spyod pa/ /rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di 'o/ /nam mkha'i
293a4(phal chen): dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnams/ /gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag /mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams/ /thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi
293a5(phal chen): sbyor 'di 'o/ /zla ba zla phyed nyin dang nub bgrang zhing / /lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa/ /'jig rten 'du zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / /grangs tshul sus rtogs
293a6(phal chen): de dag sbyor 'di 'o/ /zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med/ /de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa/ /bsam
293a7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di 'o/ /'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la/ /ngag gi lam gyis gang na rtog byed cing / /dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs gyur
293b1(phal chen): pa| |mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang
293b2(phal chen): bar byas nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas
293b3(phal chen): 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar
293b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du
293b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams
293b6(phal chen): cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes
293b7(phal chen): bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes
294a1(phal chen): bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
294a2(phal chen): cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna
294a3(phal chen): tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
294a4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don
294a5(phal chen): 'di nyid brjod do/ /gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'das dus gang gis sgrub
294a6(phal chen): dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing / /nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de/ /brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'dul zhes/ /seng+ge'i sgra
294a7(phal chen): sgrog de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang / /ma rig gzhol ba gti mug mang bsgribs 'jigs chen rnams/ /sems
294b1(phal chen): can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug / bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di/ /'jig rten sems can mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba/ /
294b2(phal chen): med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing / /bdag gis sems can kun bsgral de dag spyod yul
294b3(phal chen): 'di| |mngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing / /bdag rten sems can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa/ /de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog
294b4(phal chen): la bkod/ /bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de yi spyod yul lo/ /sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing / /ngan song gzhol pa 'dod chags zhe
294b5(phal chen): sdang gti mug gdungs/ /me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa/ /mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /lam gol lam ma
294b6(phal chen): yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing / /mun pa chen po rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas/ /snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos bstan ces/ /'di skad tshig brjod de dag
294b7(phal chen): spyod yul 'di yin no/ /srid pa'i mtshos g.yengs sems can rab tu mang ba dag /mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba/ /mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs
295a1(phal chen): bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing / /pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun/ /g.yang sa chen
295a2(phal chen): por lhung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas/ /snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su dgod cing / /dran par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /shin tu dog pa'i
295a3(phal chen): brtson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams/ /na dang rga bas gzir cing tsham gyis mnar ba dag /mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te/ /sems
295a4(phal chen): can kun 'grol sems dpa' de dag spyod yul 'di 'o/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tshom ma med/ /chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas
295a5(phal chen): bkang ste/ /'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi gzigs shing / /sems can kun la snyoms byed de yi spyod yul lo/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten
295a6(phal chen): gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so/ /
295a7(phal chen): /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang
295b1(phal chen): bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams
295b2(phal chen): tshad med pa snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
295b3(phal chen): khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so/ /'jig
295b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar bya so/ /gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang
295b5(phal chen): de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de
295b6(phal chen): bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
295b7(phal chen): stong snang bar byas nas nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /de ltar phyogs bcu shin tu rgyas par byas nas chos
296a1(phal chen): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas gzhung de bzhin
296a2(phal chen): du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan
296a3(phal chen): to| |ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par
296a4(phal chen): s nang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang
296a5(phal chen): ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ong par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
296a6(phal chen): kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi
296a7(phal chen): khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de
296b1(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed
296b2(phal chen): sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
296b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don
296b4(phal chen): 'di nyid brjod do/ /gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /bskal pa gzhal yas
296b5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la/ /gang gis mthong yang bsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i/ /lam du rab tu 'jug pa de na thams cad shes 'gyur
296b6(phal chen): te| |stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cing / /bgegs
296b7(phal chen): rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 'di la dgar spyad de/ /tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas/ /de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs
297a1(phal chen): chos nyid 'di ston to/ /dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyod pa'i 'bras bu mthun pa ste/ /'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yang byas
297a2(phal chen): shing / /de dag thams cad so sor mthun par ye shes rnams bsgoms pas/ /sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston/ /thog mar nyan 'dod
297a3(phal chen): bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas shing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtog bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa/ /bde gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom
297a4(phal chen): sems tshim byed/ /chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde gshegs thob par 'gyur/ /snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyal byed rtse gcig thub byed cing / /rgyal ba'i
297a5(phal chen): yon tan mos las mi ldog spyod pas tshim byed pa/ /dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba
297a6(phal chen): de dag lus 'di yin/ /bzang po'i spyod yul can gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa//
297a7(phal chen): ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tshom med pa rnams/ /stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod
297b1(phal chen): de la 'jug byed cing / /chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag rtogs/ /de ltar
297b2(phal chen): 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong / /mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med/ /rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong stobs bcu mi mthong
297b3(phal chen): ngo / /'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba min/ /shin tu chags med yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin/ /sems can las mang bsags pa de dag shin
297b4(phal chen): tu blta dka' ste/ /nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med/ /de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa/ /shes par dka' ba
297b5(phal chen): 'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes/ /nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang / /de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med/ /gcig
297b6(phal chen): cing gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med/ /de bzhin rang byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu 'gengs/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
297b7(phal chen): phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'
298a1(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag
298a2(phal chen): tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshang ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / skye ba mthun pa dang / skye ba
298a3(phal chen): mi mthun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang / sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos/ las kyis ni/ sems mi shes so/ /sems kyis ni/ las mi
298a4(phal chen): shes so| |tshor bas ni/ rnam par smin pa mi shes so/ /rnam par smin pas ni/ tshor ba mi shes so/ /sems kyis ni/ tshor ba mi shes so/ /tshor bas ni/ sems mi shes
298a5(phal chen): so| |rgyus ni/ rkyen mi shes so/ /rkyen gyis ni/ rgyu mi shes so/ /dngos pos ni/ dmigs pa mi shes so/ /dmigs pas ni/ dngos po mi shes so/ /de nas byang chub sems
298a6(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag/
298a7(phal chen): chos rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba/ /'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med/ /shin tu dngos po med pa ste/ /de phyir gzhan gyis
298b1(phal chen): gzhan dag gi / ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so/ /ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams/ /gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang / /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin
298b2(phal chen): no| |ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can/ /'od 'phro gzhan dang gzhan 'grogs kyang / /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rlung ni bsten tshul
298b3(phal chen): gyis| |gzhan dang gzhan du rab tu rgyu/ /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams/ /gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang //
298b4(phal chen): gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams/ /'di dag las ni rgyu 'khod kyang / /byed pa
298b5(phal chen): po ni gang yang med/ /'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis/ /'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang / /bstan par byas pa gang yang med/ /bstan pa la ni dngos med de/ /mig ni
298b6(phal chen): rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / /rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis/ /lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang / /med de yongs su brtags pa yin/ /gang zhig rang bzhin dngos med par/ /
298b7(phal chen): tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed pa/ /de yi mig la 'khrul pa med/ /chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /yang dag pa dang yang dag min/ /bden nam 'on te rdzun yang rung / /'jig
299a1(phal chen): rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun/ /tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di
299a2(phal chen): skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar 'bab
299a3(phal chen): pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang / lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba
299a4(phal chen): dang | sems ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems can 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal gyis byang chub
299a5(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing / /thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/ /'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du/ /'jam dpal
299a6(phal chen): bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /bdag gi lus la su gnas shes/ /gang gis nad ni rab shes pa/ /yang dag yod dam med pa'i don/ /des ni rab tu shes pa yin/ /lus
299a7(phal chen): kyi rnam par dgod pa ni/ /phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin/ /de bas shes pa de gnas la/ /nam yang chags par mi byed do/ /lus ni rnam par spyod pa yis/ /dngos po kun
299b1(phal chen): kyang rnam par bsgoms/ /sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/ /dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o/ /gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang / /gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur/ /ji ltar mgal
299b2(phal chen): me 'khor lo yi/ /thog ma tha ma 'khor ba bzhin/ /dngos po thams cad mi rtag par/ /skye bo gang rnams rtog pa yang / /lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir/ /'du shes phyir yang
299b3(phal chen): ldog par 'gyur/ /bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi/ /las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung / /rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung / /phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/ /sems ni dbang byed yin par
299b4(phal chen): bshad| |dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed/ /ji snyed 'jig rten brda yod pa/ /de dag thams cad brtags
299b5(phal chen): pa ste| |chos nyid de ni nam du yang / /chos gcig la yang mi gnas so/ /rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te/ /chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung / /de dag ldog par de bzhin
299b6(phal chen): 'gyur| |phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i
299b7(phal chen): sras dag/ sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang /
300a1(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / nang du byed pa dang / phyi rol tu byed pa dang / tshor ba
300a2(phal chen): chung ba dang / tshor ba che ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ba dang / tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la/ chos kyi dbyings la ni/ yid du 'ong ba'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di
300a3(phal chen): ci zhig |de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa/ /tshor ba de
300a4(phal chen): bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /'di la byed pa gang yang med/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /shin tu phyis pa'i me long la/ /de ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin/ /de la de ni de
300a5(phal chen): bzhin snang / /chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes kyang / /rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed/ /las kyi rang
300a6(phal chen): bzhin de bzhin no/ /sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig /lam po cher ni song 'dug ste/ /gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar
300a7(phal chen): shing gi 'khrul 'khor rnams/ /sna tshogs sgra mang rjod byed kyang / /de ni bdag dang bdag med min/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar bya rnams mang po yi/ /
300b1(phal chen): sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las/ /sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar ma yi mngal du yang / /bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/ /'on kyang dbang
300b2(phal chen): po sna tshogs 'gyur/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na/ /gshin rje'i ris gtogs sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag la ni 'ong ba med/ /las kyi
300b3(phal chen): rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang / /lha yi bu rnams kun ldan yang / /'pho bar snang ba gang yang med/ /de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar
300b4(phal chen): 'jig rten la la dag / bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur kyang / /de dag 'ong ba gang yang med/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis
300b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ 'on kyang chos tshad med
300b6(phal chen): pa yang yang dag par ston zhing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston/ sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston/ gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog /sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/
300b7(phal chen): bsam pa tshad med pa yang thugs su chud/ rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyong / rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis
301a1(phal chen): rlob| spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
301a2(phal chen): dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris/ /de ni mkhas pas rnam
301a3(phal chen): par shes/ /yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed/ /ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / /sems can mang po rab tu rgyu/ /de la gcig dang tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /
301a4(phal chen): ji ltar me ni gcig pu yang / /'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud/ /de la me lce tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu las/ /chu klung tshad
301a5(phal chen): med 'bab gyur kyang / /de la chu yi bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang / /'jig rten kun tu rgyu zhing ldang / /de la gcig dang tha
301a6(phal chen): dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /sprin chen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing / /sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed/ /de yi char la bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos
301a7(phal chen): nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / /myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston/ /sa la bye brag 'byed pa med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sgrib med nyi ma
301b1(phal chen): ni| |phyogs bcu kun na snang bar byed/ /de la 'od zer tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba ni/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu snang / /gnas nas
301b2(phal chen): 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag /stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi/ /de la lus ni bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos
301b3(phal chen): nyid de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs
301b4(phal chen): pa la dge ba bskyed par gcig kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang /
301b5(phal chen): dbang po sna tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang / yon tan sna tshogs dang / shes rab sna tshogs
301b6(phal chen): su'ang snang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang la'ang mi mnyam pa'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis
301b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang / /sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston/ /byams dang sdang bar sems pa med/ /
302a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang / /snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /rgyud kyi rnams
302a2(phal chen): la rnam par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni/ /rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed/ /ji ltar
302a3(phal chen): mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba mang po shes par byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed/ /ji ltar dri med me long la/ /ci 'dra'i
302a4(phal chen): gzugs rnams de bzhin snang / /de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du/ /sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'gyur/ /ji ltar dug phan sman gyi rnams/ /dug nad thams cad
302a5(phal chen): sos par byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni/ /'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed/ /mun pa dag kyang rnam
302a6(phal chen): par sel/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar zla ba dri med pa/ /kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te/ /sa ni rab tu snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /
302a7(phal chen): ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis/ /sa ri thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin du/ /srid gsum 'khor ba rnams kyang skyong / /'bar dang 'od 'phro
302b1(phal chen): bcas pa'i me/ /thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /'du byed thams cad sreg par byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis
302b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na/ thams cad lta ba mthun pas nyon mongs
302b3(phal chen): pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/ de dag kun la yang gzugs ni/ gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed
302b4(phal chen): rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang
302b5(phal chen): gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/ sred pa yang sred pa nyid du zad la/
302b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang phan par byed pa'am/ gnod par byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis byang chub sems
302b7(phal chen): dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis gang dris pa/ /la la myur du rnam grol zhing / /la la dka' bar 'grol 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas sras po
303a1(phal chen): bdag la nyon/ /'di ni dpag tu med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin/ /dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis/ /rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin/ /
303a2(phal chen): ji ltar rtsa dang shing gsher ba/ /mer bcug shin tu nyam chung zhing / /ring por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar gtsubs nas gtsubs pa'i
303a3(phal chen): tshe| |ma byung ba ni myur bteg na/ /myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ /nyi ma'i nor bu lci ba la/ /yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni/ /de la me
303a4(phal chen): 'byung mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ /byis pa rnams ni mig btsums shing / /mi mthong ci phyir zhes smra ba/ /de bzhin le lo bstan
303a5(phal chen): pa la| |rkang lag med par skyes pa'i mi/ /ji ltar smyig mnga' kha bug gis/ /sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin/ /de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar byis pas rgya mtsho las//
303a6(phal chen): yang dang yang du bcus byas shing / /skam par la la 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar bum pa chus bkang bzhin/ /bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe/ /la la
303a7(phal chen): gsad par 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi/ /nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i/ /gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba/ /de bzhin
303b1(phal chen): le lo bstan pa la/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa
303b2(phal chen): thams cad skem pa 'di nyid blangs kyang sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chab pa'i dbang
303b3(phal chen): du 'gro/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro /ser sna'i dbang du 'gro /sgyu'i dbang du 'gro zhing / g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la/ chos de dag kyang sems med par gzung du yang
303b4(phal chen): mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdags pa kun gyi rnam pa kun tu sems kyi rgyud du zad na/ de ji lta bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
303b5(phal chen): dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi don du dris pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras po nga las nyon/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/ /thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo/ /la
303b6(phal chen): la stobs med chu klung gis/ /nad kyis khyer bar gyur pa dag /skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin/ /ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la/ /zas dang
303b7(phal chen): skom dag sbyin byas kyang / /bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar/ /de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o/ /ji ltar sman pa la la zhig /sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du/ /
304a1(phal chen): lto yi nad kyis shi ba bzhin/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu/ /rin chen mang po bgrang byed kyang / /nam phyed tsam yang
304a2(phal chen): mi 'thob pa/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang / /zas dang skom dag mi bdog pa/ /de bzhin chos la ma
304a3(phal chen): bsgoms pa'o/ /ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi/ /sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig /gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar dmus long ri
304a4(phal chen): mo mkhan/ /tshong dus dbus su 'brir 'jug kyang / /bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig /skye bo mang po
304a5(phal chen): sgrol byed kyang / /bdag nyid de nang 'chi 'gyur ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang / /phun sum tshogs pa kun brjod cing / /bdag gis
304a6(phal chen): thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras
304a7(phal chen): so| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni/ sbyin
304b1(phal chen): pa brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni/ tshul khrims/ la la la ni/ bzod pa/ la la la ni/ brtson 'grus/ la la la ni/ bsam gtan/ la la la ni/ shes rab brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni/
304b2(phal chen): byams pa/ la la la ni/ snying rje/ la la la ni/ dga' ba/ la la la ni/ btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni/ chos gcig 'gas
304b3(phal chen): 'byung bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa//
304b4(phal chen): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ /de ltar gang gi don dris pa/ /sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon/ /smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung / /chos gcig gis ni byung ba med/ /gang yang
304b5(phal chen): 'byung ba yod pa min/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med/ /skal pa gang la gnas pa yi/ /bsam pa mkhyen nas don mdzad cing / /gang la ci dag tshul mthun pa/ /de bzhin
304b6(phal chen): chos kyang bstan pa mdzad/ /ser sna can la sbyin pa brjod/ /tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams/ /mi bzod la ni bzod dang des/ /brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o/ /
304b7(phal chen): rnam par 'khrugs la bsam gtan brjod/ /shes rab 'byor ba shes med la'o/ /gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad/ /'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste/ /zhum pa la ni
305a1(phal chen): dga' ba bshad/ /'khor ba'i sems la btang snyoms te/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang / /rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar sa la
305a2(phal chen): las bya ba/ /khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin/ /de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag /byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro /rgyal ba'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams/ /rub pa'i
305a3(phal chen): phyir ni ra ba ste/ /de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag /byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro/ /ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni/ /sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed/ /
305a4(phal chen): de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag /byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ /bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar/ /de bzhin tshangs
305a5(phal chen): pa'i gnas rnams kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad
305a6(phal chen): ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar
305a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi
305b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos
305b2(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
305b3(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid
305b4(phal chen): ni| |'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste/ /bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa yi/ /'byung ba de yang gcig pu 'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos
305b5(phal chen): kyi sku| |shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no/ /sngon chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe/ /ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa/ /'khor du chos rnams
305b6(phal chen): bstan pa dang / /de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub/ /sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa rnams/ /de yi rnam
305b7(phal chen): pa de ltar mthong / /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du/ /kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ /sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang / /'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no/ /gang rnam
306a1(phal chen): smon lam mthun ldan zhing / /sngon chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams/ /ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong / /sems
306a2(phal chen): can bsam pa ji bzhin dang / /las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa/ /de lta de ltar mthong 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'/ /
306a3(phal chen): de dag byams sdang yod pa min/ /bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /srog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong / /rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams/ /de ltar snang bar gyur
306a4(phal chen): pa de| |drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i/ /nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med/ /gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /skyes bu drang srong
306a5(phal chen): rnams kyang snang / /de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
306a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul las brtsams te
306a7(phal chen): spobs par gyis shig / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul
306b1(phal chen): la 'jug pa ni/ ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni/ gang / sangs
306b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni/ ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ ji tsam du yangs/ de nas byang
306b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste/ /kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med/ /sems
306b4(phal chen): can thams cad 'jug pa ste/ /chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med/ /tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni/ /bskal pa bye bar mi nus te/ /ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba/ /de ni
306b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /blo gros sems kyang de bzhin du/ /sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /'jig
306b6(phal chen): rten thams cad 'jug pa dang / /'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa/ /de dag kun la ye shes gnas/ /gzugs su snang ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de/ /dus
306b7(phal chen): gsum kun la chags pa med/ /nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin/ /de ni ye shes yul yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad/ /sems can khams rnams rtogs
307a1(phal chen): par mkhyen/ /dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang / /sems can kun gyi sgra
307a2(phal chen): skad du| |sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang / /rnam par rtog pa gang yang med/ /rnam shes rnam par shes bya med/ /sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te/ /ye shes rang
307a3(phal chen): bzhin shin tu dag/ sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad/ /nyon mongs med cing las med de/ /dngos po med cing gnas pa med/ /snang ba med cing rgyu ba med/ /
307a4(phal chen): 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod/ /sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams/ /dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa/ /sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas/ /sangs rgyas
307a5(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
307a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa
307a7(phal chen): dang | tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/
307b1(phal chen): ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs
307b2(phal chen): med pa| bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis
307b3(phal chen): k las pa| nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar
307b4(phal chen): du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du
307b5(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
307b6(phal chen): dang | de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam
307b7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
308a1(phal chen): d byings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de
308a2(phal chen): dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'
308a3(phal chen): dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //bam po bco brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'
308a4(phal chen): 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yi/ kha na ma tho
308a5(phal chen): ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams
308a6(phal chen): pa yin| yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa yin/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'phrog
308a7(phal chen): pa yin| ngag gi las mi 'phrog pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrog pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ ngag gi las mi zlog pa yin/ yid kyi las mi zlog pa yin/
308b1(phal chen): lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las bsngags pa yin/ ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid
308b2(phal chen): kyi las bsngags pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ lus kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med
308b3(phal chen): pa yin| ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ ngag gi las ye shes sngon
308b4(phal chen): du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gzugs phun
308b5(phal chen): sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/
308b6(phal chen): dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros
308b7(phal chen): tshad med pa yin/ blo gros grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod
309a1(phal chen): du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs
309a2(phal chen): can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i
309a3(phal chen): stobs can yin/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dod pa'i
309a4(phal chen): khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas
309a5(phal chen): pa yin| da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la
309a6(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu byang ba
309a7(phal chen): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan
309b1(phal chen): lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha
309b2(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
309b3(phal chen): pa yin| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha
309b4(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong
309b5(phal chen): du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang / brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma'i shes
309b6(phal chen): par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan
309b7(phal chen): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa
310a1(phal chen): yin| bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/
310a2(phal chen): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos yongs su bzung
310a3(phal chen): ba yin| gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ nam mkha'
