310a4(phal chen): lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs
310a5(phal chen): su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur
310a6(phal chen): ba yin| dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha'i lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'am ci'i dbang pos bkur ba
310a7(phal chen): yin| lto 'phye chen pos dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa
310b1(phal chen): yin| skyabs su gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa
310b2(phal chen): yin| rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu
310b3(phal chen): gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad
310b4(phal chen): ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod de ltar skye bo mang
310b5(phal chen): po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzud pa'i
310b6(phal chen): phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub
310b7(phal chen): sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur
311a1(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
311a2(phal chen): dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta
311a3(phal chen): ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur
311a4(phal chen): ba dang / kun tu bzang zhing kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa
311a5(phal chen): gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang
311a6(phal chen): ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
311a7(phal chen): sras| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis mi non par
311b1(phal chen): gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad/ skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang
311b2(phal chen): 'grogs par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang / mi
311b3(phal chen): dga' ba dang / rnam par bral bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol
311b4(phal chen): tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
311b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /chung ma'i 'khor
311b6(phal chen): gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing / 'phags pa'i sar tshud par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyan
311b7(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /khang thog
312a1(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing / chos kyi khang steng du phyin par gyur cig/
312a2(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do/ /sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing bdag gi thams
312a3(phal chen): cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar
312a4(phal chen): phyin te| 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /btson ra la kha na ma tho bar mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas
312a5(phal chen): med pa la spyod cing gang du dga' bar 'dong bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
312a6(phal chen): sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing / chags pa med de/ mi dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i
312a7(phal chen): tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing mthun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan
312b1(phal chen): po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung bar
312b2(phal chen): gsol ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe byang
312b3(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /skra dang kha spu 'breg pa'i tshe byang
312b4(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /gos ngur smrig gon pa'i tshe byang chub sems
312b5(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
312b6(phal chen): sems can rnams skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas la skyabs su
312b7(phal chen): 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don du brtson par gyur cig / ces
313a1(phal chen): sems bskyed do/ /chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed
313a2(phal chen): do| |dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig / ces
313a3(phal chen): sems bskyed do/ /bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams
313a4(phal chen): cad shin tu bslab par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las
313a5(phal chen): la spyod cing tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
313a6(phal chen): gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems
313a7(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /gtsug lag
313b1(phal chen): khang du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i chos can du gyur te bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do//
313b2(phal chen): stan 'ding ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /'dug
313b3(phal chen): pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'cha' ba'i
313b4(phal chen): tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /zhi gnas yongs su sbyor bar byed
313b5(phal chen): pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /
313b6(phal chen): lhag mthong yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba
313b7(phal chen): bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing 'du byed
314a1(phal chen): thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam par mthong bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
314a2(phal chen): can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil 'degs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
314a3(phal chen): can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe

321b7(phal chen): can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do/ /mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
322a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cing / /ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang pa 'khru
322a2(phal chen): ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /lus smyong ba'i
322a3(phal chen): tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /gnyid sad pa'i tshe byang chub
322a4(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs
322a5(phal chen): rgyas su gyur cig / ces sems bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas
322a6(phal chen): yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa
322a7(phal chen): dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye rgur bcas pa dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su
322b1(phal chen): bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal
322b2(phal chen): po che zhes bya ba las/ spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //bam po bcu dgu pa/ yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa/ /de skad smras nas
322b3(phal chen): sems can dri med pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yon tan rnams/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /spyod yul yongs dag rgyal ba'i spyod pa rnams/ /
322b4(phal chen): bdag gis rgyal sras rnams la 'dir bshad do/ /yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa/ /rgyal sras rnams la nga ni khyod kyis shod/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /
322b5(phal chen): yon tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las/ /mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shes shig /mgo smos tsam du chung zad brjod par bya/ /byang chub don du rang byung 'gyur bya zhes/ /thog
322b6(phal chen): mar byang chub sems skyes gyur pa yi/ /yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med/ /dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan la/ /bskal pa
322b7(phal chen): mang por spyad pa ci zhig smos/ /de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /dpe tsam
323a1(phal chen): cha shas chung tsam brjod par bya/ /mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung / /sa chen lhun las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra/ /byang chub yon tan
323a2(phal chen): bsam pa'i sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma yin rkyen las 'byung ba yin/ /rgyal pa rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang / /dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye/ /de yang
323a3(phal chen): 'dod pa'i sred pa rgyal srid dang / /bdag bde'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir min/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan skyed sems ni yongs su
323a4(phal chen): skye| |de ni sems can rtag tu bde don dang / /zhing sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur/ /yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing / /ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems
323a5(phal chen): skye 'o| |rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / /de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la/ /dad dang mos pa dga' ba bskyed byas te/ /sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang
323a6(phal chen): skye| |rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas/ /rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te/ /byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing / /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye 'o/ /
323a7(phal chen): dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste/ /yon tan thams cad yongs su skyong zhing 'dren/ /nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed/ /dad pa
323b1(phal chen): sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste/ /nga rgyal rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te/ /lag pa lta bur dge sdud rtsa ba yin/ /yongs su gtong la dad
323b2(phal chen): pa dga' bar byed/ /rgyal pa'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed/ /yon tan ye shes khyad par dad pa byed/ /sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba
323b3(phal chen): dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs/ /nyon mongs thub pa med la gnas yin te/ /dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te/ /
323b4(phal chen): mi khom spo zhing 'du 'dzin med par byed/ /dad pa bdud kyi lam las zlog pa ste/ /thar lam dam pa yongs su ston pa yin/ /yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin/ /dad pa byang chub
323b5(phal chen): shing rab rnam par skyed/ /ye shes khyad par sgo rnams 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin/ /de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la/ /spyod pa rim gyis rnam par
323b6(phal chen): brjod par bya/ /chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon/ /rin chen seng+ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no/ /dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa/ /de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi
323b7(phal chen): gtong ngo / /tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba/ /de dag yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan/ /tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste/ /bslab pas sa yi yon tan
324a1(phal chen): legs la brtson/ /tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os/ /dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang
324a2(phal chen): byed pa| |de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed/ /rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /dad pas chos la phu dud gang byed pa/ /
324a3(phal chen): de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan/ /rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mos/ /dad pas dge 'dun phu dud su byed pa/ /de
324a4(phal chen): dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos/ /mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa/ /de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog /dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa/ /
324a5(phal chen): de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno/ /gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba/ /des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/ /gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spangs pa/ /
324a6(phal chen): de dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin/ /chos kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su gsog /dge ba rgya chen yongs su gang gsog
324a7(phal chen): pa| |bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthu ldan/ /bdag nyid che ba rgyu mthu gang ldan pa/ /de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa 'thob/ /mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa/ /de
324b1(phal chen): dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlab/ /rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/ /byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa//
324b2(phal chen): de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes/ /sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes
324b3(phal chen): pa| |de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs/ /'du dang 'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa/ /de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag /gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa/ /de
324b4(phal chen): dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog / lhag bsam dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin la spyod/ /pha rol phyin la rtag tu su spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen
324b5(phal chen): po 'di la spyod/ /theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa/ /de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod/ /nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas su mchod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rjes dran phyed pa
324b6(phal chen): med| |sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi
324b7(phal chen): 'grogs min/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma yin/ /de la chos nub 'gyur ba nam yang med/ /gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med gyur pa/ /de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med dang
325a1(phal chen): ldan| |spobs pa sgrib pa med dang su ldan pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas/ /gang gis chos rab bstan pa mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la
325a2(phal chen): byams pas phan pa tshol/ /'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba/ /de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba sus brtan pa/ /de dag chos kyi dga' bas
325a3(phal chen): dbang po dga'/ /chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba/ /de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so/ /'du byad nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa/ /de dag nga rgyal rlom
325a4(phal chen): sems bag med spangs/ /nga rgyal rlom sems bag med sus spangs pa/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson/ /bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu sus brtson pa/ /de dag
325a5(phal chen): 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang la 'khor bas yongs su skyo med pa/ /de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ /de
325a6(phal chen): dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skye/ /gang gis mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa/ /de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs/ /spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams bzhugs
325a7(phal chen): gyur pa| |de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas/ /'gro ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas pa/ /de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la mkhas/ /'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su
325b1(phal chen): mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed/ /'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas su
325b2(phal chen): byed pa| |de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa/ /dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/ /bla med lam la dpa' bo gang
325b3(phal chen): gnas pa/ /de dag bdud kyi dpung gis thub pa min/ /gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa/ /de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das/ /bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su
325b4(phal chen): 'das pa/ /de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin/ /mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa/ /de dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin/ /mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa/ /'jig
325b5(phal chen): rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan/ /'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon du gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/ /de dag rgyal
325b6(phal chen): ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la mkhas/ /rgyal ba'i 'phrul ba gsang la su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ /gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag
325b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis su brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus
326a1(phal chen): sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /mtshan rab sum
326a2(phal chen): cu gnyis dang su ldan pa/ /de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang bris/ /dpe byad bzang pos gang gi lus bris pa/ /de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so/ /gang gi lus 'od
326a3(phal chen): kun tu mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab/ /gang la 'od zer bsam yas rgyan yod pa/ /de dag 'od las pad+mo mang po 'byung / /gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang
326a4(phal chen): 'byung ba/ /de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang / /don yod rnam par spyod cing sems can 'dul/ /gang rnams rgyal pa
326a5(phal chen): pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang / /don yod rnams spyod sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang
326a6(phal chen): yas/ /gang gi mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab dgar byed pas/ /bsam gyis mi
326a7(phal chen): khyab zhi bo'i rnam par spyod/ /gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zos ston cing / /bsam yas sems can dga' bar su byed pa/ /de dag bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na/ /
326b1(phal chen): tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul/ /tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba/ /de dag lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/
326b2(phal chen): ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung / /gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab 'byung ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci dga' bar/ /sems can
326b3(phal chen): rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston/ /smon lam stobs gyis gang rnams ci dga' bar/ /sems can rgyud du gzugs mang ston byed pa/ /de dag tshig du brjod cing ci smra yang / /sgra la
326b4(phal chen): dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab/ /tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang / /gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa'i sems
326b5(phal chen): rnams yud kyis rnam par shes/ /gang gi ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag skye dang 'chi 'pho nam yang med/ /nyon mongs rgyu
326b6(phal chen): ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med/ /skye dang 'chi 'pho gang la med gyur cing / /nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis smos par 'jig
326b7(phal chen): rten kun tu spyod/ /yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing / /chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog rnam par
327a1(phal chen): thar la spyod/ /gang rnams bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa/ /de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par 'phrul/ /
327a2(phal chen): ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob/ /mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing / /ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams
327a3(phal chen): cad las/ /dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad mod byed pa/ /de dag spyi
327a4(phal chen): bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur/ /gang gi spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par
327a5(phal chen): dbang bskur ba/ /de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing / /phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed/ /gang rnams nam mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang zhing / /phyogs rnams
327a6(phal chen): kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa/ /dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so/ /dpe med gang gi spyod yul shes bya bar/ /'jig rten lha
327a7(phal chen): dang bcas pas mi nus pa/ /de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don kyang yod/ /mthong dang ming thos spobs pa'ang don yod do/ /gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing //
327b1(phal chen): mthong dang mi thos spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag gtong ba yi/ /sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don kyang yod/ /skyes su dam pa de dag byin mthu yis/ /dam chos
327b2(phal chen): tshul ni mi 'jig brten par gnas/ /dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang / /rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas/ /rdo rje stug po'i rin chen tshogs yod pas/ /de yi mthu
327b3(phal chen): yis rgya mtsho'i rin chen rnams/ /mi zad 'phel zhing 'grib pa gang yang med/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho/ /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /de dag
327b4(phal chen): kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi gter ston to/ /de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ /lhun gyis grub par phyogs
327b5(phal chen): rnams thams cad du/ /zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing / /thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag skad cig re rer byang chub tu/ /rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs
327b6(phal chen): bcu kun tu ston/ /'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan las 'das zhi dang / /sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams
327b7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa/ /yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su/ /theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul/ /khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus/ /skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams
328a1(phal chen): dang / /gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ /mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgya yi sgo dag nas/ /
328a2(phal chen): 'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang / /cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams/ /thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pa byed/ /de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ phyogs
328a3(phal chen): bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed/ /de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab/ /sems can 'grel ba'i ye shes mtha' yang yas/ /tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul
328a4(phal chen): dang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag bsam gtan
328a5(phal chen): shes rab rnam 'phrul dang / /thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgo dag nas/ /yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /
328a6(phal chen): de dag rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /rdul phran rtse gcig bsam yas zhing rnams la/ /ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med/ /rdul gcig rtse la'ang sangs
328a7(phal chen): rgyas bzhugs zhing dang / /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston/ /la la nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa dang / /yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston/ /zhing rnams la
328b1(phal chen): la 'jig cing 'du ba dang / /la la spyi'u tshugs rim gyis gnas par ston/ /la la snel zhi smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /de bzhin gzhan rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston/ /de dag rdul gcig
328b2(phal chen): rtser ston ji bzhin du/ /ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /mtha' yas grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra'o/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul
328b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed kyang / /lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas bkang zhing / /skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed/ /phyogs bcu kun na me tog
328b4(phal chen): phreng ba dang / /spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba/ /de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas 'gyed/ /na bza' phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / /rgyal
328b5(phal chen): mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang / /gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen bla re dag /lag mthil de nas char du mngon par 'bebs/ /phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams/ /drang
328b6(phal chen): srong che la mchod par gang 'os pa/ /de dag lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs/ /byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed/ /rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ji snyed pa/ /rnga chen rnga dang pi wang sgra
328b7(phal chen): snyan dang / /rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu sgra rab rnams/ /de dag lag mthil de nas sgra yang sgrog /phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi/ /bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna
329a1(phal chen): tshogs dang / /bstod pa'i tshigs bcad sgrub pa sna tshogs kyang / /lag mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung / /de dag 'od zer las dges yongs bsags
329a2(phal chen): pa| |lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing / /rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par/ /kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod/ /'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing rgyan
329a3(phal chen): ldan pa| |lag pa'i mthil bkye pad+mo bsam mi khyab/ /pad+mo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs/ /mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod pa byed/ /'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab
329a4(phal chen): bkye zhing / /me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang / /me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /
329a5(phal chen): spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang / /sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /phye ma'i
329a6(phal chen): rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang / /phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs su bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /na bza'i rgyan dang na
329a7(phal chen): bza'i bla re dang / /na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /rin chen rgyan dang rin chen
329b1(phal chen): bla re dang / /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer pad+mo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /pad+mo'i rgyan dang pad+mo'i bla re dang / /pad+mo sna tshogs
329b2(phal chen): kun tu yongs bkang zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing / /phreng ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla re dang / /phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang
329b3(phal chen): zhing / /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing / /de dag rgyan mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang / /sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis/ /
329b4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed/ /de dag de gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog /rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa/ /dar gyi lda ldi ba dan yongs dpyangs shing / /dril
329b5(phal chen): phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed/ /lag pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar/ /ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting
329b6(phal chen): 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing / /bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du/ /thams mang stong gis
329b7(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba byed/ /la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo/ /bzod pa mi zad mi sgul
330a1(phal chen): sgo dag dang / /la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo/ /bsam gtan rab tu zhi gnas sgo dag dang / /don dam rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo/ /tshul
330a2(phal chen): rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang / /tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang / /bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo/ /
330a3(phal chen): bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang / /la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo/ /nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang / /rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo/ /theg pa dam pa
330a4(phal chen): rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang / /la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang / /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags 'bral ba'i sgo/ /la la zhi 'gog ting
330a5(phal chen): 'dzin sgo dag tu/ /'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab tu zhugs te/ /de dag kun gyi chos nyid sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can
330a6(phal chen): 'dul| |gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus te/ /ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul tshul ni de 'dra'o/ /de
330a7(phal chen): dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog / 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin byed mthun pa/ /dga' ba de spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems
330b1(phal chen): can 'dul/ /gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa/ /de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams/ /thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don
330b2(phal chen): byed| |de dag zas mchog skom dang ro mchog dang / /gos dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas/ /sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba
330b3(phal chen): byed| |de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing / /gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te/ /phreng bas rnam brgyan spos kyis bskus byas pa'i/ /gzugs rnams yongs su
330b4(phal chen): bstan pas sems can 'dul/ /mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la/ /de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes/ /gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing / /gzugs
330b5(phal chen): la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed/ /de dag ka la ping+ka'i sgra snyan dang / /ko kil kun la ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / /rnga dang tshangs pa mi 'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin
330b6(phal chen): chos kyang ston/ /de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po/ /gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /
330b7(phal chen): de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byang / /don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te/ /sems can dgos la grogs su 'gyur byas shing / /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/
331a1(phal chen): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed/ /'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/ /de dag grogs don mi bde
331a2(phal chen): nyams su len/ /gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de/ /dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /de dag kun tu rgyal srid che spangs shing / /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon
331a3(phal chen): par 'byung / /de dag khyim gyi btson ra srid gnas pa'i/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa
331a4(phal chen): yongs su brjod/ /de dag spyod pa bcu rnams spyod byed cing / /skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod/ /drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus par/ /yongs su sgom zhing 'gro ba'i don
331a5(phal chen): kyang byed/ /gang na sems can tshad med tshe ldan pa/ /bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /de dag kun tu nad gzer na bu can/ /bdag la dbang med tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston/ /'dod
331a6(phal chen): chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te/ /gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing / /rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba
331a7(phal chen): byed| |de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi/ /chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che brjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams
331b1(phal chen): kyis 'gro don byed/ /de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyi/ /gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / /rdzu 'phrul rnam par
331b2(phal chen): 'phrul bas sems can 'dul/ /de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi/ /'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+mo bzhin/ /dga' ba mos pa skye
331b3(phal chen): bar rnam par spyod/ /de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal ba byed/ /gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /mdzes shing sdug par bzhad gad byed pa dang / /sgyu mkhan gzugs med kun
331b4(phal chen): tu ston par byed/ /grong ba grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang / /ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te/ /rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang / /sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa
331b5(phal chen): byed| |de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang / /lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston
331b6(phal chen): 'gyur| |'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing / /sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang / /sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang rjod par byed//
331b7(phal chen): 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams/ /sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams/ /kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par
332a1(phal chen): brjod| |drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog / gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dad gyur dang / /brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub mchog gi rnams/ /
332a2(phal chen): kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston par byed/ /de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can/ /dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang / /sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi
332a3(phal chen): mkhan po mkhas pa byed/ /de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang / /bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams/ /ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag tu yang de dag mkhan
332a4(phal chen): por 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i rjes spyad dka' thub lnga ldan dang / /khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dwags spyod/ /gle'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams/ /de dag kun na'ang de dag
332a5(phal chen): slob dpon 'gyur/ /lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang / /mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang / /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i rnams/ /chos sems nang na de dag dam par
332a6(phal chen): 'gyur| |gnas btegs gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang / /tsher ma rtswa dang thal ba'i mal can dang / /dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams/ /de dag kun tu'ang de dag
332a7(phal chen): slob dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas nas/ /sgrub dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyi/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug
332b1(phal chen): bsngal spangs pas 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la zhen pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis/ /bden pa ston pa
332b2(phal chen): de dag kun tu byed/ /la lar dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu/ /shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig
332b3(phal chen): gis| |la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang / /don nges rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / /rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang / /brtan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /
332b4(phal chen): la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang / /kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang / /la la dag la lha'i tshig nges tshig dang / /klu yi tshig nges gnod sbyin tshig rnams kyis/ /la
332b5(phal chen): la dag la srin po 'byung po dang / /dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig /mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed/ /de dag bden pa'i
332b6(phal chen): nges tshig tshul shes bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston/ /de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /de dag 'gro bde
332b7(phal chen): mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / /'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ /'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul/ /'od zer mthong na legs
333a1(phal chen): pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /sangs rgyas
333a2(phal chen): bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas/ /dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te/ /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na/ /des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od
333a3(phal chen): zer grub/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi/ /'od zer 'od byed rab tu bkye byas shing / /mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun bsal te/ /'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang / /'od
333a4(phal chen): des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin/ /rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar bzung byas pas/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /
333a5(phal chen): 'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang / /shing dang rtswa dang smig ma spa yi sgron/ /spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag /rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo/ /'od zer sgrol zhes
333a6(phal chen): bya ba rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba/ /de dag sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor/ /sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon/ /gang rnams sred pa
333a7(phal chen): rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor/ /sems can bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa/ /de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed/ /mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston/ /stegs dang zam pa
333b1(phal chen): gcig min byas pa dang / /chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te/ /'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na/ /des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing //
333b2(phal chen): sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing / /chos kyi rnam grol ro la don du gnyer/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/ /chos kyis
333b3(phal chen): grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas/ /sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel/ /rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lo ma dang / /mtsho rnams byang chub
333b4(phal chen): don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa rnam smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na/ /skom pa rnam sel de ni des sgrub pa/ /'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer
333b5(phal chen): des bskul ba/ /dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje mnga' rnams sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad+mo'i gdan
333b6(phal chen): la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na/ /dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub bo/ /'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed
333b7(phal chen): 'od zer des bskul ba/ /de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'/ /chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste/ /chos la
334a1(phal chen): mos dga' dag 'dun mos dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang / /rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob/ /sangs rgyas rjes
334a2(phal chen): dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na/ /des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub/ /'od zer bsod
334a3(phal chen): nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing / /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong / /de dag mchod
334a4(phal chen): sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe/ /slong mo ba yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te/ /bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na/ /des na 'od zer bsod nams bsags grub bo/ /'od zer ye shes ldan
334a5(phal chen): pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi/ /chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes dran nas/ /chos kyi bye brag sems can
334a6(phal chen): 'dzin btsud de/ /nges rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing / /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na/ /des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab
334a7(phal chen): bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed
334b1(phal chen): med pa| |sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos/ /rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams/ /bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo/ /'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye
334b2(phal chen): zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /mi zad gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'chad rnams la yongs su
334b3(phal chen): phan btags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrungs byas shing / /'gro pa kun la chos bzhin phan btags pas/ /'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul de grub bo/ /'od zer gtong dang
334b4(phal chen): ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul ba/ /skyed pa mi brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jungs pa gdul dka'i
334b5(phal chen): sems can ma dul dang / /nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas/ /gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /'od zer yongs su
334b6(phal chen): gdung med rab bkye zhing / /tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do/ /dge ba'i las lam
334b7(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing / /byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer des grub bo/ /bzod pas
335a1(phal chen): rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /khro ba'i tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing / /de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga'
335a2(phal chen): bar 'gyur/ /sdig sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing / /bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas/ /des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de
335a3(phal chen): grub bo| |'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /le lo'i sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa
335a4(phal chen): 'byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te/ /myur du byang
335a5(phal chen): chub bla med rab tu thob/ /sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas/ /des
335a6(phal chen): ni brtson ldan 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing / /rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ /de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /nyams
335a7(phal chen): su mi gnod mnyam gzhag sems su 'gyur/ /sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang / /'du 'dzi yongs su rnam par spangs byas te/ /bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rang
335b1(phal chen): bsngags pas/ /des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /shes rab 'chal ba ji snyed des bskul ba/ /bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams
335b2(phal chen): dang / /dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing / /nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs
335b3(phal chen): yongs btang ste/ /byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba/ /de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas/ /shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub bo/ /'od zer sangs rgyas ldan pa rab
335b4(phal chen): bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang / /pad+mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam
335b5(phal chen): thar dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te/ /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo/ /'od zer mi 'jigs
335b6(phal chen): sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / /'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa/ /'byung po bza' dang bsad cing brdeg pa dang / /nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu 'grol/ /mi 'jigs sbyin
335b7(phal chen): pas sems can bskyabs pa dang / /srog gcod las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing / /'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas pas/ /'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des
336a1(phal chen): grub bo| |'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing / /nad pa na ba ji snyed des reg pa/ /thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par 'grol/ /bsam gtan ting
336a2(phal chen): 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob/ /nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang / /rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang / /'bru mar zas skom
336a3(phal chen): byin pas de grub bo/ /'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing / /tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag shi
336a4(phal chen): 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing 'gro / 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/ /dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing / /'chi khar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang
336a5(phal chen): byas pas/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob bo/ /'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin
336a6(phal chen): 'dri ba byed/ /chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing / /mos pa bskyed de chos
336a7(phal chen): la brtson gyis zhes/ /brjod pa chos rab rjod pa des thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ /'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /khams gsum
336b1(phal chen): sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag / kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsal ba'i dbyangs sgrar drang srong cher brjod de/ /rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams/ /'gro ba kun
336b2(phal chen): la rgyal ba'i gsung don du/ /yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob/ /'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /bag med spyod pa
336b3(phal chen): thams cad rnam spangs te/ /yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang / /'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing
336b4(phal chen): zhi dga' zhes/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo/ /'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par
336b5(phal chen): dang / /shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan/ /tshul khrims 'phags pa ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste/ /shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes/ /byang chub don du bsngags
336b6(phal chen): shing bstod byas pas/ /des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob|/'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /rin chen gter mang mi zad
336b7(phal chen): thob gyur te/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la/ /rin chen bsdud de rin chen sbyin
337a1(phal chen): btang bas/ /rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub/ /'od zer spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing / /sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba/ /mi la
337a2(phal chen): med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku
337a3(phal chen): gzugs mchod rten dag / byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog /rol mo
337a4(phal chen): sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis/ /pho brang dam pa yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs/ /sngon chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te/ /me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang / /gdugs dang
337a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis/ /mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan grub bo/ /'od zer shin tu dar byed rab bkye zhing / /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/ /mchod
337a6(phal chen): rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas/ /des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub/ /'od zer chen po'i sprin ldan rab bkye zhing / /spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas/ /
337a7(phal chen): mchod rten gam yo spos chus yongs btab pas/ /'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob/ /'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing / /gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par
337b1(phal chen): 'gyur| |gos dang bgo ba phreng ba sna tshogs dag / yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub/ /'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing / /bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur//
337b2(phal chen): zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob/ /'od zer nor ston rab tu gyes byas shing / /phongs pa rin chen gter rnams thob par 'gyur/ /
337b3(phal chen): gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum/ /gsol pas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo/ /'od zer mig sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur/ /
337b4(phal chen): rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/ /rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab bkye zhing / /rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang
337b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam spyod thob/ /'od zer sna sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i
337b6(phal chen): mchod rten la/ /spos zhim gsol bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub/ /'od zer lce sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod/ /mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnams
337b7(phal chen): spangs te/ /'jam par smra bas lce sbyong 'od zer grub/ /'od zer lus sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod
338a1(phal chen): rten la| |lus kyis rab btud lus sbyong 'od zer thob/ /'od zer sems sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /smyos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur/ /
338a2(phal chen): ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas pas/ /des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /bsam yas sku mnga' mi yi dbang po
338a3(phal chen): mthong / /sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang / /mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu
338a4(phal chen): shes| |rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra 'o zhes/ /sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo/ /'od zer dri sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu
338a5(phal chen): 'gyur| |spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag / khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin/ /'od zer bro sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu
338a6(phal chen): 'gyur| |sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/ /bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/ /'od zer reg sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam
338a7(phal chen): bder 'gyur/ /tri shul mdung dang ral gri mda' yi char/ /phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 'gyur/ /gos mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams/ /rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du
338b1(phal chen): bting bkram ste/ /me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang / /phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i 'od de yin/ /'od zer chos sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing / /ba spu kun nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i/ /
338b2(phal chen): bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur/ /mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed/ /rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te/ /chos
338b3(phal chen): nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas zhes/ /brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob bo/ /'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/ /drang srong rnams kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig nas/ /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed
338b4(phal chen): kyi 'od zer byung / /kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no/ /ji ltar ba spu gcig gi sgo gcig nas/ /'od zer gang+gA'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba/ /de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas/ /

338b6(phal chen): ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /de dag bsod nams bstad grogs byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rang smon lam sus btab dang / /gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/ /de dag kun

339a3(phal chen): gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mos/ /rgyan dang nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang / /rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa'i rnams/ /de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi/ /nyon
339a4(phal chen): mongs phongs pa rnams la yod pa min/ /gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te/ /dad pa yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na/ /bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du/ /mi 'gyur

339b2(phal chen): cing / /kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta/ /skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste/ /gang rnams ting 'dzin rnams spyod zhugs gyur pa/ /kun kyang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te/ /

339b4(phal chen): cad du| |ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon sgrub cing / /phyogs kyi dra bar snrel zhir spyod pa byed/ /la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam langs

340a1(phal chen): drung na ting 'dzin la/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang / /der ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas/ /nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo

342a6(phal chen): dpe rnams kyis/ /bsten na myur du rnam par don shes 'gyur/ /sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i/ /nyan thos gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur cing de
342a7(phal chen): bzhin gcig gyur te/ /nam mkha' 'di la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar/ /'og nas me 'bar steng nas chu yi rgyun/ /steng nas me 'bar 'og nas chu yi rgyun/ /'gro 'dug nyal
342b1(phal chen): zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te/ /skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de ni snying rje chen po ldan ma yin/ /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal bar gzhog |'on kyang lus 'phrul
342b2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /'jig rten phan tshol ci phyir de mi ston/ /nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi mtsho dang lu ma dang / /lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya
342b3(phal chen): mtsho'i snod/ /chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston par byed/ /de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs kun kyang / /skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi
342b4(phal chen): tshul la mkhas/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dpal/ /mtsho gsal dang bar yan lag bzhi yi dpung / /so sor rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong / /ral gri shang lang sog
342b5(phal chen): ka mde'u thung mda'/ /bzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas pa mthong / /gang gi gzugs dang cha byad ci 'dra ba/ /chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong / /chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med/ /drang
342b6(phal chen): srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra 'o/ /rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa/ /sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa rnams/ /de dag sgra yi yan lag dbyings tshul shes/ /sgra skad kun tu rang
342b7(phal chen): rang skad du brjod/ /dbyangs ldan de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can/ /'on kyang sgra kun dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas/ /gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/ /'jig rten lhar bcas
343a1(phal chen): ci phyir mgur mi byed/ /dga' byed chung ma sgra snyan ldan pa mo/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste/ /dam tshig bden sgrub mi tshe dga' ba yin/ /sems
343a2(phal chen): yid ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa byed/ /sgra snyan ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can/ /brtul zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rjes su 'brang / /'jig rten yid 'ong sgras kyang tshim par byed/ /
343a3(phal chen): ye shes yon tan mang ba cir mi ston/ /sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed/ /nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang / /khyim
343a4(phal chen): bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/ /'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab
343a5(phal chen): byang ba| |spyod pa'i tshul mkhas ci phyir dga' mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/ /lha min lha yang rung ste gang pham pa/ /de dag bzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par/ /
343a6(phal chen): go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer/ /lha dbang de dag 'dod chags sdang ldan yang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dbang
343a7(phal chen): po rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa/ /'phrul chen glang chen dbang po'i 'khor gyur pas/ /mgo mang sum cu rtsa gnyis sprul
343b1(phal chen): pa byed| |mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams/ /bdun bdun chus rgyas yongs su sprul pa byed/ /rdzing rnams re re kun tu pad+mo rnams/ /bdun
343b2(phal chen): bdun rgyan gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed/ /pad+mo re re lha yi bu mo dag /sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de
343b3(phal chen): dang rtse| |glang po de yang klu yi lus btang zhing / /lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang ldongs spyod kun dang mthun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ltos/ /de ni
343b4(phal chen): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/ /'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams/ /ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mi byed/ /sgra gcan ci
343b5(phal chen): dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na/ /rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor zhing / /rgya mtsho'i zab ring lte bar phyin tsam byed/ /ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms/ /de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
343b6(phal chen): mug can/ /'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na/ /'jig rten sgron ma bdun rnams yongs 'dul ba/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rob ston mi byed/ /bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang
343b7(phal chen): ltos shig dang / /lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe/ /lha min bye ba 'byed pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed/ /lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya
344a1(phal chen): byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur ces/ /lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos so/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mig
344a2(phal chen): stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar bar rab gzas shing / /lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i/ /brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byor/ /de ni bsod nams phal gyi
344a3(phal chen): stobs dang mthus/ /lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur ba'i/ /bsod nams mi bzad rnams ko cir mi 'phrul/ /lha rnams bskul ba'i lha
344a4(phal chen): rdzas lnga yod pa/ /lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung / /lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas/ /mkha' las rnga yi dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrog /'dod pa thams cad mi
344a5(phal chen): rtag mi brtan te/ /'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos/ /bag med thams cad gcugs can mya
344a6(phal chen): ngan ldan/ /chems kyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin/ /ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa rnams/ /bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin/ /yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug
344a7(phal chen): bsngal rtsa/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis/ /chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /brgya byin lhar bcas
344b1(phal chen): rnga yis bskul byas nas/ /kun kyang chos bzang mdun sar dong phyung te/ /lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams/ /'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa brjod/ /rnga rab de ni
344b2(phal chen): gzugs med mi mthong yang / /don chen rnga yi sgra ni sgrog byed na/ /bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen cir mi byed/ /lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur
344b3(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ /lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/ /lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yi mchog /lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog /rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga'
344b4(phal chen): ba skyed/ /'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur/ /lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngang gyur nas/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byin/ /de bzhin rnga 'dra 'jigs med stobs pa'i
344b5(phal chen): rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung 'gyur te/ /bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje can/ /zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /dbang ba'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /dbang
344b6(phal chen): po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin brtse bar shes/ /gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ /lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang / chos
344b7(phal chen): bzang mdun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug / lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang / /brgya byin skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul/ /brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
345a1(phal chen): can| |sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/ /'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed/ /bdud kyi
345a2(phal chen): dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dod/ /las dang nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis/ /so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings/ /
345a3(phal chen): de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can/ /'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na/ /dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rab ste/ /'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog /stong gsum
345a4(phal chen): bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang / /stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams na/ /ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang / /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog /de ni
345a5(phal chen): 'jig rten pa yi lam gyis ni/ /bsam gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul/ /'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul//
345a6(phal chen): dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab bkye ba/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'grang ba byed/ /thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus
345a7(phal chen): des shes na/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul bslab ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams/ /ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ /skad cig gcig la sems
345b1(phal chen): bsam shes mi 'gyur/ /sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung / /rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang / /sa bon rnam mang kun
345b2(phal chen): kyang de las byung / /rlung las sprin 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab/ /sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur/ /lo rtog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te/ /'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde
345b3(phal chen): ba skyed| |de ni pha rol phyin la ma bslab ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslab min na'ang / /'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na/ /rang nyams thob pa ci ro ba ston mi byed/ /rgya
345b4(phal chen): mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/ /bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dwags skad/ /khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad/ /thams cad skad bzhin 'gro la rnam par sgrog /de bzhin sgra
345b5(phal chen): snyan rang bzhin sgra shes nas/ /sgrib pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas/ /'gro ba kun tu sgra snyan brjod byas shing / /'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sgras tshim byed/ /rgya mtsho 'di
345b6(phal chen): la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing / /chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi zad/ /chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med/ /de bzhin de dag 'gro
345b7(phal chen): kun rgyar stsal te/ /bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes/ /shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun/ /bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med/ /rgya mtsho'i klu ni
346a1(phal chen): rnam par rtse byed na/ /sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/ /gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs/ /de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs
346a2(phal chen): ldan| |de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi / gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par sgrub/ /'phrul dga' mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/ /dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i
346a3(phal chen): mdog / mtsher mar mthon mthing bai DUR+Ya yi mdog /sum cu gsum du asma gar+b+ha 'dra/ /rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/ /rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro/ /mi ci
346a4(phal chen): gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te/ /klu yi gnas su pad+mo'i mdog lta bu/ /gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog /ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su 'o/ /byang du gser gyi kha
346a5(phal chen): dog 'od ston te/ /gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan du ston/ /'dzam bu'i gling du ri gnag 'dra bar te/ /sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin/ /dbang sgyur gnas
346a6(phal chen): su gser gyi sprin bstan nas/ /nyi ma'i mdog 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang / /dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston//
346a7(phal chen): kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu/ /rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro/ /
346b1(phal chen): mi ci gnas su mthon mthing bai DUr+ya/ /klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste/ /asma'i mdog tu lha min gnas su 'o/ /byang du ngang gis snang
346b2(phal chen): ba'i rin chen mdog / gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan/ /'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an+d+ha rnyil/ /sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul 'thun glog kyang 'gyed/ /de ni tshangs pa'i
346b3(phal chen): dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs su/ /'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rnga yi dbyangs/ /rol mo'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste/ /lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag tu 'o/ /sum cu
346b4(phal chen): gsum du mi'am ci'i skad du ste/ /rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du 'o/ /ri 'thab dbyangs su rgya mtsho kun tu ste/ /mi'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sgra/ /klu yi gnas su thal mo brdabs
346b5(phal chen): pa'i sgra| |gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/ /lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga yi sgra/ /rgya mtsho'i shugs sgrar mi yi gnas su 'o/ /dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas gsung zhim pa'i/ /me
346b6(phal chen): tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs/ /zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te/ /me tog man+dA ra ba'i phreng char 'bebs/ /dga' ldan gnas su rin chen chen po'i char/ /rgyan gyi dam
346b7(phal chen): pa rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang / /gser 'od zer bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang / /phreng ba byug pa
347a1(phal chen): rgyan gyi dam pa dang / /mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog tu/ /rol mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs/ /sum cu gsum du rin chen sna tshogs
347a2(phal chen): te| |tsan+dan dam pa'i spos dang a ga ru/ /gur gum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la/ /spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'bebs/ /nyams su 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams/ /kha
347a3(phal chen): dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang / /de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang / /char rgyud rgyun
347a4(phal chen): mi 'chad pa gnya' shing tsam/ /mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun du 'babs/ /mi ci gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs dang / /pad+mo ut+pal
347a5(phal chen): dngos dang rin chen dang / /me tog par shi ma li phye ma spos/ /pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro/ /klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste/ /gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dwangs
347a6(phal chen): snang ba| |lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung / /dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so/ /byang du de ni phreng ba rin chen dang / /me tog par shi ma li tsam pa ka'i/ /
347a7(phal chen): phreng ba bzang po ku ran muk+ta ka /gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so/ /'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'dang rab gsal gyi/ /char rnams sna tshogs shin tu phra bar 'bebs/ /
347b1(phal chen): me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing / /lo las de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed/ /de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam phyed kyang / /
347b2(phal chen): khyim nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ /klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /de ltar chu yi rgya mtshor gnas pa yang / /klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /chos kyi rgya
347b3(phal chen): mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag / mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston/ /dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam/ /skyes bu de dag brjod byas yangs pa ste/ /dpa' bo de
347b4(phal chen): dag dpe dang rnam par bral/ /de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro/ /mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can/ /ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can/ /ye shes mchog
347b5(phal chen): dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i/ /rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad/ /gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas/ /yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni/ /ngo mtshar rmad kyi
347b6(phal chen): chos dang de ldan te/ /mi yul kun na de ni dka' ba byed/ /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa/ /so so skye bo'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon/ /dge bsags bsod nams byas pa
347b7(phal chen): de dag ni/ /rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur/ /gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i/ /mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste/ /de bas rang rgyal theg pa dad
348a1(phal chen): pa dkon/ /theg chen dad byed de bas shin tu dkon/ /theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkon pa ste/ /'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon/ /'dzin cing
348a2(phal chen): spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te/ /yang dag ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos/ /la la stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang / /
348a3(phal chen): 'di 'dra'i chos la dad par byed pa las/ /de 'dra dka' bar brtsi ba ma yin no/ /la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur
348a4(phal chen): na'ang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /bsod nams ci 'dra thob pa de la min/ /la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa/ /lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings
348a5(phal chen): 'dzin kyang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min/ /la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen
348a6(phal chen): bkur kyang / /'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i/ /bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /bskal par bde ba kun gyis
348a7(phal chen): bsnyen bkur te/ /la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas na/ /bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags/ /rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams
348b1(phal chen): thams cad g.yos par gyur/ /lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan/ /'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng+ge rnams/ /thams cad kun gyis
348b2(phal chen): mngon par zhal bstan te/ /phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang bdog pa/ /bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur/ /phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas
348b3(phal chen): de dag kun gyis gsung brjod pa/ /rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyi/ /legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che
348b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba las/ bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //bam po nyi shu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
348b5(phal chen): cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
348b6(phal chen): dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang de
348b7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston cing / de bzhin gshegs
349a1(phal chen): pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma btul bar byang chub kyi shing
349a2(phal chen): drung nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba ga la ba der gshegs par snang ngo / /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse
349a3(phal chen): mar gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams
349a4(phal chen): par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas rnam par rgyal
349a5(phal chen): ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin seng+ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ bog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba
349a6(phal chen): stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa/ gdugs stong phrag bcu shin tu bzung ba/ dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu dbyangs pa/ mu tig
349a7(phal chen): gi se mo do stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus
349b1(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ 'od zer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so/ /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i
349b2(phal chen): k hang pa rnam par rgyal bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag tu yang
349b3(phal chen): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang / rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan
349b4(phal chen): 'das kyi gdan seng+ge'i khri bcas nas rje sa dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
349b5(phal chen): ldan 'das/ gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs
349b6(phal chen): sam zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de
349b7(phal chen): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa
350a1(phal chen): thams cad du glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma dag las
350a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes pa/ /rnam
350a3(phal chen): par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/ /rin
350a4(phal chen): chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ /rtse mo mchog
350a5(phal chen): tu gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/ /mdzod spu'i rtse
350a6(phal chen): mor gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa/ /rin chen sna
350a7(phal chen): tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon/ /rin chen rgyan
350b1(phal chen): du gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing bstan pa de/ /ma la ya yi rtse mor
350b2(phal chen): gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ /dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa/ /
350b3(phal chen): des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pad+mo'i bla/ /dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang
350b4(phal chen): bkra shis legs gyur cig / bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de/ /'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
