350b5(phal chen): legs gyur cig / ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glur blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de
350b6(phal chen): b zhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs
350b7(phal chen): rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs
351a1(phal chen): s o| |bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs
351a2(phal chen): par snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i
351a3(phal chen): ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
351a4(phal chen): las| de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa'
351a5(phal chen): bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag
351a6(phal chen): ste| byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag
351a7(phal chen): thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang / thams cad blo gros dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros
351b1(phal chen): dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
351b2(phal chen): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang / pad+mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ut+pa la'i me tog
351b3(phal chen): dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog dang / ldum bu'i me tog dang / nam mkha'i me tog dag go /byang chub sems
351b4(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma mnyam pa
351b5(phal chen): dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi sgul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / zla ba rdul med pa dang / zla ba rnams par grub pa dag go/
351b6(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs
351b7(phal chen): su brten te/ seng+ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub
352a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de
352a2(phal chen): bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go /'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go /de bzhin gshegs pa yang
352a3(phal chen): mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod par sha stag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mtho bong gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong pa kye ste/ phyogs bcu
352a4(phal chen): thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling
352a5(phal chen): bzhi pa thams cad dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
352a6(phal chen): blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smras so/ /snang ba dri ma med la ltos/ /ri rab rtse mo thams cad la/ /mgon po
352a7(phal chen): dag ni rab tu snang / /rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs/ /lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ /spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis/ /rab tu
352b1(phal chen): gshegs pas mngon par bstod/ /kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags/ /phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing / /yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod/ /
352b2(phal chen): kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de/ /ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhin/ /'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang / /de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /drang srong
352b3(phal chen): chen po'i mtshan kyang de/ /de na tshangs spyod bla med la/ /the tshom med par de dag spyod/ /kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig /drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams
352b4(phal chen): cad na| |rgyal ba 'di na bzhugs snyam byed/ /bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyam du/ /ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun na yang / /sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re
352b5(phal chen): che| |'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing / /de dag smon lam 'di btab ste/ /byang chub spyod pa rab tu spyod/ /kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas/ /gang
352b6(phal chen): zag mchog ni spyod byed kyang / /chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te/ /de dag sus kyang mi shes so/ /gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing / /thams cad dus su rnam snang ba/ /de la 'dra ba gang
352b7(phal chen): yang med/ /de ni shes par ji ltar rung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras so/ /'dren pa rnams ni mthong
353a1(phal chen): nas kyang / /bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gi /chos nyid de ni shes pa min/ /mtshan ma dag la spyod pa rnams/ /gti mug dra
353a2(phal chen): ba 'phel bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba/ /'khor ba'i btson rar ldongs pa yin/ /chos rnams 'di dag brtags byas na/ /rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste/ /skye dang
353a3(phal chen): shi 'phor gyur pa rnams/ /ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin/ /chos rnams gang yang 'pho ba med/ /gang yang de bzhin skye ba med/ /chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na/ /sangs rgyas kun na
353a4(phal chen): rab tu snang / /gzung du med cing bltar med cing / /chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med/ /dngos med pa yi mtha' shes na/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tshang kyang med/ /tshad med pa yi chos
353a5(phal chen): rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa/ /des ni ci zhig yod ces par/ /mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de dag byis pa'i
353a6(phal chen): chos nyid de/ /de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo / /dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams/ /mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste/ /mi gnas tshul du bzhugs
353a7(phal chen): pa yin| |chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med/ /la la dag gi chos nyid shes/ /la la dag ni chos kyang brjod/ /gang la the tshom mi mnga' ba'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong / /
353b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos nyid 'di/ /chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod do/ /de thos nas kyang bdag gis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
353b2(phal chen): dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i/ /ye
353b3(phal chen): shes shes rab shin tu che/ /de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs/ /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis/ /byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas/ /de phyir
353b4(phal chen): 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo / /shes rab chung ba thams cad ni/ /phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas/ /phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas/ /de bzhin
353b5(phal chen): gshegs pa mi mthong ngo / /dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni/ /bdag gi dngos zhes bya ba yin/ /chos rnams thams cad shes bgyis shing / /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos/ /sngon chad
353b6(phal chen): phung po'i tshul bzhin du/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba/ /ma 'ongs pa yi tshul shes pas/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos/ /ji ltar snang ba med pa yi/ /mun pa'i nang na
353b7(phal chen): gzugs mi snang / /de bzhin chos rnams bshad pa ni/ /mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo / /ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis/ /gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin sems
354a1(phal chen): ni ma sbyangs pas/ /sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa/ /rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin phug na gnas sems
354a2(phal chen): kyis| |sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo / /de bas mig ni rnam par sbyongs/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par sgoms/ /chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis/ /'od mdzad rab
354a3(phal chen): tu mthong ma yin/ /ji ltar sngon blos kun bshad cing / /bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mi rnyings pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong / /de nas byang
354a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gnas med pa yi chos rnams la/ /
354a5(phal chen): gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na/ /de phyir srid pa'i brtson ra na/ /byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor/ /brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos/ /zlo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags/ /des
354a6(phal chen): ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas/ /bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed/ /shes rab chung la lam nor cing / /bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa/ /phyin ci log gi blo dag gis/ /mi
354a7(phal chen): bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed/ /gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba/ /de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang nga / /chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mig kyang de la yod pa min/ /de bas mig
354b1(phal chen): ni sbyang bar gyis/ /bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par sems/ /gang phyir bdag cag sngon chad du/ /bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na'ang / /gang gi
354b2(phal chen): sems la chags med pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i/ /chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong / /gang gis shes rab che mnga' ba/ /chos su bde gshegs mthong ba rnams/ /de dag
354b3(phal chen): 'jig rten mig can te/ /gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya/ /lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni/ /chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste/ /lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na/ /thams cad
354b4(phal chen): mthong ba med pa yin/ /kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /de ni rang bzhin thams cad du/ /shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ji 'dra
354b5(phal chen): ba| |dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te/ /de las bdag gis thos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis phyogs
354b6(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yi/ /mig ni shin tu 'khrul pa yin/ /'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste/ /sangs rgyas
354b7(phal chen): la ni log mi mnga'/ /gang gis log par shes gyur te/ /yang dag ji bzhin ma nor la/ /yang dag ma yin bden shes na/ /sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin/ /mthong ba dag gis dri
355a1(phal chen): mar 'gyur/ /rnam par mthong na de med de/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral/ /de bas rnam par gzigs zhes bya/ /de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste/ /'jig
355a2(phal chen): rten de yang rnam par brtags/ /'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na/ /snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnams kyi snang pa ni/ /'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste/ /yang dag
355a3(phal chen): ji bzhin bsam byas shing / /de ltar mthong na mthong ba'o/ /de ltar mthong na nyon mongs med/ /dbang du gyur cing zag pa med/ /gang gis tha dad med mthong ba/ /dngos por brtags
355a4(phal chen): pa ma yin no/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste/ /de dag yod pa ma yin pas/ /rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin/ /de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/
355a5(phal chen): nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med/ /de dag la ni ston pa med/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos/ /chos rnams la ni mos med de/ /chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing //
355a6(phal chen): shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa/ /des ni thub chen mthong ba yin/ /ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa/ /de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong / /de mthong bas na 'du byed kun/ /rang
355a7(phal chen): bzhin gyis ni rnam par zhi/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
355b1(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ /kye ma sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do/ /rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'/ /'jig rten mthar phyin rgal ba'o/ /yang dag ji
355b2(phal chen): bzhin ma nor bar/ /bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas/ /ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin/ /'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs/ /'du byed thams cad skad cig ma/ /so so'i skye
355b3(phal chen): bo de dag 'gengs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni bzung byas shing / /de dag de phyir khom pa med/ /khom pa med ces bya ba ni/ /ci yang brjod du med pa ste/ /khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /
355b4(phal chen): khom pa bsam gyis mi khyab thob/ /gang la dngos po med pa yi/ /mi zad khom pa med par bshad/ /yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na/ /des ni grags chen mthong ba yin/ /mthong ba med
355b5(phal chen): pa mthong zhes bya/ /yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya/ /mthong ba dag gam yod pa min/ /ma bsgoms pa ni rnam par bsgoms/ /ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba/ /de dag gis ni lta ba bshig /
355b6(phal chen): gang la sangs rgyas smos pa yi/ /de dag chos rnams zhig pa med/ /ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba/ /de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed/ /rgyal ba
355b7(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ /chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan/ /des ni brtson blo brtan pa de/ /chos mang bye ba rab tu ston/ /yod dang med pa shes
356a1(phal chen): byas te| |gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste/ /yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
356a2(phal chen): blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas/ /snang ba bdag cag shes par
356a3(phal chen): gyur| |phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong / /sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa/ /de ni sems can g.yang sa ste/ /'di la ci yang yod pa min/ /
356a4(phal chen): tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa 'o/ /byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la/ /sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med/ /
356a5(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing / /gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa/ /de skad bskal pa grangs med du/ /srid pa'i gang chen mtsho na 'khor/ /nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad//
356a6(phal chen): nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang / /rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo / /'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te/ /mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin/ /'phags pa'i
356a7(phal chen): chos rnams ma skyes pa/ /bla ma dag ni mi shes so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di/ /'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ /tshul bzhin ma yin
356b1(phal chen): phyin ci log / zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar/ /gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa/ /des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong / /chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni/ /rab
356b2(phal chen): tu brjod kyang bstan pa med/ /'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta/ /rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med/ /thog ma dag dang tha mar yang / /'gal
356b3(phal chen): med rtsa ba med pas na/ /de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i
356b4(phal chen): tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam pa'i phyir/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla/ /de ni bde ba bsam
356b5(phal chen): mi khyab| |ci phyir zhe na bskal pa rnams/ /grangs med sdug bsngal sngon chad byung / /'on kyang bde gshegs ma thos pas/ /bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo/ /de bzhin ma nor
356b6(phal chen): chos kyi rnams/ /yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te/ /gang la 'grogs pa med pa rnams/ /de dag byang chub bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa/ /sngon chad ma byung 'byung mi
356b7(phal chen): 'gyur| |gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos/ /de dag mtshan nyid med pa 'o/ /chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du/ /gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni/ /de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs
357a1(phal chen): pa| |yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong / /yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs/ /yang dag min par yang dag min/ /'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na/ /sangs
357a2(phal chen): rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya/ /khor du ma chud chos bstan te/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sgom pa ste/ /gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no/ /de ltar
357a3(phal chen): mang dang gcig gnas pa/ /mang po dag tu rnam par shes/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /bsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas/ /byas pa med cing byed pa med/ /las kyi 'du
357a4(phal chen): shes rnam bsgoms shing / /las 'di ji bzhin shes byas nas/ /rnam pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi/ /nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas/ /
357a5(phal chen): gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur
357a6(phal chen): rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sems can chen po bla na med/ /sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms/ /'jug par bya ba gang yang med/ /de
357a7(phal chen): bas bla na med ces bya/ /gang la phra ba yod min pa/ /de la sbom pa'ang yod pa min/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes/ /rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas/ /gang zhig sangs
357b1(phal chen): rgyas spyod yul ba/ /de la phra ba yod pa min/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /mun pa rnams ni rnam gsal cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
357b2(phal chen): snang / /de la snang ba gang yang med/ /mi snang ba yang ci yang med/ /thams cad chos la kun nas dga'/ /skyes pa med cing gnas pa med/ /'dod chags med cing rten pa med/ /chos nyid
357b3(phal chen): de yang sbed pa med/ /gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing / /gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas/ /ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi/ /shes rab chen po legs par mthong / /mi gnyis pa la
357b4(phal chen): gnyis pa med/ /gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste/ /stong pa de yang khams gsum kun/ /de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/ /byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang / /de dag de la rab tu gnas/ /gnas
357b5(phal chen): pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /rang gi lus ni rjes su blta/ /lus med pa ni lus su bshad/ /'byung ba med cing bstan du med/ /'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa/ /sangs rgyas
357b6(phal chen): sku ni bla na med/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /de skad bden pa'i blos smras te/ /de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs/ /shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
357b7(phal chen): dam pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir/ /skyes bu drang srong
358a1(phal chen): mchog gi rnams/ /dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dag /'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung / /thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de/ /sems can khams la rnam
358a2(phal chen): gzigs kyang / /srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i/ /sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na/ /yang dag sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba/ /sems
358a3(phal chen): can gtso bo ma gtogs par/ /skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang med/ /gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag /med na 'jig rten khams kun na/ /sems
358a4(phal chen): can bde ba gcig mi 'byung / /sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag /'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu/ /gang
358a5(phal chen): gis de bzhin gshegs mthor ba/ /de dag 'thob pa legs par thob/ /gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba/ /de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa/ /
358a6(phal chen): bdag cag rnams kyis thob legs thob/ /'di dang 'dra ba'i tshul thos pas/ /kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod/ /byang chub sems
358a7(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs bas/ /spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas/ /da dung phyir zhing dad pa skye/ /de yi ye
358b1(phal chen): shes mtha' yas pas/ /da dung brjod du yod pa min/ /gang zhig mchog gi blos smras dang / /rgyal sras gzhan gyis bshad pa rnams/ /de dag da dung bdag gis kyang / /bskal pa bsam
358b2(phal chen): yas bshad par bya/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems
358b3(phal chen): dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu
358b4(phal chen): gcig pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /
358b5(phal chen): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i
358b6(phal chen): p hyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun
358b7(phal chen): kyang chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag gis zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal
359a1(phal chen): te| chos kyi blo gros/ khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la mnyam par gzhog pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de bas
359a2(phal chen): na rigs kyi bu/ khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
359a3(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan pas 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
359a4(phal chen): ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang / chags pa med pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang /
359a5(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul thob par bya ba dang / kun nas sbyor ba thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams cad khong du
359a6(phal chen): chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa
359a7(phal chen): bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs
359b1(phal chen): pa skyed cig / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la chags pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /thogs pa med pa nye bar sgrub
359b2(phal chen): pa mdzad do/ /mchod pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /rmongs pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /tha dad pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /kha na ma tho ba med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /
359b3(phal chen): dpag tu med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /zhum pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /'phrog pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i
359b4(phal chen): phyir ro| |de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa mdzad de/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
359b5(phal chen): 'das de dag gi phyag gis reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las langs te byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang
359b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rigs zhes bya ba 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas shin tu yangs pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
359b7(phal chen): ni| 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
360a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed pa gang las bsam ste de skad du smras pa de
360a2(phal chen): dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
360a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod
360a4(phal chen): pa dang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
360a5(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang /
360a6(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
360a7(phal chen): dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang /
360b1(phal chen): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sems dang
360b2(phal chen): po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas mdzes pa dang / bzang ba dang / mig
360b3(phal chen): tu thong ba dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / thub par dka' ba dang / mthu che bar mthong ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rjes su bstan
360b4(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'am/ sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
360b5(phal chen): chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / snga phyi med par byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed pa dang po des ni/ thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu
360b6(phal chen): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang
360b7(phal chen): ba shes pa dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa dang mos pa du ma shes pa dang / khams tha dad pa
361a1(phal chen): dang khams du ma shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
361a2(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsgribs pa med pa shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa dang / dus
361a3(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag pa med pa shes pa'o/ /thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su zin par 'gyur te/ de ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o//
361a4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsten par bde ba yang de la
361a5(phal chen): brjod par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /zil gyis mi non pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o//
361a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba yang de la bstan par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yang de la
361a7(phal chen): brjod par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang de la brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
361b1(phal chen): zhe na| sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la de bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog
361b2(phal chen): par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la las dang po
361b3(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye
361b4(phal chen): bar gzhog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go /snying brtse ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems
361b5(phal chen): dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongs su srung ba'i sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go /rnam pa bcu po
361b6(phal chen): de dag gis sems can thams cad la sems nye bar gzhog ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang
361b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de ni/ thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /mang du thos nas dben par gnas pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /rab tu dben
362a1(phal chen): par gyur nas dge ba'i bshes su 'gyur bar yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes su gyur nas nga lo bde ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /nga
362a2(phal chen): lo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la yongs
362a3(phal chen): su bskul bar bya'o/ /don shes nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rjes su 'gro bar gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /rmongs
362a4(phal chen): pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad de la de bas kyang shes cher snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par
362a5(phal chen): bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ las
362a6(phal chen): dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
362a7(phal chen): sras dag / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcus chos thams cad la brtson par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos
362b1(phal chen): thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa dang / chos thams cad myong ba med pa dang / chos
362b2(phal chen): thams cad brda med pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / chos thams cad ched du byed pa med pa ste/ dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcu
362b3(phal chen): po de dag gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag /de ltar rnal
362b4(phal chen): 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ sems can gyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /chos kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams
362b5(phal chen): brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /sa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /chu'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /me'i khams brtag pa la yongs
362b6(phal chen): su bskul bar bya'o/ /rlung gi khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'dod pa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /gzugs kyi khams brtag pa la yongs su
362b7(phal chen): bskul bar bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bas kyang chos la snang ba 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag
363a1(phal chen): nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
363a2(phal chen): dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung
363a3(phal chen): rab la yongs su smin pa bcus skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la shes pas mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / chos nges par rtogs pa dang /
363a4(phal chen): sems can rnam par bsgoms pa dang / zhing rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / las rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam
363a5(phal chen): par bsgoms pa dang / 'khor ba rnam par bsgoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgoms pa ste/ yongs su smin pa bcu po 'di dag gis 'phags pa'i gsung rab las
363a6(phal chen): skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /de ltar cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
363a7(phal chen): rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par sgom
363b1(phal chen): pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par
363b2(phal chen): sgrub par bya ba rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i
363b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bya ba rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul
363b4(phal chen): bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnam par sgom pa la yongs su bskul bar
363b5(phal chen): bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de bas kyang sems 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring la
363b6(phal chen): 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i
363b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i
364a1(phal chen): phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can
364a2(phal chen): thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems
364a3(phal chen): can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad drang ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams
364a4(phal chen): cad gdul ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
364a5(phal chen): dpa' ste/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ sems can mtha' yas pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can tshad med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can grangs
364a6(phal chen): med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can gzugs med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can dpag tu med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems
364a7(phal chen): can stong pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can byed pa med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can dngos po med pa brjod par bya'o/ /sems can rang bzhin med pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
364b1(phal chen): na| de'i sems de bas kyang shas cher mngon par zhen pa la mi gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi
364b2(phal chen): 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la bsam pa phun
364b3(phal chen): sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu nyan na/ bsam pa nges pa rab tu 'thob pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/
364b4(phal chen): 'di ltar sangs rgyas la snyan pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos la snyan pa dang / mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la
364b5(phal chen): bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la snyan pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la snyan
364b6(phal chen): ba'am mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung ba dang / sems can gyi khams che ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la
364b7(phal chen): bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa
365a1(phal chen): nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams skyo bar sla ba dang / sems can gyi khams skyo bar dka' ba brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa
365a2(phal chen): yin| chos kyi dbyings chung ba'am/ chos kyi dbyings che bar brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'grub pa'am/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig
365a3(phal chen): par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings yod pa'am/ chos kyi dbyings med par brjod kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/
365a4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ de ltar bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos la 'jug pa
365a5(phal chen): bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / chos
365a6(phal chen): thams cad yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rdzun pa dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /
365a7(phal chen): chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad rtog pa med pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i bsam pa de bas kyang shas cher mi 'phrog pa la rnam par bsgrub
365b1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/
365b2(phal chen): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
365b3(phal chen): dag / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu nyan pa'i tshe brtan pa rab tu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas yod ce'am/ sangs rgyas med ce na'ang sangs
365b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go / chos yod ce'am/ chos med ce na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod ce'am/ byang chub sems
365b5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa med ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung zhe'am/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
365b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi 'byung zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go / de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'das shen yang sangs
365b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go / de bzhin gshegs pa byon ce'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /sangs rgyas
366a1(phal chen): da ltar byung ba zhe'am/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba ma yin zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad mi shes
366a2(phal chen): so| |zhe'am/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad shes so/ /zhe na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go /dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ dus gsum mtshan
366a3(phal chen): nyid tha dad ce na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
366a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de la ni/ chos 'byams klas pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gcig las rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ba brjod par bya'o/ /mang po
366a5(phal chen): las tha mi dad par brjod par bya'o/ /don dang mthun pa'i yi ge brjod par bya'o/ /yi ge dang mthun pa'i don brjod par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa yod pa dang mnyam pa nyid du
366a6(phal chen): brjod par bya'o/ /dngos po yod pa med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan ma mtshan ma med pa
366a7(phal chen): dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan nyid mtshan nyid med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /
366b1(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de bas kyang shas cher mkhas pa thams cad la yongs su byang bar 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya dang / bdag nyid
366b2(phal chen): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
366b3(phal chen): de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' las bcu la gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa
366b4(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi spyod kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba sgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan
366b5(phal chen): gyi bsam pa shes pa yin/ gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa rtogs pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ las kyi byin gyis rlabs tha dad pa rab tu rtogs
366b6(phal chen): pa yin| 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang 'jig pa yongs su 'jal ba yin/ gang dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i
366b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ chos mngon par sgrub pa bcu brjod par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
367a1(phal chen): lta ste| sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bskyed pa brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byin gyis
367a2(phal chen): brlabs brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par rgyu ba brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mnan pa brjod par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
367a3(phal chen): par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o/ /chos grangs med pa yongs su dri ba brjod par bya'o/ /yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus mngon par sgrub pa brjod par bya'o/ /dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dgye
367a4(phal chen): ba brjod par bya'o/ /sems bskyed pa gcig las sangs rgyas grangs med pa bsnyen bkur bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bas kyang shas cher chos thams
367a5(phal chen): cad la mngon par sgrub pa'i mkhas pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur
367a6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /rgyal tshab kyi byang chub
367a7(phal chen): sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi
367b1(phal chen): skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod
367b2(phal chen): yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos sna tshogs rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye
367b3(phal chen): ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes par rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa brtag pa rtogs
367b4(phal chen): par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ste/
367b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab de la ni/ gnas bcu brjod par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas pa brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas kyi
367b6(phal chen): tshul brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas su gnas pa brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas su 'gro ba brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i gnas su spyod pa brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal
367b7(phal chen): por dbang bskur ba brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i byin brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas pa brjod par bya'o/ /chos
368a1(phal chen): kyi rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems bsgribs pa med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la de bas kyang
368a2(phal chen): shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
368a3(phal chen): dag / 'di ni/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
368a4(phal chen): sras dag / 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su
368a5(phal chen): bskyed pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sems mang ba
368a6(phal chen): yin| 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs
368a7(phal chen): med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par brtag pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po rtogs par
368b1(phal chen): bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa yongs su gzung ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa gdul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/ de'i lus ni /
368b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang shes par mi nus te/ lus kyi las shes par mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
368b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa shes par mi nus so/ /'das par blta ba'am shes par mi nus so/ /ma 'ongs pa blta ba'am shes par mi nus so/ /da ltar byung ba blta ba'am shes par mi nus so/ /
368b4(phal chen): zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus so/ /sems kyi yul shes par mi nus so/ /ye shes kyi spyod yul yang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis
368b5(phal chen): shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba de la ni/
368b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes la 'jug pa bcu bka' stsal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dus gsum gyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
368b7(phal chen): chos kyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ /chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams
369a1(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par dgang ba brjod pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba brjod pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
369a2(phal chen): cad byin gyis brlabs pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do/ /chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes
369a3(phal chen): brjod pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de bas kyang shas cher
369a4(phal chen): gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye
369a5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di ni/ dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'o/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
369a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab
369a7(phal chen): tu ldeg go / kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /
369b1(phal chen): kun tu shig shig go /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha
369b2(phal chen): rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin
369b3(phal chen): gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /lha rdzas kyi snang ba rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /
369b4(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grags par gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu
369b5(phal chen): rgyas par byung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
369b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags te phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams
369b7(phal chen): kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa legs so/ /legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bdag cag kun kyang ming chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
370a1(phal chen): chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba sha stag gi zham ring / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha stag nas 'dir phyin te/ thams cad na yang
370a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag gis
370a3(phal chen): don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing / lhag chad med par ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar bdag cag dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
370a4(phal chen): 'dir phyin to/ /ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling
370a5(phal chen): bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po phyin par gyur to/ /de nas byang
370a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
370a7(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba/ /sku gzugs sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing / /mtshan bzang thub pa med pa mthong gyur nas//
370b1(phal chen): byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /dpe zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang / /yongs su bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste/ /srid lam kun tu sdug bsngal gyur mthong
370b2(phal chen): zhing / /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun mnga' ba/ /kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing / /nam mkha' dbyings mnyam rtog
370b3(phal chen): pa med pa yi/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /khams gsum kun na gnas ni 'di dag yin/ /gnas min rang bzhin dag kyang 'di yin zhes/ /ma nor dngos po
370b4(phal chen): khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba dang / /dkar nag las rnams ji snyed yod pa dag /de kun mnyam nyid
370b5(phal chen): rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang / /mnyam gzhag de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang / /rnam
370b6(phal chen): byang rnam par khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do/ /sems can kun gyi dbang po ci 'dra dang / /brtson 'grus stobs kyang de bzhin ci 'dra ba/ /rnam pa
370b7(phal chen): sna tshogs de dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /sems can kun gyi mos pa ji 'dra dang / /'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rnam
371a1(phal chen): pa kun tu thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs khams rnams dang / /'jig
371a2(phal chen): rten kun gyi khams mang du ma dang / /khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i sems rnams ci 'dra
371a3(phal chen): dang / /lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gi /ma nor rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad
371a4(phal chen): mthong bar bya ba dang / /sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'khor gyur ces/ /chags med mig ni rnam par dag bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /'das
371a5(phal chen): pa'i dus su gang rnams ci byung yang / /mtshan nyid gang yin ji 'dra ci dgongs pa/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur
371a6(phal chen): ro| |'jig rten kun na kun sbyor ji snyed dang / /don gyi mtshams 'brel bag chags de bzhin te/ /nyon mongs zad bya mthar thug shes bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan
371a7(phal chen): pa sems bsgyur ro/ /'gro ba rnams kyi tha snyad gdags pa dang / /tshig lam skad du brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /brda yi bden pa rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
371b1(phal chen): sems bsgyur ro/ /chos rnams ji ltar brjod du med pa dang / /stong pa byed med rang bzhin dben pa'i rnams/ /de dag dngos nyid khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems
371b2(phal chen): bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang / /rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su bskam bya bar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub
371b3(phal chen): don du sems bsgyur ro/ /spu rtse re re'i sgo nas 'od zer rnams/ /phyogs bcu kun tu ji ltar dgye bya ba/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems
371b4(phal chen): bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bdag gi lag pa'i mthil du gzhag bya bar/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
371b5(phal chen): sems bsgyur ro/ /ji ltar zhing gi sems can yangs pa kun/ /gnod pa med par skra rtser gzhog byed par/ /srog med chos rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don
371b6(phal chen): du sems bsgyur ro/ /rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen gang rgyas pa/ /skra rtses blangs shing kun tu dor bya bar/ /mthar thug ma lus khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
371b7(phal chen): sems bsgyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab zhing gi rnams/ /phra rab rdul glags ma lus bgrang bya bar/ /rdul phran grangs rnams khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du
372a1(phal chen): sems bsgyur ro/ /'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / /'jig rten tshig cing 'grub pa de bzhin te/ /bskal pa zad cing gnas pa shes
372a2(phal chen): bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /rgyal sras rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi rang
372a3(phal chen): bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/ /skra yi nyag mas bcings shing tshad gdab bar/ /
372a4(phal chen): dngos po'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /brjod med khor yug shin tu yangs pa dag /ba spu'i khung bu ji ltar gzung bya bar/ /
372a5(phal chen): phra dang yangs pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /ji ltar dbyangs gcig kun tu
372a6(phal chen): grags 'gyur bar/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag shes bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /sems can kun gyi sgra skad ji snyed pa/ /dbyangs gcig
372a7(phal chen): brjod pas ji ltar brjod bya bar/ /sgra yi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus shes byed cing / /ji ltar 'gro
372b1(phal chen): kun zhi zhes ston 'gyur bar/ /lce yangs khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad rab tu tshig pa dang / /kun nas gnas
372b2(phal chen): pa ma lus mthong 'gyur bar/ /rnam rtogs chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad sangs rgyas gcig bzhin du/ /de
372b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar/ /rang byung chos ni rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /zhing rnams thams cad rdul mchog phrar
372b4(phal chen): glags pa/ /de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar/ /thams cad yid kyi dngos su shes bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /kun gzigs 'das pa ji snyed byung
372b5(phal chen): ba dang / /ma byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa rnams/ /skad cig sems kyis thams cad rtogs bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /tshig gcig brtsams
372b6(phal chen): te brjod cing bshad byas kyang / /bskal pa brjod med thams cad zad 'gyur bar/ /chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /phyogs
372b7(phal chen): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten ma lus rnams/ /'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba dag /sems kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /lus
373a1(phal chen): dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /phyogs kun spyod tshe chags par mi 'gyur bar/ /dus gsum stong pa khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /brtan pa byang
373a2(phal chen): chub don du sems bsgyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub don du sems bskyed pa/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brjod du med pa kun/ /mchod par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /
373a3(phal chen): 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /'khor ba dag na byang chub don spyod tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag de la yongs su brjod par bya/ /'di ni phyir
373a4(phal chen): mi ldog gi gdams ngag go / 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten ji snyed pa/ /phyogs bcu'i tha dad tshad med yod pa rnams/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod/ /'di ni
373a5(phal chen): phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go / mchog gi chos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos/ /'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i chos/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan/ /'di ni
373a6(phal chen): skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go / gzhan gyis mi thub ji snyed gnas yod pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non rnams/ /de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod de/ /
373a7(phal chen): 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa/ /'jig rten mgon po'i bdag nyid che ba kun/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhag
373b1(phal chen): ste| |'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams ngag go / sangs rgyas grangs med brjod du med pa dang / /ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' de la
373b2(phal chen): brjod par bya/ /'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang yod pa/ /de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus par/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan
373b3(phal chen): par bya| |'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang / /'jig rten kun gyi chags par
373b4(phal chen): mi 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba ji snyed dang / /ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi/ /skyabs dang mgon dang rten
373b5(phal chen): du 'gyur bar yang / /byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya/ /rnam pa 'di 'dras rgyal sras dang po de/ /byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te/ /de ltar gdams ngag rjes su
373b6(phal chen): bstan par bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam bkod pa 'o/ /de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang po pa/ /thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la/ /sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon
373b7(phal chen): byed pa| |'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go / phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems/ /snying rje'i sems dang de bzhin byams pa'i sems/ /srung ba'i sems
374a1(phal chen): dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems/ /slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems/ /de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar gzhag pa dang / /kha ton lung
374a2(phal chen): la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /mang du thos pa dgon par gnas par bskul/ /dben par gyur pas dge bshes bsnyen bkur bya/ /dge bshes gyur nas ngang bder 'gyur
374a3(phal chen): bar bya| |ngang tshul bde bas dus tshul shes par bya/ /dus rnams shes nas mi 'jigs 'gyur bar bya/ /mi 'jigs gyur nas don la brtson par bya/ /don shes gyur nas
374a4(phal chen): chos rjes shes par bya/ /chos shes gyur nas rmongs pa med par bya/ /rmongs med gyur nas legs par bshad chos la/ /rgyal sras des ni rnam par gnas par bya/ /de
374a5(phal chen): tsam gyis ni las kyi dang po pa/ /byang chub don zhugs byang chub sems dpa' 'o/ /gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de yin te/ /sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed/ /
374a6(phal chen): gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsum brjod pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid/ /bdag med de bzhin byed pa med
374a7(phal chen): pa dang / /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang / /'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas med dang / /ched du spyod med de bzhin rtog med par/ /kun la byang chub sems
374b1(phal chen): dpa' dpyod pa byed/ /de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang / /de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya/ /'jig rten khams yongs ma lus mthar thug pa/ /brtag
374b2(phal chen): par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /sa dang me dang de bzhin chu khams dang / /de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang / /'dod pa gzugs dang de bzhin gzugs med pa/ /
374b3(phal chen): brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya/ /khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing / /khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson
374b4(phal chen): byed pa| |des na der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin no/ /cher skyes pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di las skyes pa ste/ /dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs
374b5(phal chen): dran pa can/ /chos kyi rjes byung rigs ldan legs par skyes/ /de yi gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa yin/ /chos rnams de bzhin
374b6(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa ste/ /sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms/ /chos dang 'jig rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang / /rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /rnam
374b7(phal chen): bsgoms rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa/ /thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras zhes bya/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par bsgoms pa'i
375a1(phal chen): phyir| |yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug pa/ /de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing / /
375a2(phal chen): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song bas/ /mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / /dus gsum kun la tha dad med par 'jug /de tsam gyis ni rgyal sras bzhi
375a3(phal chen): pa ste| |de yi bsngags pa rnam pa de 'dra 'o/ /de ltar 'di la nan tan bsgrubs byas shing / /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung / /de las gzhan yang rgyal sras
375a4(phal chen): lnga pa ni| |sbyor ba phun sum tshogs zhes brjod pa ste/ /thabs mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing / /bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar phyin byed/ /'jig rten
375a5(phal chen): dag na bsod nams gang byed kyang / /sems can kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang / /phan tshol de bzhin bde ba skyed pa dang / /snying brtse skye rgu 'grol bar 'gyur ba dang / /'jig
375a6(phal chen): rten rnams kyi gtse ba bsal ba dang / /dran zhing de bzhin dang bar bya ba dang / /sems can mang po thams cad gdul mos shing / /mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang che/ /
375a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang / /de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal med dpag med pa/ /de 'dra'i chos rnams de la
375b1(phal chen): brjod par bya/ /de tsam gyis na rgyal sras lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can/ /de yi gdams ngag tshul ni de 'dra ste/ /yon tan thams cad mnga' bas bstan pa
375b2(phal chen): yin| |gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing / /rnam rtog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa de/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis bslu
375b3(phal chen): mi nus| |sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / /spyod pas bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung / /sems can nyung zhe'am 'on tam mang ngo zhes/ /thos par gyur kyang
375b4(phal chen): bsam pa zhum mi 'gyur/ /sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs med ce'am/ /gdul sla 'on tam shin tu gdul dka' dang / /chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang / /kun nas
375b5(phal chen): 'grub 'gyur rnam par 'jig ce 'am/ /chos dbyings de ni yod dam med ce yang / /byang chub sems dpa' thos gyur dus gsum tshul/ /nges par rtogs byed thams cad rnam
375b6(phal chen): rtog cing / /sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges/ /mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / /dngos nyid yod min rdzun dang bden pa dang / /sgyu ma rmi lam mi rtog rang
375b7(phal chen): bzhin med/ /'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyan pa byed/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / /spyod pa yod med rtag
376a1(phal chen): tu rnam par bsgoms/ /'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das dang / /ma byon to zhe'am ma
376a2(phal chen): byon ma yin dang / /skyes so ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad mtshan de bzhin/ /gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang po dang / /don dang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos
376a3(phal chen): rnams dang / /thams cad phan tshun yongs su 'dzud byad pa/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya/ /mtshan ma med la mtshan ma yod pa dang / /mtshan nyid med la mtshan gyis dmigs
376a4(phal chen): pa dang / /rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba rnams/ /thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug pa byed/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon gyur pa/ /lus dang ngag dang de
376a5(phal chen): bzhin yid kun gyis/ /kha na ma thor 'gyur pa nam yang med/ /ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye bar byed/ /gzhan gyi bsam pa ji bzhin rab tu shes/ /de dag mos pa yongs
376a6(phal chen): su rtogs par byed/ /phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa/ /kun tu mngon shes myur ba yid bzhin 'thob/ /bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thos
376a7(phal chen): shing / /de la zhum pa skyed pa gang yang med/ /zhing rnams yongs su bskyod pa shes pa dang / /de bzhin byin rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su
376b1(phal chen): mnan pa dang / /grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya/ /grangs med chos rnams yongs su 'dri ba dang / /ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing / /dbyangs kyi rnam pa shin
376b2(phal chen): tu yangs 'gyur dang / /sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjod pa ni/ /sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu
376b3(phal chen): shes| |nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes/ /de 'dra'i spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can/ /chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang / /sngon mtha' phyi mtha' 'jig rten rnam phye
376b4(phal chen): dang / /brda yi bden pa don dam bden pa dang / /ma lus rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ /de yi rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul/ /der yang ji ltar yongs su
376b5(phal chen): spyad bya dang / /'gro bar bya dang gnas par bya ba dang / /rgyal po'i gnas su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod/ /de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang / /byin gyis brlabs dang de
376b6(phal chen): bzhin mthu chen dang / /chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dag /brjod par bya ste rgyal tshab de 'dra yin/ /de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste/ /gdams ngag des kyang rlom
376b7(phal chen): sems byed pa med/ /khong du chud byed dran ldan rgyal tshab de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob par byed/ /bde gshegs sras po gtso bor dbang bskur ba/ /thu bo mchog dang dam par
377a1(phal chen): gyur pa ni/ /'jig rten khams mang grangs med bskyod pa dang / /yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang / /byin gyis brlabs dang yongs su
377a2(phal chen): 'da' bya dang / /yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems kyang rab tu mang / /grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang / /dbang po phun ldan rnam par dpyad la mkhas/ /de dag
377a3(phal chen): gzud cing rnam par gdul ba dang / /thams cad mkhyen gyi sems kyang shin tu mang / /zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing / /dam chos khams rnams ma lus rnam
377a4(phal chen): par dpyod/ /de yi lus dang lus kyi las rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus te/ /dus gsum shin tu rgyal ba'i sems dag kyang / /rgyal tshab gyur pa'i
377a5(phal chen): bar gyis shes mi nus/ /de la thams cad gzigs pas dus gsum dang / /sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin brjod/ /chos dbyings mtha' yas mtha' dang
377a6(phal chen): dbus med pa/ /rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod pa mdzad/ /ci nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par/ /yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang / /sems
377a7(phal chen): can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang / /sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa'i mdzad/ /rgyal sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bgrangs pa/ /rnam par dgod la gnas pa de
377b1(phal chen): dag kun/ /rang rang spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa/ /'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyis shes par dka'/ /'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pa/ /phyogs bcu ma
377b2(phal chen): lus thams cad rgyas par bya/ /dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems gtong ba/ /de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur/ /zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod ba min//
377b3(phal chen): sems can chos dang 'jig rten kun de bzhin/ /las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te/ /byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin/ /skad cig sems la byang chub
377b4(phal chen): gzhol ba'i sems/ /gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyis shes mi nus/ /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min/ /de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod/ /gang zhig phyogs
377b5(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/ /spu gcig srang la tshad du 'jal byed pa/ /des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su tshol/ /phyogs
377b6(phal chen): bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun/ /spu rtse'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed pa/ /de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'di 'dra dag /sems kyi skad cig gcig la sgrub par byed/ /ji ltar
377b7(phal chen): zhing rnams rdul rab phrar glags shing / /sems can la la ma lus bgrang byed de/ /'di snyed yod ces grangs su gcod byed pa/ /de 'drar rgyal sras spyod pa brjod pa'o/ /'das
378a1(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang / /gang rnams phyogs bcur byung bar gyur pa dang / /rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos rab mang bar/ /rnam par dmigs
378a2(phal chen): shing byang chub sems skye'o/ /sems can khams rnams ma lus rgyas bkang zhing / /byang chub don du thog mar sems bskyed pa/ /de yang bgrang bar nus pa ma yin na/ /de
378a3(phal chen): las gong du ci zhig smos kyang dgos/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu bstan pa'i
378a4(phal chen): le'u ste| nyi shu pa'o/ / //
